strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. A precocious pilot who was entrusted with command of an airship at the tender age of eighteen, he maintains a carefree—some might say lackadaisical—demeanor. He has the unwavering trust of both the king and the populace, in large part due to his father's reputation as a stalwart knight of the kingdom.
strings.summon: Where should we head to next?
strings.fusion:
Interesting...
I feel like I've grown a bit stronger.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt and an accomplished captain, his affable disposition has endeared him to his subordinates. Rain commands an airship with his best friend Lasswell, who was taken in by Rain's family as an orphan. Though Rain's meddlesome nature sometimes annoys his friend, Lasswell goes along with Rain's orders from time to time out of respect for all he has done for him.
strings.summon:
I wonder if there are any
cute girls around here, or at
least some tasty treats.
strings.evolution:
How strange...
I feel so light on my feet
all of a sudden.
strings.fusion:
Who knew you could gain
such strength from visions!?

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he has complicated feelings about his father Sir Raegen, an illustrious knight in his own respect who inexplicably vanished one day, leaving his family behind. Blessed with natural talents beyond his own comprehension, he is able to quickly acquire skills that would take most people years to master.
strings.summon:
Huh...!? It's my turn?
It's not that I don't want to help.
Really, I do!
strings.evolution:
This feeling...
It's as if my sword skills have reached a whole new level.
strings.fusion:
I can't wait to show everyone
what I'm truly made of!

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he and his friend Lasswell are considered two of the most formidable knights to grace the Royal Guard since Rain's father Sir Raegen. Though he harbors conflicted feelings toward his father for having abandoned him and his family, he keeps this to himself when in the presence of Lasswell, who still deeply respects the man.
strings.summon:
This may seem out of character,
but I'm ready to get out there and fight!
...Seriously!
strings.evolution:
What is this strange feeling...?
As if some sort of power has been
unlocked deep inside of me...
strings.affinity:
We've been through a lot together.
I hope you feel that I am more
dependable now than I was before.
strings.fusion:
At last I understand.
True power comes from within.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. Though usually preoccupied chasing girls, on his journey chasing after the Sworn Six of Paladia who attacked his homeland a gentler, more courageous side of him came through. At a young age he came in contact with the earth crystal, but little did he know that would become the catalyst that sealed his fate.
strings.evolution:
What is this...?
I feel filled with some unknown power.
strings.affinity:
We've been through a lot together.
I hope you feel that I am more
dependable now than I was before.
strings.fusion:
Alright, this'll do for now.
However, there are no limits to my power.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Alright, time to show 'em
just how powerful I've become!
strings.fusion:
Still isn't enough.
I haven't even reached my limit!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Just having fine armor isn't enough.
I'll get strong enough to match how good I look!
strings.evolution:
This feels good.
I feel like I'm really getting everything
I can out of this new equipment.
strings.fusion:
How strange, I don't even feel warm.
But still, I feel a strong power flowing through me!

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he shares command of an airship with his childhood friend Rain. His skills are on par with Rain's, and his no-nonsense attitude has earned him the trust of his superiors and subordinates alike. However, he has a tendency to be dragged along by Rain against his own better judgment.
strings.summon:
The time to draw my blade has come.
It will not tarnish the good name
of the knights of Grandshelt.
strings.fusion:
This won't suffice.
My training has barely begun.
I must grow stronger.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, and one of the youngest to be entrusted with an airship command, second only to his childhood friend Rain. Cautious by nature, Lasswell tends to be overprotective of his brother-in-arms, in part due to feeling that he owes a debt of gratitude to Rain's family, for taking him in when he was orphaned at a young age.
strings.summon: I will wield this sword whenever my comrades are in need of it.
strings.evolution:
I can see it!
The fruits of my training...
My swordsmanship has reached a new level.
strings.fusion:
To think that the power of visions
could give us such strength...

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, Lasswell was taken in by Rain's family when he lost his parents at a young age. Having grown up alongside Rain, he is one of the few to rival his friend in skill and talent. Lasswell himself, however, has never felt that he is quite Rain's equal, and harbors conflicting feelings of trust and inadequacy toward his lifelong friend.
strings.summon:
Where is the battlefield?
And in whose name shall I swing my blade?
strings.evolution:
Indeed...my body has grown lighter.
This must mean I've learned to use it more efficiently.
strings.fusion:
It's still not enough.
I must push myself to my very limits.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt whose talents earned him command of an airship alongside Rain. Lasswell is a tireless worker, entirely devoted to his duties and training. He holds the utmost respect for Rain's father, Sir Raegen, once a prominent knight of Grandshelt himself. Lasswell lends his strength to Rain as a way to honor the memory of his hero, while struggling with the fact that this prestigious lineage is not his own.
strings.summon:
You have need of my blade?
I will not disappoint you, I promise.
strings.evolution:
In gaining control over myself...
My blade swings true.
strings.affinity: We've known each other for a long time now. It would be nice to reminisce, but too much still lies on the road ahead.
strings.fusion:
This power...
Perhaps I have at last drawn closer to my ideal.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt who was raised alongside Rain by Rain's father, Sir Raegen, who also trained Lasswell in various skills. Out of respect for everything he had been given, he has a tendency to worry about Rain and his wellbeing, though he seems to be hiding some dreams and hopes of his own.
strings.evolution:
Finally...
Maybe now I can stand beside him.
strings.affinity: We've known each other for a long time now. It would be nice to reminisce, but too much still lies on the road ahead.
strings.fusion:
I can grow even stronger.
So this is human potential.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon: This doesn't look like what a knight of Grandshelt would wear, but still, I will fight as one.
strings.fusion:
If it's to become stronger,
I'll make use of any equipment available to me.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Where shall I swing my sword?
I wish to quickly familiarize myself with this equipment.
strings.evolution:
There is no need to be prideful.
We must only continue our efforts
as we aim for the top.
strings.fusion:
If I keep on training like this
I feel I can grow even stronger.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal with no recollection of her past, save her own name. Fina's lack of general knowledge can induce her to act with the innocence and curiosity of a child. She is proficient with white magic and the bow and arrow, though where she acquired such impressive skills, she cannot say.
strings.summon:
What is it people say...?
Oh yeah!
I'm all over it like a rash!
strings.fusion:
What's this...?
I feel...stronger?

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal suffering from amnesia. Fina remembers nothing save her own name, and seems to possess little to no knowledge of the world she currently inhabits. Despite this, it would seem that she once played a key role in its origins...
strings.summon:
Well, uh...
I'm still not really used to this, but count me in!
strings.evolution:
I feel like I'm remembering something.
But it's not a memory...
Perhaps...a hidden power?
strings.fusion:
Hmmm. I don't know why,
but I feel like I can work even harder now!

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. Because she has amnesia, she relies on impulse to guide her actions, which can often cause trouble for her comrades. Having woken in a strange world without her memories, she struggles with confusion and anxiety, but displays great inner strength in joining Rain and Lasswell on their quest.
strings.summon:
I-is it my turn?
Okay, I-I'll do my best!
strings.evolution: It's as though I've been awakened by the power lying within me.
strings.fusion:
I want to become stronger
so I can help everyone.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Her childlike behavior, in part the product of memory loss, may also stem from her original, lost personality.
strings.summon:
I shall grant power...
To whoever summoned me here...
Huh? What was I saying?
Anyway, can't wait to work with you!
strings.evolution:
A dormant power...
An awakening...
Yes, now I'm sure I've grown stronger.
strings.affinity: Thank you for fighting by my side all this time. Can I assume you trust me now?
strings.fusion: It looks like I'll be able to help out more than before.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. As a warrior of Hess, Fina once used her immense magical powers as a weapon, but currently channels them as white magic to help others for reasons unknown. Although her new personality is much more innocent and kind than that of her past, the desire for peace she has felt since ancient times remains unchanged.
strings.evolution:
I think I finally understand.
I know my true power,
and what I should do with it...
strings.affinity: Thank you for fighting by my side all this time. Can I assume you trust me now?
strings.fusion:
I want to use this power to
protect just like the rest of you.

strings.description: Fina's alternate form. This, it seems, is the true Fina, before she lost her memories...but since she is a vision, there is room to doubt this explanation. This Fina possesses powerful magic and a quick tongue — both mainly offensive. Yet behind her jibes and patronizing tone, one clearly senses a firm determination.
strings.summon:
This is just a temporary form,
but I shall lend you my power.
Just this once, okay?
strings.affinity:
He he... Here you are!
It's a thank you for all the power you've shown me!
strings.fusion:
That will do.
My emotions are elevating.

strings.description: Fina's alternate form, a powerful attack magic-wielding warrior. Though completely different from the mysterious-yet-adultlike girl Rain first came across, the sincerity she shows from time to time is just like the old Fina. She seems to yearn for being given power, as if she has some sort of mission that depends on it.
strings.summon:
Can you handle me in this form?
Let's see what you can do.
strings.evolution:
Now it's time to get serious.
I wonder if you can keep up to my power?
strings.affinity:
He he... Here you are!
It's a thank you for all the power you've shown me!
strings.fusion:
He he, I think you've got it.
Make me a little stronger, won't ya?

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Does this suit me?
I'm nervous because I usually
don't dress like this.
strings.fusion:
I'll do my best!
So let me fight alongside you!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
I'm still not used to this equipment,
but I'm still willing to try it out!
strings.evolution:
Looks like I'm getting used to this.
I'm a bit stronger now, right?
strings.fusion: I want to get stronger so that I can be of more help to everyone!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
So this equipment is made from the
memories of people in the Farplane?
I should use it with care, then!
strings.evolution:
I feel lighter on my feet.
I think I can be of more use to you all!
strings.fusion: Now I feel like I could face any monster!

strings.description: A military tactician for the Olderion Federation, and one of the Wardens of the Waters, who have protected the Water Shrine for generations. His dedication to his role means that he disregards his own feelings, always choosing the greatest good for the greatest number. Never one to mince words, he is often misunderstood as a cynic.
strings.fusion:
Is this the power of visions?
It's quite different from what I had imagined.

strings.description: A military tactician for the Olderion Federation. He is the eldest of his family, the Wardens of the Waters. Though he puts his duties as a Warden first, seemingly taking his family for granted, deep down he really cares for his brother and sister. It seems his sister Luka can see down to his true clumsy nature.
strings.evolution:
I can't let such a tragedy befall
Olderion once again...
That's why I must...
strings.fusion:
I must remain wise.
This team seems to be lacking a pillar of sound reasoning.

strings.description: A military tactician for the Olderion Federation. He was given a great many books on magic as a young child, as their were high expectations of him being of the Wardens of the Waters. Raised in isolation from other children his age, he took a deep interest instead in the people he read about in books. Among these characters, he took particular interest in a legendary female warrior from an army of darkness.
strings.evolution:
For Elle and Luka's sake as well,
I must keep facing forward.
That, I have sworn to.
strings.fusion:
Visions...
The power written of in books of old.
When might it ever become reality?

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
It would be a good idea to use this
opportunity to try out a new style of fighting.
strings.fusion:
When using equipment to its maximum,
I think one wouldn't be wrong to refer to
Rain and Lasswell's fighting styles.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon: Your equipment determines your style of fighting. I will need to try out some new strategies.
strings.evolution: I now grasp the characteristics of this equipment. Now, how might I make best use of them.
strings.fusion:
Read your opponent and attack their weak point.
Even the strongest of monsters can
be taken down if proper measures are taken.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Both making use of one's equipment and
the act of killing are up to the user.
Of course, I shall make use of this.
strings.evolution:
...I see.
By doing this, we're able to draw
out the latent power in this equipment.
strings.fusion:
Thanks to this equipment
I have more strategic range.

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado, who grew from a kid toying with machines in her parents' workshop to the finest engineer in the Industrial City. Lid is determined to inherit the name Cid, an honor granted only to the greatest in her trade. Her only serious flaw seems to be her love of money.
strings.fusion:
All right!
Now I can collect even more gil!
Wait, whaddaya mean this has
nothing to do with that!?

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado. Lid had an interest in machinery from childhood, but it wasn't until her older brother began showing her the ropes (and gears) that her aptitude blossomed into real talent. Her most treasured possession is her robot chocobo named Mechabo, which she and her brother built together. She became even more attached to Mechabo when her brother left home.
strings.evolution:
I'm gonna be better than him,
and I'll do it my way, see?
I'll make it so that anyone
can fly in an airship!
strings.fusion:
When you're having a tough time,
do you look down at your feet,
or up to the skies?

strings.description: An airship engineer who is paving the way to a new era. Unfortunately for Lid, her older brother was the one to inherit the Cid name she so coveted, after he left home. Regardless, she single-handedly renovated the desolate workshop her brother had abandoned, using the first Cid and his philosophy of freedom as her inspiration. Lid now seeks to become the embodiment of her hero as she travels with Rain.
strings.evolution:
I'll be the one to
inherit the Cid name.
I feel like I've gotta
take care of it, now!
strings.fusion: I'm gonna build an airship that everyone can ride, no matter who they are or where they come from! You got a problem with that?

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
I bet I could get a load of money for
such rare equipment as this, err...
I-I'm just kidding, really!
strings.fusion:
With my hammer,
I will blow all our enemies away!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
It's different from what I usually wear,
but it fits me pretty well, don't you think?
strings.evolution:
Ah, I got it!
Now I should go and fight, yeah?
strings.fusion:
I wonder how this equipment was put together?
There's so much to research!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Pretty cool equipment, eh?
I wish I could do up my
mechabo to match.
strings.evolution:
Yeah, that's it!
I feel like I can take on
any kind of monster now!
strings.fusion:
Fixing machines and repairing equipment
are quite different, however...
This is still fun for what it is!

strings.description: A mage Rain and his companions met in Zoldaad. Sakura's childlike appearance hides the fact that she is well over 700 years old, as well as the main leader behind the founding of Mysidia. Her age shows in her dignified manner of speaking, and she has earned the respect of all the mages in the nation for her incredible magical prowess. Curiously, her true identity remains a mystery to those around her.
strings.fusion:
Oh, my power is coming back.
It would be nice to get some exercise
after so long.

strings.description: The mage who founded Mysidia. Although Sakura maintains the physical appearance of a young girl despite being more than 700 years old, she trained the mages of the nation she established whilst attempting to protect the world from the shadows by foiling the plans of the many Veritas. Even more intriguing, she also seems to share a close relationship with Sir Raegen, Rain's father. Believing that Rain and his friends are destined to save the world, she has taken it upon herself to act as their guardian.
strings.evolution:
It's been a long time
since I lost my power.
It seems to be coming back, now.
strings.fusion:
So I am to be strengthened by
the power of these visions....
How times have changed.

strings.description: A mage originating from Paladia who was witness to the war between Aldore and Hess more than 700 years past. Sakura once donned the armor that earned her the name of Veritas of the Bolt seeking to return to her home world. However, in time she learned to make her peace with the people of Lapis by living among them, and now opposes the ambitions of the other Veritas.
strings.evolution:
With all this power flowing out of me...
I can remember my time as a warrior.
strings.fusion:
I won't use this power to fight,
but to protect you all.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Whaddya think?
Lookin' pretty darn good, aren't I?
strings.fusion: There appear to be monsters never before seen in the Farplane.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
I'll support ya with this new armor and
weaponry I got from the Farplane!
strings.evolution:
I feel like I can move again.
It's like my senses have returned to me.
strings.fusion:
Oh, how the power is flowing through me!
Seems even I can still grow!

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
This equipment is tough...and strong.
I'm feelin' quite nostalgic, actually...
strings.evolution:
You'd best leave it to me!
Ain't none better at gettin' the
most out of their equipment than me!
strings.fusion: Being able to make good use of any equipment is the mark of a top-class soldier.

strings.description: The leader of the rebel army opposing the Zoldaad Empire. A lighthearted man by nature, Jake is even more easily swayed by women than Rain. However, he hides a fierce resolution within to protect those who suffer from oppression. When Jake first met Rain and his comrades, he made use of his sly and cunning to manipulate them into doing his bidding. These resourceful qualities, among others, are what make him such an efficient leader.
strings.fusion:
Look how manly I've become!
Try not to fall in love with me, now.

strings.description: The man leading the people of the rebel army fighting against the oppressive Zoldaad Empire. Jake is a well seasoned warrior who used Rain and his companions to his own ends, albeit without any malice behind his motives. Always seeking to aid the defenseless, he is rarely apologetic about the soft spot he has developed for the ladies.
strings.evolution:
To be able to grow even at this age
must mean I still have potential.
I'll be even more charming now.
strings.fusion:
Okay, okay.
I'm stronger, just how you wanted.

strings.description: A man who befriended Rain and his companions whilst opposing the oppressive Zoldaad Empire. Jake always defends the little people and stands by what is righteous, condemning the powerful who prey upon the weak. He never fails to defend any ladies in his presence, and treats Rain and Lasswell as if they were his own children. Occasionally, he will also impart some words of wisdom befitting his age.
strings.evolution:
Not only have I grown more charming,
but I've even obtained new strength.
I guess it's because I'm so darn hot!
strings.fusion:
So this is the power to protect.
Though I'm sure if I misuse it,
someone will get burned.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
Well?
I don't look too bad, do I?
strings.fusion:
Equipment of the Farplane
has refreshed my charm.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon:
It should be a crime to look so good
in literally everything I wear.
strings.evolution:
I see.
I've gotten the hang of this.
strings.fusion: At my age I've only developed half as much as I ever will. To good men, there are no such things as limits.

strings.description: NA (Monster Hunter)
strings.summon: I'll show 'em the charm of a man equipped with both strength and grace.
strings.evolution:
That's it.
As strong as I've become, I should
be able to protect some of the ladies.
strings.fusion: Good equipment should be used by a good man like me, don't you think?

strings.description: A warrior who once defended Grandshelt. Rizer lived long ago, when many nations clashed for control of the crystals. Though his natural talent in battle was modest, the ardent desire to protect his nation raised him above his peers, eventually winning him command of an army. He is said to have fought bravely and tirelessly until the very end.
strings.summon:
Has the fighting begun...again?
I may not be very skilled,
but I'll lend you a hand anyway.
strings.fusion:
Newfound powers...?
Yes...my strength grows.
I shall protect you like never before.

strings.description: A warrior who once protected Grandshelt. Rizer fought until the very end to protect his homeland from an invading army that sought to claim its crystal. Now he fights to defend the cause of whoever summons him forth—the unwavering will he possessed while living still burning strong even after he became but a vision.
strings.summon:
No matter how much time passes,
the fighting never stops.
If I can be of any help, I'll fight by your side as a warrior of Grandshelt.
strings.evolution:
What's this feeling!?
I'm overflowing with power...
I see. I have become stronger.
strings.affinity: It seems like we've experienced a lot together, through all our battles. Let's continue fighting side by side.
strings.fusion:
Still my power grows...
I never felt anything like this when I lived. I will be a stronger ally than ever before.

strings.description: In ancient times, when nations battled each other for the power of the crystals, Leah used her abilities as a white mage to heal the wounded regardless of status or country of origin. Those she had treated were heartbroken when, while tending to one of her patients, she was felled by a stray arrow.
strings.summon:
If you need my help, you shall have it.
The job of a white mage is to heal the wounded, regardless of who they are.
strings.fusion:
Soothing magicks well up within me.
I will be able to aid you more than ever.

strings.description: A white mage who healed the wounded—friend and foe alike—during the war for the crystals. Leah's sole desire was to ease suffering, and the gratitude in the hearts of those she treated remained strong long after her death. As a vision, she continues to use her powers to relieve this troubled world of its pain.
strings.summon:
Did you summon me?
If anyone here needs treatment,
I'll make sure to heal them.
strings.evolution:
Is my magic...more potent?
It would seem my skills in sorcery have grown.
strings.affinity: Together we've experienced many battles. I'm happy to know that you trust me and consider me your companion.
strings.fusion:
I want to heal all your wounds,
and this power will allow me to do just that.

strings.description: A black mage who secluded himself in an enchanted forest, avoiding all human contact and devoting himself to magical research. His thirst for knowledge and insistent shunning of others eventually transformed his earnest studies into a quest for power. Ultimately, Tronn failed to control the magic he had learned, which tragically cost him his life.
strings.summon:
Am I...? This body...
I must be a legendary vision now.
If you are in need of my magic,
feel free to use it.
strings.fusion:
Is this a new form of magic?
It seems my powers have been enhanced.
Best use them wisely.

strings.description: A black mage who conducted magical research in an enchanted forest. Tronn's eschewal of human contact in favor of such work slowly drew him to the dark side of magic, to which he ultimately lost his life. His uncompromising thirst for arcane knowledge lives on as a vision that can, at last, control the dark powers he so coveted in life.
strings.summon:
I have indeed returned as a vision.
As a researcher of magic,
I find this puzzling, but...
Anyway, use my magic wisely.
strings.evolution:
Well, this is interesting.
I seem to have awakened as a mage. The body of a vision is quite the marvel.
strings.affinity:
We've had a long association.
I've learned many things thanks to you. Here is a token of my appreciation.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm... Is this new power I feel?
This must be how visions grow stronger.

strings.description: A noble thief who only stole from villains. Eldin took in a band of hopeless thieves as his subordinates, and had the support of the common people. However, his group was persecuted after one of its members committed a grave crime, for which Eldin paid with his life. He never lived to see the peaceful world he dreamed of.
strings.summon:
Yes? Well, I don't really understand,
but you need my help, right?
I'm an ally to those in need!
strings.fusion:
What's this? I'm feeling pretty good today!
Like I'm just bursting with power!

strings.description: A noble thief who led a band of ruffians. Eldin and his thieves stole from the rich, and shared their plunder with the masses. His dream was to live in a world where all people were equal, with no social classes dividing them. Though he was tragically assassinated before this dream could be realized, his vision now lives on to carry out his will.
strings.summon:
You want me to lend you a hand?
No problem!
I'm the defender of the defenseless,
the noble thief Eldin!
strings.evolution:
Huh? My mind feels clear,
and I can move faster than before!
Awakening as a vision is amazing!
strings.affinity: We've been together for quite some time now, haven't we? I hope we can continue as boon companions.
strings.fusion:
I can feel power flowing from within.
Looks like I got stronger again.
What a weird body, eh?

strings.description: A monk who trained in the mountains. Completely indifferent to the war, Baurg's only goal was to grow stronger. However, he lost this detachment, and indeed all self-control, when his village was razed, and he entered the war, using his training to vent his burning rage. Ultimately, though, he realized that all his fighting was meaningless, and vanished back into the mountains.
strings.summon:
Was I...summoned here?
Since you have called me forth,
these fists shall fight for you.
strings.fusion:
What's this?
Energy flows into my chakras!
Yes, it seems I've grown stronger somehow.

strings.description: A monk who sought only strength of body and mind, until the war from which he had sworn to isolate himself threatened the village he once called home. Baurg's inability to save his people, even after his years of training, left him with a heart full of regrets at his death. As a vision, he now seeks to use the power he holds—in his heart as much as his fists—to fight for justice.
strings.summon:
My memories outlived my death?
Fate must have helped you summon me.
My fists shall serve to protect you.
strings.evolution: Oh...! I can feel my chakras have reached the next stage. So this is what they call an awakening!
strings.affinity:
You have fought many battles.
I shall not forget your trust in me.
I shall keep training, so let us continue fighting together.
strings.fusion:
I can feel power filling every inch
of this ephemeral body.
I have grown stronger indeed.

strings.description: A native of Grandshelt before the kingdom was established. Gimlee belonged to a hunting tribe that was dispossessed of its lands by the people of the Grandshelt Kingdom, who were skilled in using the power of the crystals to their advantage. A proud warrior, he fought to the bitter end, out of hatred for the Crown. Ironically, as a vision, he now fights for Rain, a knight of the Grandshelt Kingdom.
strings.summon:
I'm a hunter of the land your kingdom stole.
Now I'm going to help you... The irony is too cruel.
strings.fusion:
Heh... I can see it all...
The movements of my prey,
the flow of the wind...
My powers grow, it seems.

strings.description: A hunter belonging to a tribe that once inhabited lands now annexed to the Grandshelt Kingdom. Gimlee lost many comrades in the war against the invaders and their ability to manipulate the crystals. Unable to come to terms with the loss of his friends and homeland, he tragically took his own life. His will now lives on as a vision, ironically fighting alongside the knights of the very monarchy he so despised.
strings.summon:
I fought against your kingdom once,
but the past cannot be changed.
I'll lend you my skills as a hunter.
strings.evolution: I can feel the flow of the earth like never before... It looks like a new power in me has been awakened.
strings.affinity:
We've fought together for a while.
The resentment I once held for you
has turned into trust.
strings.fusion:
My arrows fly ever more true...
It seems that training isn't the only way that visions can grow stronger.

strings.description: A gunman from the age of pioneers. Maxell was a protector of the weak and wounded, who faced harsh conditions throughout their journey. Unfortunately, his band's numbers dwindled as the expedition pressed on, and the survivors eventually turned to banditry out of desperation. Maxell challenged his erstwhile companions, losing his life in the process.
strings.summon:
I never miss a target...
That's the way of a desert gunman like me. I may be a little wild, but be nice to me, will ya?
strings.fusion:
Oho...now that was a surprise.
I can feel power coming up inside... Being a vision is a heck of a thing.

strings.description: A gunman from the age of pioneers who protected explorers from roving beasts and ruffians. Maxell ventured into a den of thieves to protect his comrades, but was outnumbered and overwhelmed, ultimately paying with his life. His desire to serve as the shield of the weak and vulnerable now lives on as a vision that defends others.
strings.summon: If you called on me 'cause you need a hand, you can rest easy... I'm not the type to let you down. You can count on me!
strings.evolution:
Oh, I can see! I can see!
It's like my bad eye works again!
I'll never miss a shot now!
strings.affinity:
We've stuck by each other for this long.
Slinging guns may be all I'm good for, but you trusted me, and I'm grateful.
strings.fusion:
Heh...
This is some kind of body!
Just think, I can grow stronger without hurting others...

strings.description: A bard who made her living singing of legends and heroes. Liza's beautiful voice, and the graceful playing of her harp, served to comfort and inspire the common folk. Eventually, however, she drew the ire of a beast whose acts she had recounted in song, and lost her voice to a curse it placed on her. Bereft of her true gift and livelihood, Liza vanished, never to be seen again.
strings.summon:
Huh? Have I...come back to life?
A vision? A summoning, you say?
Well, I guess I don't really mind as long as I can siiing! ♫
strings.fusion:
There's a song on my lips...
I think my voice got stronger!
I want to share this refrain with everyone!

strings.description: A beautiful bard who earned her daily bread traveling the world, singing of legendary beasts and the heroes who vanquished them. Liza fell into deep despair after losing her voice to the curse of a vengeful creature of whom she had sung, and cast her life away by drowning herself in a lake. Though she died full of regrets, as a vision she can once again sing to her heart's content.
strings.summon:
So you were the one who summoned me!
I can sing again... I'm so happy!
I'm sure my songs will be of help!
strings.evolution:
This power is strange...
It's as if it were awakening me.
Yes, this is a song from the soul!
I'll play a tune on the harp to celebrate!
strings.affinity:
How long we've traveled together.
I do hope you've found my singing useful, ha ha. Let's keep looking after each other!
strings.fusion:
A song springs from deep within my heart.
My soul aches to sing to the people!
My melodies have taken on new powers!

strings.description: A swordsman who wielded a katana, a blade crafted by master smiths of times gone by. Shiki served his master honorably, following the path of Bushido to cultivate both body and spirit. However, this rigid philosophy waned in popularity over the years, eventually leading to his master's deposition. With no intention of serving a new lord, Shiki vanished from sight.
strings.summon: I hastened here with my katana to answer your call. My blade is yours.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm, this power...
Use it or lose it, I suppose.

strings.description: A swordsman who wielded a katana, a blade crafted by master smiths of times gone by. The Bushido skills exhibited by warriors like Shiki were as efficient, if not more so, than the sword fighting techniques of today. Their quick, adaptable fighting style made them experts at crippling their foes. Yet, during Shiki's own lifetime, people began to regard the katana as an outdated weapon. In the end, Shiki chose to follow the lord he had loyally served into the next world, by honorably ending his own life.
strings.summon:
Were you the one who summoned me?
I swear to dedicate my very soul to the battle to come.
strings.evolution: Oh...! It's as if light has found me in the shadows! I seem to have taken another great step forward.
strings.affinity:
Many are the times we have fought together.
Those glorious battles have earned you my loyalty, master.
strings.fusion:
Being a vision is intriguing.
To think that after all my training, there was still power to be gained.

strings.description: A specialist in green magic, a school of magic developed for the purpose of aiding allies on the battlefield. A cold-hearted type, indoctrinated in magic study from an early age, Mizell made up for his lack of human empathy with an inherent aptitude for supportive magic. He saved the lives of many soldiers during the war, but was never moved by their words of gratitude.
strings.summon:
I am a mage built for battle.
If you need me to fight for you,
then consider me your pawn.
strings.fusion:
New magical energy detected.
A certain level of power augmentation has been confirmed.

strings.description: A green mage who specialized in supportive magic. As an orphan, Mizell was adopted and educated in magic as part of his nation's war strategy. His emotional detachment kept him calm and collected, but prevented him from grasping the real value of human life, even after saving countless soldiers on the battlefield. Curiously enough, he ultimately died by sacrificing himself, though it is rumored he did not shed a single tear.
strings.summon: I am a mage built to support my comrades in battle. Think of me as your pawn and use me wisely.
strings.evolution:
This is... I see.
I have been endowed with new power.
I must have become a stronger vessel for magic.
strings.affinity: Fighting with you has made me feel something that I never felt while I was alive... It must be what they call trust.
strings.fusion:
Another increase in magical energy confirmed.
This presents a possibility of further growth...even for me.

strings.description: A warrior who mastered both magic and the sword. Ronaldo's people had developed practices that enhanced their magical powers, the secrecy of which had led them, long prior, to take vows of silence. Unfortunately, their insistence on eschewing all contact with their neighbors, to protect the secrets of their spellblades, eventually led to the nation's ruin, its name lost to history forever.
strings.summon:
Talking isn't always necessary.
I just follow orders.
strings.fusion: Power...I have gained.

strings.description: A warrior who excelled in both magic and swordsmanship. Ronaldo's small nation strictly prohibited contact with any others, which allowed him to focus solely on heightening the spiritual power required to master these dual arts. Though he dedicated his life to protecting his people, the strong curiosity he secretly felt for the outside world has brought him back as a vision.
strings.summon: To think these eyes would see a new world after my death...
strings.evolution:
An awakening...
Power...
I've gained power...
strings.affinity:
In our days fighting together...
Many words have been left unsaid...
And I meant every one of them.
strings.fusion: Yet more...power.

strings.description: An alchemist who created various concoctions to ease others' pain, or even, at times, to do battle with. Born a simple village girl, Mel began learning her trade from an alchemist who took her in after a virulent plague had claimed her family. Timid in nature, she strongly disliked fighting and instead devoted her life to finding ways she could help others with her potions and salves.
strings.summon:
Wait! What?
Did I come back to life?
Visions are pretty interesting...
strings.fusion:
I don't know how, but I feel like my
alchemy skills just got better!

strings.description: A girl who fought with an assemblage of self-made potions and salves. After losing her family to an epidemic, the once-shy Mel began learning about medicine and illnesses from an alchemist. When a new sickness eventually broke out, she used her own body to test the antibiotics she had developed to fight it, and in doing so, sacrificed her life. Mel's antidote would ultimately save the lives of countless people.
strings.summon:
Ummm, I fight with alchemy!
I can treat anything from injuries to poison, so just leave it to me!
strings.evolution:
Ummm, uhhh...
I came up with a new type of medicine!
strings.affinity: We've been in so many battles together. Thinking about it now, we've really come a long way. I'm glad you trust me!
strings.fusion:
Heh! Looks like it's finally time to break
out the concoctions I've been saving!

strings.description: A hero who defeated a cruel despot to become king of a nation. Clyne was a brave knight and army commander who earned the loyalty and love of his people. However, he knew little of government, and proved ill-equipped to navigate the politics that entangle such high office. He eventually lost his life under suspicious circumstances, amidst a conspiracy involving succession to the throne.
strings.summon:
I was called a warrior-king once...
However, I am now a mere knight under your command.
strings.fusion:
My blade feels stronger...
This energy feels equivalent to actual experience.

strings.description: A knight who became king of a great nation. Clyne was a hero who earned the admiration and loyalty of his people, but had little knowledge of how to rule them, and was eventually killed by his own son in a plot for succession. He died with a deep sense of regret, but his spirit now enjoys the freedom of fighting as a vision.
strings.summon: The title of warrior-king is far behind me. Though my current state may be temporary, this time I shall wield my sword for justice.
strings.evolution:
So this is an awakening.
This must be how the power of visions develops further.
strings.affinity:
For a long time, now, have I joined your battles.
I thought you would lord it over me, but...it would seem I misjudged you.
strings.fusion:
Can I grow stronger still?
There can be no greater joy for a man of war.

strings.description: Known primarily as mages, red mages like Anzelm were in fact trained in both magic and combat. Though derided as an eccentric by his peers, Anzelm was a proud warrior, and a veteran of many battles in the course of his journeys. He never pledged allegiance to any one entity, but instead used sword and sorcery to help the common folk, who revered him as one of their heroes.
strings.summon:
You summoned me here?
Heh, I think I like you.
Well, I'm in your hands now.
strings.fusion:
Hah, this is great!
You can skip all your training
and still reap all the benefits!

strings.description: A warrior versed in both magic and swordplay, Anzelm's dual talents allowed him to fight effectively on his own, which is perhaps one reason he chose to spend his life as a wanderer, free of attachments. He was considered a hero by the people he had saved, though he was too humble to care for such plaudits. Today, his vision fights as he once did, unfettered by obligation or convention.
strings.summon:
You called, so here I am.
Some people think I'm a half-wit, but stick a wand in my hand, or a sword, and you'll see what I can do!
strings.evolution:
How strange.
The world looks different all of a sudden. It seems my power has grown.
strings.affinity:
Heh heh, have you noticed?
I've fought by your side quite a few times now. That must mean you trust me, right? I'm glad!
strings.fusion:
I can feel power flowing into my blade.
Being a vision sure is fun!

strings.description: A hunter who once lived in the forest. Luna's beauty and infallible accuracy with the bow led many to believe she was actually a wood spirit. In truth, she had been abandoned in the forest as a child and raised by a hermit, who taught her how to hunt. Not accustomed to human speech, her inability to communicate only added to her exotic mystique.
strings.summon:
Luna feel calling...
Luna use bow.
Go with you okay?
strings.fusion:
Luna...get power?
Luna...get strength?

strings.description: A girl of the forest, once believed to be a wood spirit, who fought with a bow. Luna's strangeness was alluring to those in the world outside, and though her pure heart feared what lay beyond the forest, she was equally as curious about them. Having spent her whole life in the woods, her spirit now travels the globe as a vision, finally free to indulge her unbounded curiosity.
strings.summon:
You...call me?
Luna want know outside forest.
Go with you...okay?
strings.evolution:
See... Hear...
Wind voice, forest voice...
Strength...grow.
strings.affinity:
Luna happy.
You with Luna, many, many fight.
And from now, too...you with Luna good.
strings.fusion:
This power, Luna know...
Luna stronger than before.

strings.description: A warrior from a small tribe that existed long ago and was proficient in both sword and sorcery. Bedile was a stoic man who shared a vow of silence with his comrades regarding the ways of the mystic sword. As fate would have it, though, one day he fell in love with a foreign woman he had saved, and was banished from his home. His once-proud tribe now but a memory, all that remains is the legend of Bedile, protecting his love until the end.
strings.summon:
I'm a disgraced mystic knight.
If, knowing this, you still want my help...then I shall go with you.
strings.fusion:
My mystic sword blade grows stronger.
Being a vision is curious indeed.

strings.description: A warrior who mastered sorcery and the sword. Bedile broke the vow of silence that granted him heightened spiritual powers, and was banished by his tribe after violating its law against mingling with outsiders. He eventually took his foreign love as his wife, and protected the family they built together till the end of his days.
strings.summon:
I am a mystic knight...and oathbreaker.
If you indeed have some use for me...
I shall join you on the battlefield.
strings.evolution:
I can feel my spirit rising.
My magic, and my blade as well...
I seem to have reached a higher plane of existence...
strings.affinity:
You took me along on many battles.
Can I take pride...in this symbol of our trust?
strings.fusion:
Yet again I gain power.
This is unlike any sensation I knew when I was alive...

strings.description: A dark knight with arcane powers. Duane was a loyal knight, in service of a certain country, who had reached an impasse in his training. Wanting to grow further as a swordsman, Duane turned to the art of the dark blade at the suggestion of a superior. Afterwards, he was proud to have reached a level of skill to match that of his comrades, yet he was cast out by them upon his return, on the grounds that use of dark magic was unbefitting of a knight.
strings.summon:
This voice calling to me...
You are not evil, are you.
If you need my help, have it.
strings.fusion: The darkness...shall be my power.

strings.description: A dark knight with arcane powers who wielded a blade infused with magic. Duane learned dark magic upon the advice of a superior, only to be shunned and feared by his peers for his newfound powers. Though he had sought only to grow stronger, the rejection he faced after acquiring these abilities was enough to twist his mind. He was ultimately banished from the country for slaying several of his erstwhile comrades.
strings.summon:
In my blade is the power of darkness...
If you have no qualms about it,
then let us fight together.
strings.evolution:
Argh...
I remember this pain.
My dark power is growing.
strings.fusion: A darkness so dense that it sharpens my blade...

strings.description: A knight who wields a blade of dark power. Though Duane, as a vision, can now control his prodigious powers, the envy and malice of his comrades that he endured in life have left scars on his psyche. Once pure of heart and mind, his grief deepened to such an extent that he eventually took his own life. His spirit now wanders the world as a vision, seeking to make amends.
strings.summon:
I heard you call from the darkness.
If you do not fear my arcane powers, then I shall fight with you.
strings.evolution:
Pain is unavoidable, when handling
the powers of darkness...
But there's no need to worry.
I have this under control.
strings.fusion:
O darkness, where no light may fall...
Give unto me your power!

strings.description: A green mage, born in a certain country that sought to produce mages for the sole purpose of assisting in battle. Cerius was an orphan, educated and trained by the state in magic, to the exclusion of all else—which led her to grow somewhat indifferent toward people. Yet she was a keen observer of the world around her, and so never became void of empathy, unlike her desensitized fellow green mages. She later fled the country, but no record of her reasons for doing so remains.
strings.summon:
I'm a supportive magic expert.
You called me here,
so I'll aid you however I can.
strings.fusion:
You don't say...
So augmenting one's magic can be done
without the aid of others...

strings.description: A mage proficient in supportive magic. Trained as a green mage, Cerius was a mere tool of the state in its machine of war, until she grew suspicious of her environment and fled her homeland. Her long-suppressed emotions came to flourish during her travels, and she eventually found purpose in life. She chose to no longer participate in the wars of men, but instead to aid warriors doing battle against fearsome monsters.
strings.summon:
Huh? I've been revived?
But it seems to be temporary.
Well, I'll still do whatever I can.
strings.evolution:
Is this what an awakening feels like?
I feel as if my magic has risen to a whole new level.
strings.fusion:
What a pleasant sensation.
If all goes well,
I will grow stronger still.

strings.description: A green mage raised to be a master of supportive magic. Originally an orphan and turned into a resource of war, Cerius eventually fled her homeland to spend her days as a hunter of monsters. Cerius thrived in her second life and many came to depend on her aid, but inevitably the powers she had escaped caught word of her whereabouts, and she was assassinated. Too short-lived was her happiness, and her grief has brought her back to this world as a vision.
strings.summon:
I think our meeting was fated.
I hope I can be of some help,
even if only temporarily.
strings.evolution:
I guess this is...an awakening?
The difference in power is definitely surprising.
strings.affinity:
We've joined forces how many times?
I know this feeling...
This feeling in my chest.
This is what people call trust.
strings.fusion:
Humans are greedy creatures.
Give them a little power
and they only want more.

strings.description: A green mage and an orphan raised exclusively for the purpose of assisting in war. Cerius later fled her homeland and found her life purpose as a hunter of monsters. Unfortunately, her happiness was short-lived. She was assassinated by killers dispatched from her homeland after they found out about her escape. Having returned as a vision, Cerius can leave behind her tragic past and continue to help others.
strings.summon:
I feel that I was able to return
thanks to all of the people I have met.
I will use my power for you, too.
strings.evolution:
My magical powers have grown exponentially...
This must be what you call an awakening.
strings.affinity:
We've joined forces how many times?
I know this feeling...
This feeling in my chest.
This is what people call trust.
strings.fusion:
There are people who need saving.
I must get stronger so that
I can aid those who need it.

strings.description: A white magic practitioner with an otherworldly aura. Like her father, Roselia was born and raised in the community of white mages that would eventually become Mysidia. Rather than any noble intentions, she practiced her art for the simple, practical reason that healing was her forte.
strings.summon:
I...I thought I was dead.
Oh, I see. You used a magic spell.
I may as well join you so I can learn about it.
strings.fusion:
I want to push the limits of magic even further.
Perhaps that's what this power is for?

strings.description: A white magic expert born into the community of researchers that would one day become Mysidia. Roselia immersed herself in magical research simply because she was good at it. However, when a plague struck and she was unable to cure her fellow researchers, she became profoundly aware of her limitations.
strings.summon:
Are you the one who summoned me?
You need my healing magic?
I shall do as you ask.
strings.evolution: My strength has grown exponentially. So this is what it's like for a vision to awaken. Interesting.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm. My magic powers grow...
It seems that visions do not require training to gain strength...

strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. Due to her father's influence, she never developed a healer's compassion and was interested only in research for its own sake. Only as she succumbed to the plague ravaging her homeland did she begin to regret her unfeeling approach to white magic, so she carries that regret beyond death, as a vision.
strings.summon:
I was only a researcher of magic.
But now, I am your ally.
Show me your wounded, and I will heal them.
strings.evolution:
I am definitely different now.
Stronger down to the core.
This is incredible!
strings.affinity: You and I have fought many battles together. I want to heal you and protect you...from the bottom of my heart.
strings.fusion: If I had been this powerful while I was alive, I could have saved so many...

strings.description: A gunman who wielded state-of-the-art firearms of his own invention. Driven by the desire to create a weapon that could empower the weak against both swords and magic, Medius was as accomplished a researcher as he was a marksman. However, as his inventions were ahead of their time, he was seen as a threat by the powers that be, and forced to become a fugitive.
strings.summon:
You're the one who woke me up!?
I had thought that in death, maybe I could finally do my research in peace. So be it; I suppose I'll join you.
strings.fusion:
What's this?
My guns feel light in my hands.
Have I grown stronger?

strings.description: An inventor of guns from a time before their proliferation. Medius was lauded as a hero who granted strength to the weak and defenseless. He thus incurred the ire of the powerful elite, who feared this unknown power in the hands of their subjects. Living on the run, Medius became an expert gunman as a means of self-defense.
strings.summon:
You're after my guns, huh?
Oh, I see. In your time, gunners are no longer uncommon.
strings.evolution:
Look! I've upgraded my guns!
They have even more stopping power now.
strings.fusion:
I like guns because they can make anyone powerful.
Just don't forget your target practice.

strings.description: An inventor of guns, who spread and promoted their use. Medius was a hero among his people, whom he equipped to fight beasts and ruffians. However, the authorities viewed him as a threat, and his life ended in a hail of bullets fired from his own creations. Medius lives on as a vision, and in him, his love for his people.
strings.summon: You're quite strange, summoning a gunner. But you made the right choice with me. Nobody stands a chance against my guns!
strings.evolution:
Heh heh heh...
Thanks to this awakening, my guns, my masterpieces, are complete!
strings.affinity:
You really depend on my guns?
Well, we've been fighting side by side for a long time...partner.
strings.fusion:
Eureka!
It's like my mind is filled with ideas for new guns!

strings.description: An inventor of guns, who devoted his life to promoting their use as a means for the underprivileged to stand up against the powerful elite. As such, he was deemed a threat by the authorities and was hunted down. Even after death, Medius was remembered for a long time as a hero among his people. As a vision, he is able to continue honing his marksmanship to help the weak.
strings.summon:
You would call me a hero?
I guess I could see that.
I am an ace gunner, after all!
strings.evolution:
Wow!
I can shoot so fast and accurately now...
This is truly remarkable!
strings.affinity:
You really depend on my guns?
Well, we've been fighting side by side for a long time...partner.
strings.fusion:
It's not the new gun that makes the difference.
It's the daily training that makes
you stronger and more wonderful.

strings.description: A dancer bound in service to an ancient palace. Sarai's performances mesmerized both royalty and commoners, yet she was simply a girl who loved to dance. As her popularity increased, a struggle began over her ownership. In the midst of it, she disappeared, and was eventually forgotten—as indeed was the kingdom she had lived in.
strings.summon:
You want my help?
Tee hee...
Okay, but please stop staring!
strings.fusion:
Tee hee...my body feels so light!
Allow me to enchant you with my footwork.

strings.description: Long ago, there was a dancer who performed in a palace in the middle of a desert. Her dancing inspired bravery in her audience, which included all ranks of society. This gift became a curse, when a nobleman thus emboldened decided to abduct her. Unable to perform for the masses while in captivity, she died of a broken heart.
strings.summon:
You want to see me dance, don't you!
I'm flattered...
I'll dance for you until my feet fall off!
strings.evolution:
How do you like my new costume?
My dancing has improved too. Just watch!
strings.affinity: Now that I'm with you, dancing is such a joy. Can I dance for you forever?
strings.fusion:
I feel so alive!
More! I must dance more!

strings.description: A young girl who began studying magic as a means to overcome her introverted nature. Ironically, she was only further alienated from others as her skills with black magic blossomed. Though compassionate at her core, she is ruthless in combat, determined to prove the value of what she paid for with loneliness.
strings.summon:
Uhhh... Well...
If you don't mind having me, I'll join your side.
strings.fusion: D-do you think I can be of any use now?

strings.description: A young girl who began studying magic in order to overcome her shyness. However, as she evolved into a black mage with powers surpassing even her master's, she found it only more difficult to relate to others. As a result, she is overzealous in combat, that she might prove herself worthy to her companions on the battlefield.
strings.summon:
Uhhh... All I'm good at is magic.
But if it helps you, I'm happy!
strings.evolution: I feel slightly more...confident.
strings.affinity: You never left me out, even though I'm so gloomy. That makes me...happy.
strings.fusion:
You made me stronger.
Now I'll try even harder on the battlefield!

strings.description: A martial artist who traveled the world with nothing but the clothes on his back. Through learning the techniques of the countless opponents he felled, Kenyu developed a martial art known as karate. Sadly, when he perished during his journey towards perfection, so too perished the art form he embodied.
strings.summon:
The power I was searching for...
Now I have the chance to seek it again.
strings.fusion:
Hi-yah!
What an exhilarating workout!

strings.description: A martial artist who wandered from town to town, challenging others to hand-to-hand combat. He was the creator of karate, a martial art that emphasized style and civility. Kenyu's choice to defend the weak worried some unscrupulous authorities, who eventually saw to it that he met a violent death.
strings.summon: I am thankful for this second opportunity to seek my path. I will train twice as hard this time.
strings.evolution:
A fighter's path has no end...
But it has waypoints.
And I have passed them all.
strings.affinity: Because you summoned me, I've been able to focus on my martial arts again. For that, I thank you.
strings.fusion:
Hi-yah!
Finally I have the power to pursue my chosen path!

strings.description: A rough, tough pirate who sailed from sea to sea, looting and plundering. Violent—terribly violent—yet not maniacally so, Ollie had a soft side and never laid a hand on women or children. He and his clan were feared as the scourge of the seas, but as they would trade and sell their booty in faraway regions, they are now remembered as transporters of culture.
strings.summon: Don't know what happened, but it looks like I'm back from the dead! Now show me what you're made of!
strings.fusion:
Yah hah har!
Aye, I can feel the energy rushin' through me bones!

strings.description: A clan of pirates once terrorized the waters of this world. Legends speak mostly of its leader's fearsome brutality. However, Ollie is also recognized for his achievements as an instrument of cultural exchange, for nobody was as well-traveled as he. Yet Ollie himself was interested only in wielding power over others.
strings.summon:
Gyar har har!
You've got guts, summonin' a murderin' rogue like me!
I like ye!
strings.evolution:
Ha-har!
Me weapon and me body both, bigger and stronger have they grown!
strings.affinity: By thunder, the buckles we've swashed, you and me! If we should turn to cannibalism, I'll eat ye last.
strings.fusion:
Ho ho ho!
Look how big me muscles are gettin'!

strings.description: A researcher of mechanical weapons from the town that would become Dilmagia. Though the young lady's research was intended to protect herself from beastly monsters, others used Carrie's inventions to commit mass destruction. Heartbroken, Carrie destroyed her precious research to prevent further bloodshed.
strings.summon:
Will you...use my devices properly?
If so, I'll help you.
strings.fusion:
Yes, if I repair those gears...
That's funny. My mind's chock full of ideas all of a sudden!

strings.description: Hailing from the town that eventually became the industrial city Dilmagia, Carrie was once an inventor of weapons. Falling into depression after her creations were used in warfare, she burned her blueprints and dedicated the rest of her life to peaceful science. Her philosophy is one reason that Dilmagia is now a neutral region.
strings.summon: Will you...use my inventions for peace? If so, I'll give you my all.
strings.evolution:
Ah...I had a flash of inspiration!
Making this one small adjustment made my weapon so much stronger!
strings.affinity:
This journey with you has been a long one.
Thank you for broadening my horizons.
strings.fusion:
If I upgrade that part...
What a strange power.
It's injecting technological knowledge into my mind.

strings.description: In the time before dragons were enemies to her species, Skaha had a bond with them like no other. High in the air on a dragon's back, she would easily dodge her foes' attacks and strike at them with expert precision. Unfortunately, her tiny clan died out before the rise of contemporary magic and warfare.
strings.summon: You would do well to learn the fury of my dragonlance.
strings.fusion: ...May the dragons watch over me.

strings.description: In the time before dragons were enemies to her species, Skaha was notorious as the warrior who dominated the sky. However, as humans encroached on the dragons' territory and eventually declared war on all monsters, her clan dwindled into obscurity. Skaha was last seen living peacefully with her faithful partner.
strings.summon: If there is a target for my dragonlance...it will never miss.
strings.evolution:
Dragons are the strongest beasts.
With their help, I will be the strongest warrior.
strings.affinity:
You have my utmost trust.
And should you desire it, the protection of my dragon.
strings.fusion: As my dragon grows stronger, so do I.

strings.description: A globetrotter who sought treasures and relics never seen before. Though he was a widely respected archaeologist, known for his research on ancient civilizations and hidden cultures, Montana's secret fear was that his handsome, rugged appearance, together with his irresistible charisma, meant that he would never be taken seriously as a scholar.
strings.summon:
Hey, are you an adventurer too?
Sounds dangerous and exciting.
Let me help with your field research!
strings.fusion:
Hah! I feel like I'm made of cork!
I'm as light as a leaf on the breeze.
No relic will escape my grasp!

strings.description: An adventurer who traveled the world, seeking hidden relics and forbidden treasures. Montana held a certain stature in the archaeological community and kept his loot meticulously cataloged. Upon his death, however, his extensive collection of cultural assets, gathered over a lifetime, vanished, and he became the subject of legends.
strings.summon:
In the middle of an adventure, eh?
I used to be the king of adventurers! You could use a serious academic like me!
strings.evolution: Yeah, I've had some adventures. Look, you can't be a serious archaeologist without breaking a few vases, you know?
strings.affinity: You know, I've always dreamed of having an adventure like this. Thanks for making that dream come true.
strings.fusion:
Perfect!
Hidden treasures and enemy weaknesses are as plain as day to me now!

strings.description: A warrior slave who fought for the entertainment of his wealthy master. Having the mindset of a gladiator beaten into him from an early age, Russell died in the arena without ever experiencing much human emotion. Even as a vision, he exists only for the fight.
strings.summon:
...
Opponent...
Must...destroy...
strings.fusion:
Strength...
Need...more...!
Not...enough...!

strings.description: A gladiator who fought others to the death, to amuse his rich master. Bought and raised only to fight, Russell knew little of human emotions or the value of life. Now, as a vision, his only goal is to defeat the opponents who stand before him.
strings.summon:
...
Kill...all...
...opponents...
strings.evolution:
Heat...
Burning...
This...is...power!
strings.affinity:
...
You...are my...master.
I want...to keep fighting...for you...
strings.fusion:
More...
More power...
To crush my opponents...

strings.description: An expert in the ancient art of shinobi. Miyuki and her kind pledged to serve their masters loyally and exclusively. Having so devoted her life, she remembers little of the ordinary world. Extremely reticent, she has no interest in conversing about her past life.
strings.summon:
You must be my new master.
Think of me as your shadow.
A silent but deadly shadow.
strings.fusion: I will use this power to serve...

strings.description: A warrior cloaked in a magic aura she developed through years of abnormal training. That Miyuki's sword fighting technique was able to cause aberrations in her opponents' bodies was evidence of its clandestine purpose. The true nature of her kind is still densely shrouded in mystery.
strings.summon:
Someone fit to be my master...
I'll be the judge of that.
strings.evolution:
This power is so...dark.
I will make it mine!
strings.fusion:
Never stop honing your skills.
Never miss a day of training.
That is the shinobi way.

strings.description: The embodiment of stealth, shrouded in a dark aura. Miyuki's sword speaks louder than she, exuding a murderous ambience. Nothing is known about her former life, but her eyes betray a tragic absence of anything like peace or happiness.
strings.summon:
I am a shinobi.
Darkness is my ruler.
Are you prepared to use my power?
strings.evolution:
Dark waves...
Become one with my shinobi technique! Together we will serve our master!
strings.affinity:
Master, I thank you.
Because of you, my spirit is unbroken.
strings.fusion:
Yes, this is good training.
I can feel my skills sharpening.

strings.description: A bard who sang his stories to the great unwashed. In the time before airships, he played a vital role in the spread of information. However, due to his criticism of authority and the status quo, he was forced into exile.
strings.summon: Let me play you a song I call, "In This Moment."
strings.affinity: I will never forget the days we've spent singing together. My next song is dedicated to you.
strings.fusion:
This is a song...
A song about freedom!

strings.description: A bard who sang to the masses about life in faraway lands. To the common folk, Gilbert was a treasured source of information, but to those in power, he was a threat. Countless assassination attempts could not dissuade him from his calling, however, and his legacy lives on to this day.
strings.summon: When it comes to human emotions...the fundamental things apply, as time goes by. If there's a song you want to hear, I'll play it.
strings.evolution:
What's this sudden inspiration?
I truly am a wellspring of poetry!
strings.affinity: I will never forget the days we've spent singing together. My next song is dedicated to you.
strings.fusion:
My songs, my melodies...
Amazingly, they've become even more moving!

strings.description: A bard who sang the truths of the world to the masses, seeking to rescue them from tyranny with knowledge, not force. Although the authorities put a violent end to his enlightenment of the masses, the last breath he took was in song: one that filled the common folk he so loved with the will to stand up to their oppressors.
strings.summon: My songs can pierce the heart like no sword can. Swear that you'll use my power for good.
strings.evolution: The melody I needed to get my message across... It's just come to me. And it sounds great.
strings.affinity: I will never forget the days we've spent singing together. My next song is dedicated to you.
strings.fusion:
Listen to this next song...
I shall change the world with it!

strings.description: A precocious brawler, whose cheerful demeanor belied her prodigious gifts in the martial arts. She dressed in garb passed down by her ancestors, of whose line only her household remained. Though Xiao herself never spoke of it, it was believed she chose the warrior's path out of a wish to defend her heritage with her own fists.
strings.summon:
Heya!
Care to see what these flying fists can do?
strings.affinity:
You really believe in me.
Heh...thank you.
strings.fusion: Hey, I haven't even begun to fight!

strings.description: A precocious brawler whose young age belied her considerable mastery of the martial arts. Bright and cheerful, she was beloved by many. Her fighting techniques were her birthright, passed down in her family from father to son, mother to daughter, but there were those who saw them as dangerous relics of a savage age. Some believe she wore her smile as a shield to protect her people from the prejudice of the outside world, as she used her abilities to help the weak and defenseless.
strings.summon: I'm ready for a fight or two...or heck, two hundred!
strings.evolution: Now that's what I call power! I feel like a whole new me!
strings.affinity:
You really believe in me.
Heh...thank you.
strings.fusion:
You hear me?
These fists of fury are just gettin' warmed up!

strings.description: A genius martial artist who mastered the techniques of her people at a young age, and used them to defend the weak. Through her cheerful, likeable demeanor, she almost single-handedly reversed years of prejudice against the martial arts. Though her tribe has died out, those who inherited her legacy and techniques are held in high regard to this day.
strings.summon: You called me 'cause you needed a fighter, right? Well, I'm ready to rumble, tiger!
strings.evolution: I'm movin' on up! From now on, I'm gonna be totally unbeatable!
strings.affinity:
You really believe in me.
Heh...thank you.
strings.fusion:
You think this is as good as I can get?
Heh! You ain't seen nothin' yet!

strings.description: A genius martial artist who mastered the techniques of her people at a young age, and used them to defend the weak. Xiao never wanted power for herself, but to protect others, which changed how martial arts were viewed around the world. It is thanks to her that other monks around the world have come to value kindness and consideration above all else. This could be said to be Xiao's greatest achievement.
strings.summon:
One! Two! Three!
I'm pumped to be able
to be of use to you!
strings.evolution:
That's it!
Now I can truly master the martial arts!
strings.affinity:
You really believe in me.
Heh...thank you.
strings.fusion:
Oh, wow!
I guess I can grow even stronger!

strings.description: An enigmatic young lady adept with both sorcery and the sword. Rakshasa fought from the shadows in the service of numerous nations, though her own origins remained a mystery, as she never spoke about herself. Nonetheless, her formidable powers earned her the respect and fear of both allies and enemies until the day she mysteriously vanished without a trace.
strings.summon:
So you need my strength?
The years may pass,
but it would seem some things never change...
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a fruitful one. I look forward
to what is yet to come.
strings.fusion:
Hmm...
I suppose this is an improvement.

strings.description: A mysterious swordswoman with considerable skills in magic, who displayed her abilities in countless battles. Rakshasa never spoke of herself, and is remembered by history as a blade-for-hire who chose her friends and enemies by the rewards they promised her. She suddenly disappeared from the battlefield one day, however, leaving no hint as to her whereabouts.
strings.summon:
I never fought for any one cause...
But after our meeting,
I have no choice but to lend you my aid.
strings.evolution:
My blade brims with power...
I have received a divine blessing, it seems.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a fruitful one. I look forward
to what is yet to come.
strings.fusion:
My blade is sharper now.
Curious, indeed.

strings.description: An inscrutable knight, armored by secrets, who worked from the shadows as a sellsword. One day, in the midst of one of the countless battles that raged in that war-torn age, she disappeared, along with the great fortune she had made by her exploits in battle. Some claim that her true identity was that of a religious devotee, working in secret to earn the coin needed to save her temple and fellow worshippers, who served a goddess of magic and war.
strings.summon:
Very well, let us fight as one.
I cannot ignore
your earnest plea.
strings.evolution:
This feeling that I've set foot
into the unknown...
Is this what they call an awakening?
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a fruitful one. I look forward
to what is yet to come.
strings.fusion:
Hmph...
You would see me grow stronger?
As you wish...

strings.description: A red mage from the empire of Zoldaad. Ludmille's family were casualties of the war brought on by the Empire; as a result, she spent most of her childhood in an orphanage. Her tragic past caused her to grow up coveting power, which eventually motivated her to hone her skills for the purpose of joining the military forces of Zoldaad. The air of mystery she exudes always creates the impression that she is cold and distant.
strings.summon:
Regardless of their origins...
All humans hunger for power...
strings.affinity:
Our journey has been a long one.
If this is proof of your trust...
then I shall return the favor.
strings.fusion:
I...
I require more power.

strings.description: A red mage from the empire of Zoldaad who spent her childhood in an orphanage. Ludmille grew up coveting power, and thus became a red mage in service of the empire. The general in command of the empire's exclusively male military was the first to discover her talents, and attempted to reward her in accordance with her military deeds. However, for Ludmille there was no greater honor than the praise she received from the general himself.
strings.summon:
No matter what they might say,
those who seek power
all share the same philosophy.
strings.evolution:
I cannot regain what I've lost,
even if I grow more powerful...
Nonetheless, I wish to be stronger.
strings.affinity:
Our journey has been a long one.
If this is proof of your trust...
then I shall return the favor.
strings.fusion:
This is good...
After all, I only believe in power.

strings.description: A red mage from the empire of Zoldaad. When the well-decorated general of Zoldaad's military found himself without a successor, he decided to adopt Ludmille as his daughter and, thus, heiress to his position. However, just before this took place, the empire had come under the influence of a certain scientist, and a great reform of the emperor's policies soon followed. Sadly for Ludmille, this culminated in the general's discharge, causing her to lose the backing of the only person who had ever believed in her.
strings.summon:
If power is what you seek,
I shall lend you mine.
Power never disappoints.
strings.evolution:
Is this...
what lies beyond the power I craved?
strings.affinity:
Our journey has been a long one.
If this is proof of your trust...
then I shall return the favor.
strings.fusion:
Power is everything...
Power is all I have...
Because I cannot gain the trust of others.

strings.description: A knight of Grandshelt on active duty, and Rain and Lasswell's peer. Charlotte's stern and austere personality causes her to butt heads with the easygoing Rain, leaving Lasswell to bear the brunt of her complaints about his friend. The anxiety she felt after learning that her two comrades would set off on a dangerous journey was so acute that it materialized into a crystal, allowing those with the power of visions to summon her forth.
strings.summon:
This body...
Can a knight of Grandshelt like
myself be falling prey to
a trick of the mind...?
strings.affinity:
This has been my longest mission yet...
Do go and visit the real me
once in a while, if you can.
strings.fusion:
Visions can be...augmented?
Though the sensation is peculiar...
I do believe I've grown stronger.

strings.description: A knight who protects Grandshelt in Rain and Lasswell's absence. Charlotte has currently taken on their share of duties related to the reconstruction of Grandshelt as they travel the world. However, both her trust in, and her worry for her comrades are so overwhelming as to have become tangible, transforming into a crystal, which can now be used to summon her as a vision. Hard to believe, perhaps, but for those who know her, harder to deny.
strings.summon:
Visions...
A body made of feelings and memories!
It's awfully strange, but here we are.
I shall make myself useful.
strings.evolution:
All this power coursing through me...
Rain, Lasswell...
So this is what visions are all about!
strings.affinity:
This has been my longest mission yet...
Do go and visit the real me
once in a while, if you can.
strings.fusion:
Growing stronger without training...
If this were possible in my real body, I might actually be of some use to my king.

strings.description: A knight of Grandshelt whose mortal body continues to protect both the monarchy and the people. Her strong feelings towards her comrades Rain and Lasswell crystallized, enabling others to summon her with the power of visions. Her concern is deep for Rain, whose nonchalant temperament unsettles her, yet deeper still for Lasswell, whose personality closely resembles her own. In fact, Charlotte's feelings for him seem to be complex in the extreme.
strings.summon:
These feelings of mine.
I have duties in Grandshelt,
and cannot be with you!
...So here I am anyway.
strings.evolution:
You've kept believing in me,
and even lent power
to this hopeless body of mine.
I'll put it to good use!
strings.affinity:
This has been my longest mission yet...
Do go and visit the real me
once in a while, if you can.
strings.fusion:
Enhancing visions...
Rain, your unique talents never cease to amaze me.

strings.description: A man who lived by hunting. Though Artemios wasn't from a hunting clan and started as a hobbyist, he knew no greater pleasure and eventually turned hunting into his trade. Dark rumors circulated that beasts weren't the only thing he hunted...
strings.summon:
