This hunt is going to be fun.
What can I dispatch for you?
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion:
Ah yes...
Nothing thrills the senses quite like the hunt.

strings.description: A man who dedicated his life to hunting. Artemios was a lowly peasant whose propensity for the hunt was such that he developed extraordinary skill, to the point that people wished to engage him as an assassin. Word has it that the change to human targets inspired no doubts in him, nor any special mercy for this new quarry.
strings.summon:
Where's my next target?
I'll take out anyone, or anything, you ask me to.
strings.evolution:
What happened? Am I stronger?
I want to go hunting right away...for something big!
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion: A-hunting I shall go. Heh heh heh...

strings.description: A hardened hunter of beasts, monsters, and even humans. Thoroughly exploited as an agent of death, Artemios grew so savage that he began to attack people indiscriminately. The hunter became the hunted when his peers decided he was too dangerous to let live in his deranged state.
strings.summon:
Never mind why I'm back.
It's time to go hunting.
strings.evolution:
Heh heh heh...
I could get used to this feeling.
No quarry is safe from this hunter!
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure that is wise, hmmm...?
You may be my next target...

strings.description: A samurai who valued loyalty and decorum, and wielded her blade only in service to her master. Chizuru and her fellow samurai, honorable warriors of great pride not unlike the knights of today, are occasionally referenced in historical chronicles, but specific details of the time period in which they lived and the lands from which they hailed are scarce.
strings.summon:
You must be my new master.
My body shall be your sword
and shield.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion:
Master, I am grateful
for the power you
bestow upon me.

strings.description: A katana-wielding samurai of great strength who served her master with undying loyalty by cultivating both body and spirit. After Chizuru retired from her duties, she married a ninja who served the same lord, and gave birth to both a son and a daughter. Sadly, due to strife within her clan, she lost her daughter to the shadows, filling her with grief until the end of her days.
strings.summon:
Master, I hope my skills with
the sword prove useful to you.
strings.evolution:
This power is a gift from my master.
I shall prove myself worthy
by devoting myself to my training.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion:
You grant me still more power, master?
Then I shall devote myself
to you fully.

strings.description: Known as a samurai, she wields her blade out of loyalty for her master. She lived in accordance to the samurai code, and even after retiring she taught it to her children. However, after her daughter was taken in by the darkness, she left her family and master behind, instead deciding to take her own life by committing seppuku.
strings.summon:
Master...
Please, my blade,
use it as you will.
strings.evolution:
To thank you for this power
you have bestowed upon me.
I dedicate my life to you.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion: I promise I will pay back the favor you did for me when you gave me power.

strings.description: The legitimate successor of a ninja clan who accepted orders from his master to carry out assassinations and infiltrations. Hayate took many pupils under his wing while working for the same master his family had loyally served for generations. After some time he apparently left in search of his younger sister, a ninja herself who had fled their home under mysterious circumstances. No records remain of what became of the two thereafter.
strings.summon:
I shall do my master's bidding,
no matter what is asked of me.
That is the way of the ninja.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
You grant me new power?
I shall repay this favor in kind.

strings.description: A legitimate heir of the arts of the ninja, and a peerless assassin and spy. Hayate's mother was a katana-wielding samurai of grave demeanor, a personality he inherited. The envy he harbored against his younger sister, an expert swordswoman adept with dual blades, gradually drove her toward the darkness, eventually causing her to flee their master's domain.
strings.summon:
Our encounter shows that you
are fated to be my new master.
From this day, I shall be your shadow.
strings.evolution:
The way of the ninja requires
constant devotion to one's training...
I live only for my master...
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
Master. I shall not squander
the precious power
you bestow on me.

strings.description: A ninja who committed political assassinations and gathered intelligence on foes in the name of his master. Born to a samurai mother, his younger sister was a ninja like himself. However, she was driven from their home by the coldness he showed her, and sought the power of darkness. To take responsibility for this turn of events, their mother honorably and tragically took her own life. Hayate gave his remaining years to his master, but now, as a vision, he wanders the world in search of his sister, in hopes that he might still make amends.
strings.summon:
That I have returned
to this world is a gift from my master.
I shall see the debt is paid.
strings.evolution:
I have been granted power anew.
I vow upon my blade
to serve my master with my life.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm... You truly honor me.
If you would see me grow stronger,
your will shall be done.

strings.description: A soldier for the Olderion Federation. Despite having average abilities, he has a competitive spirit and a stronger desire than most to protect others. He is engaged, put given his intense personality she is constantly worried he is pushing himself too far.
strings.summon:
What is this body?
Could it be those legendary...visions?
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
I can get stronger without working for it?
That's a bit...scary...

strings.description: A soldier belonging to the Olderion Federation. Despite being of the Wardens of the Waters, he wasn't as intelligent or gifted with magic as his brother and sister were, so he instead trained his body, choosing the path of a soldier. Having once had an inferiority complex he didn't used to get along with his fellow soldiers, but now he has calmed down as a working soldier.
strings.summon:
This isn't my true body...
But if I can be of help
I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
I do feel stronger, indeed.
It's strange...but it should come in handy.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
You're giving that to me, too...?
I am grateful for your support.

strings.description: A soldier defending the Olderion Federation. Bearing a great sense of duty, he is proud of his place as a soldier. He was born into a noble family, coming from the line of the Wardens of the Waters, a group of people who protect others with special powers. His brother was a military tactician and his sister was a priestess, but he chose a different path. He decided he would use his own strength to contribute as much as he could.
strings.summon:
I am a soldier of Olderion.
If I can protect my family,
then I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
So, this is the power I had inside me?
It must be the blood of the guardians.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
I will become even stronger.
Not just for my country, but also my family.

strings.description: A water priestess charged with protecting the Olderion Federation. She has a deep bond with the water crystal, the incredible power of which she uses to cleanse the waters that protect the city from monsters. She also has two brothers, both of whom serve in protecting their country.
strings.summon:
Somehow, these memories...
I will do my best to be of use to you all.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
Thank you very much.
I'll do my best to get stronger!

strings.description: A water priestess from the Olderion Federation. She has received the protection of the water crystal despite being so young, the power of which she uses to support the daily lives of her fellow citizens. Though kind and welcoming to all she comes across, she has dedicated her life to serving her people, and when the time comes she hides within her something that even her brothers couldn't match.
strings.summon: I can feel the protection of the water crystal. I will go along with you all.
strings.evolution:
I have...new power?
It must be a gift from the water crystals.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
I'm so happy!
I can be even more useful to you all now!

strings.description: A citizen of the Olderion Federation, bestowed the position of water priestess. Her and all the members of her family are known as the "Wardens," people charged with protecting the water crystal, but as the Water Priestess she has the tremendous power of being able to wield the power of the water crystal, making her a pillar of Olderion society.
strings.summon:
The crystals have entrusted
you all with a great burden.
I also wish to help you.
strings.evolution:
I promise to be of use to you.
I dedicate myself to carrying out my will.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
This power...
Surely, I can use this to glorify the waters!

strings.description: The young head of a pirate clan that patrols the seas around Olderion. She's not just a pretty face, boasting powerful axe-wielding strength and unshaken charisma that separates her from the rest of the ruffians. All this points to a past which, given the comparatively peaceful state of Olderion, is surrounded in mystery as to how and why she became a pirate.
strings.summon:
Hey, why are all you here?!
Visions?
How strange, fate is...
strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.fusion:
That was a surprise!
It gave me its power...?
What a strange fellow!

strings.description: A female pirate boss located in Olderion. Those who dare to flaunt their style before her are quickly taken down by her axe. Even in Olderion, a country considered to be fairly prosperous, there exist poor areas. It is from these areas that she gathered ruffians to patrol the seas with her, usually preying on those who flaunt their wealth.
strings.summon:
Where are we? M-my henchmen...
This is the body of a vision?
Oh, I'm glad the real me is still safe...
strings.evolution:
Oh yeah, I like that!
Please, give me more of those wonderful treasures!
strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure about this?
Should you be making me this strong...?
You never know, I might end up going after you all!

strings.description: A pirate boss located in Olderion. Born to a wealthy merchant family, she lost all but a single ship when her family's business collapsed which she filled with criminal ruffians before beginning her life as a pirate. Her belief is that even the poor should be able to eat, and it is with this kind determination that she faces those who dare stand before her.
strings.summon:
This body...it's top rate.
Since I have been called, I will lend you my power. That is what makes me a pirate.
strings.evolution:
These treasures can give me strength?
These visions, what bodies they have!
strings.affinity:
I want you and I to always be...
Uh oh... A pirate can't allow herself to be seen crying.
strings.fusion:
He he, thanks for the power.
I'll hack away at your enemies with my trusty axe!

strings.description: A knight from the Kingdom of Grandshelt. Although fairly close in age to Rain and his friends, as a late bloomer Lawrence never stood out much within his order. Nonetheless, he never minded it enough to let it affect his good rapport with Rain and Lasswell. On the field he leads a commando unit and fights gracefully with a rapier type blade.
strings.summon:
Wow, it's Rain!
I wasn't expecting to see you here.
...A vision? What in Lapis is that?
strings.affinity:
To have been able to have spent
so much time with the Rain...
Please, give my regards to my true self.
strings.fusion:
To become stronger without getting dirty.
That's the kind of smart approach I like.

strings.description: A knight from the Kingdom of Grandshelt who has lead many experienced soldiers into battle. Lawrence is quite a skilled warrior that seldom uses his abilities to their full extent. His closeness in age to Rain and his friends has helped them to establish a friendly relationship as peers who may share supper now and again. On the other hand, his bad habit of conjuring roses through the sleight of hand to flirt with women have made him quite infamous in the eyes of stalwart female knights such as Charlotte.
strings.summon:
He he he...
It seems the day you'd need me has come.
This means you accept me, right Rain?
strings.evolution:
I've grown...stronger?
You should've told me earlier
that you knew such a technique!
strings.affinity:
To have been able to have spent
so much time with the Rain...
Please, give my regards to my true self.
strings.fusion:
That's it.
Visions are pretty spectacular, eh?

strings.description: A knight from the Kingdom of Grandshelt who lead a commando unit composed of experienced warriors. Although Lawrence's shallow attitude and womanizing tendencies may make him seem unworthy of knighthood, these traits are superficial at best. Deep down he is a warrior loyal to his homeland who admires Rain and his comrades for their courage to set out on their journey. Proof of this admiration lies in his vision, which sprung from it.
strings.summon:
He he, found yourself in a pinch, Rain?
Allow me to help you out, then.
As a proud knight of Grandshelt, haha!
strings.evolution:
I feel so bright and cheerful.
It must mean I'm ready for what lies ahead.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to have spent
so much time with the Rain...
Please, give my regards to my true self.
strings.fusion:
Come on, make me stronger!
I want to show Rain and everyone
what I'm really made of!

strings.description: A young woman who served as a dancer in the front lines during the war. Soleil's bewitching dances not only serve to comfort the hearts of soldiers on the field, but the different magical properties tied to each dance help unlock their innermost potential as well. In battle she wields the throwing weapon known as the chakram, though being a pacifist at heart she prefers to use it as a part of her dance routine rather than for hurting others.
strings.summon:
All I can do is dance, but, um...
I look forward to working with you!
strings.affinity:
I'm happy you have relied on me.
Won't you share a dance with me?
Hehe... Just kidding!
strings.fusion:
A new path has opened.
Let's take the first step right away!

strings.description: A young woman with unique dancing skills that bolster the fighting spirit. Since ancient times dancers have been tasked with a crucial role on the battlefield. However, unlike her ancestors, Soleil is more fond of the actual dancing than the fighting aspect of her job. Ironically enough, the genuine joy she feels while performing makes the effects of her dances even more potent, making her an invaluable asset on the field.
strings.summon:
This dance is the dance of war.
I will raise your fighting spirit.
strings.evolution:
I feel like I can soar.
Lighter, faster, I will dance
like no one you've seen before.
strings.affinity:
I'm happy you have relied on me.
Won't you share a dance with me?
Hehe... Just kidding!
strings.fusion:
Hehe...
I just thought of some great
new moves!

strings.description: A dancer who uses her skills to magnify the fighting power of warriors. Soleil was born into a family of dancers whose job was to serve as support for soldiers on the battlefield. Pure of heart, she grew up loving dance until she finally learned the original purpose behind her unique skills. This is said to have upset her so greatly that she almost lost her ability to dance. The grief she felt upon realizing that her passion was meant to be used as a tool of war then crystallized in form of a vision.
strings.summon:
I may be a dancer,
but I was born to fight.
I hope this dance can help you out.
strings.evolution:
This overflowing power tingles...
For whom shall I dance?
Who needs my protection?
strings.affinity:
I'm happy you have relied on me.
Won't you share a dance with me?
Hehe... Just kidding!
strings.fusion:
If I keep dancing,
will I be able to help save someone?

strings.description: A maid who works for the emperor of Zoldaad, the empire that forever burns bright. A callous woman, in truth she is an expert at retrieving confidential information that she then shares with the rebel army opposing the empire, or with whomever pays enough money to procure it. Shine is actually one of the many false identities she has created over the years to carry out her business.
strings.summon:
It doesn't matter who I am or you are.
Let's just take care of business.
strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.fusion:
I will do my best to pay you back for this reward.
Is that all right with you?

strings.description: A woman with various personas that include a maid who works for the emperor of Zoldaad, and a bar showgirl. Shine is a professional at using her numerous identities to gather intelligence regarding the political state of the empire. Knowing that information can fetch a hefty price in a nation suffering from instability, she sells whatever intel she gathers to whoever offers money for it. The real identity behind the mysterious vision that spawned after she decided to do away with her emotions, however, remains unknown.
strings.summon:
I am a shadow, unable to be seen.
I will carry out my responsibilities.
strings.evolution:
You still need me, I see...
Well then, it's a promise.
strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.fusion:
Is this a reward?
Well then, what should I do now?

strings.description: A woman indifferent to others who makes a living from selling confidential information about the political instability of the Zoldaad Empire through any means necessary. Having done away with any emotional attachments, Shine often finds herself unable to recall her own upbringing. Many believe her vision sprung forth from the immense pride she has in her own abilities to carry out intelligence gathering missions.
strings.summon:
So you wish to use my power.
Fine then, what are my orders?
strings.evolution:
It appears I, one who feels nothing,
have been granted memories.
strings.affinity:
Having thrown away everything, I...
...It's okay, never mind.
Please, have this.
strings.fusion:
...Thanks, as always.
I'll do what I can to pay you
back for this reward.

strings.description: The first prince of the Zoldaad Empire, and the young man next in line for the imperial throne. Shera is a kind soul with sound judgment who has his doubts about the current militaristic aspirations of the empire. Unfortunately, his quiet personality and high regard for his subjects' well being are regarded as nothing more than weakness in the eyes of the dictatorial emperor and his militant officials.
strings.summon:
May the empire follow a righteous path.
It is time for me, too, to pick up a sword.
strings.affinity:
Though this body may be temporary,
I feel I've learned a lot recently.
Please allow me to thank you.
strings.fusion:
Thank you very much.
Please allow me to advance in a way
befitting the heir of Zoldaad.

strings.description: The crown prince of the militant empire of Zoldaad. Still in the process of learning how to best rule a nation, Shera has his doubts about whether to use force upon his subjects to bend them to the empire's will, or directly reach out to them to gain their favor. His skills with the sword are also part of the privileged education he has received as imperial royalty.
strings.summon:
I have always wanted to see
the true nature of the battlefield.
Please, let me fight with you.
strings.evolution:
So this is what you call, "power"...
Humans are often enchanted by this,
are they not?
strings.affinity:
Though this body may be temporary,
I feel I've learned a lot recently.
Please allow me to thank you.
strings.fusion: This power you have bestowed me...I will not let it go to waste.

strings.description: The crown prince of the militaristic nation that is the Zoldaad Empire. Skeptical about the empire's extensive use of its military prowess to rule the nation, Shera has created alliances with various people behind the scenes to insure the happiness and wellbeing of his people. One such person is the rebel army's Jake, who is currently fighting the oppression of the empire's military forces. Shera's actions make it apparent that he yearns to be recognized as his own man.
strings.summon:
What does it mean to be an emperor?
Maybe going along with you
I will be able to find the answer.
strings.evolution:
If I could just become stronger...
Sure then I'd be able to stand
shoulder to shoulder with them.
strings.affinity:
Though this body may be temporary,
I feel I've learned a lot recently.
Please allow me to thank you.
strings.fusion:
I thank you for your cooperation.
Let us fight together.

strings.description: The ruler of the Zoldaad Empire. By the time that Rain and his companions visit his nation, Emperor Sozhe has already begun using the overwhelming power of his army to run the empire as a dictatorship, causing civil unrest in the process. Whereas the reasons behind his sudden and forceful implementation of a dictatorial regime remain a mystery, he was once known for his efficiency in ruling Zoldaad, despite its lack of natural resources.
strings.summon:
I must be here thanks to the
strong feelings I have for my
beloved nation Zoldaad.
strings.affinity:
I see my memories were of use
in aiding this precious journey.
I take pride in it as the emperor of Zoldaad.
strings.fusion:
Hmph... So you're giving me power.
I will receive it as an offering.

strings.description: The ruler of the militant Zoldaad Empire. Emperor Sozhe was a wise and capable ruler who sought to make the best out of his nation's situation, regardless of its lack of natural resources. Unfortunately, however, his resolution to keep his empire afloat at any cost was such that he allowed himself to be manipulated by evil. The Emperor Sozhe that Rain and his friends meet when they reach Zoldaad has already embraced the wickedness in his heart.
strings.summon:
What a nostalgic feeling.
I have had this blade
since I was a young emperor.
strings.evolution: I am happy to accept more power from you.
strings.affinity:
I see my memories were of use
in aiding this precious journey.
I take pride in it as the emperor of Zoldaad.
strings.fusion:
I can use these bodies as fighting power?
...Well then, let it be.

strings.description: The ruler of the politically unstable militant Zoldaad Empire, and a man with several connections to a number of Rain's allies. As thoughtful as he was strict, Emperor Sozhe doted his children with affection. Unfortunately, the pressure of his responsibilities as a ruler ultimately steered him in the opposite direction, changing his personality. His vision is a representation of the fierce dedication he once had for protecting both his family and his nation.
strings.summon:
Pride, regret...
Whatever memories these are,
I entrust them to you.
strings.evolution:
To accept even one worth of
ruling into your circle of friends.
You grow ever intriguing to me.
strings.affinity:
I see my memories were of use
in aiding this precious journey.
I take pride in it as the emperor of Zoldaad.
strings.fusion:
Good, good.
I shall become even stronger so that
I can better aid you in our travels.

strings.description: An apprentice of black magic who once studied in Mysidia. Heltich is a proficient mage who used spells from an ancient tome he inherited to transfer magical power into organic bodies in hopes of strengthening them. His attempts lead to the birth of a beast, and instead of being frightened by the results, this incited him to create even more of them. These events ultimately lead to his expulsion from Mysidia by Sakura and her cohorts.
strings.summon:
What are these...visions?
Could this body be capable of
the power I've been after?
strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.fusion:
I can feel magic coming in from outside.
If only I had such a power.

strings.description: A former pupil of Mysidia with the ability to strengthen organic bodies by transferring magical power into them. Although Heltich's original intentions were to grant power to the weak, his research lead to the birth of dangerous beasts that subsequently caused his expulsion from Mysidia. Later he would meet a young woman with berserker abilities who helped him gain new insight.
strings.summon:
The techniques of visions...
Is it possible I could make that
legendary magic power my own?
strings.evolution:
This is what it's like to be awakened?
This is quite brilliant for old sorcery.
strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.fusion:
A technique that can make anyone stronger.
The ancients held some truly precious talents.

strings.description: A man who sought to give the talentless and weak an opportunity to gain their own power through his abilities. Hating human sacrifices, Heltich decided to carry out his experimental spells on animals, resulting in the birth of various beasts. The infamy he gained from this lead to his exile from Mysidia, although he never lost sight of his objective. Currently he studies the nature of berserkers to the same end.
strings.summon:
My research showed it was possible, but...
I have become of one those
legendary visions.
strings.evolution:
More power from the visions, I see.
This will surely aid in my research.
strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.fusion:
The more power you have,
the more you'll end up wanting.
This must be what the elders feared.

strings.description: A skilled green mage from Mysidia. Although most of the mages of her homeland, including those who are prominent, are considered to be strange characters in their own right, Marie stands out among them due to her unusually boisterous and energetic personality. Rumor has it that the comrades she supports in battle even enjoy watching her taunt the enemy after she has enfeebled them with her magic.
strings.summon:
Yahoo! You look pretty strong!
Seems you've been enhanced
by my presence, no?
strings.affinity:
Tee hee hee...
Thanks to all of you
I've got some great data.
strings.fusion:
Hmm...
What magic should I learn next?

strings.description: One of the most proficient green mages in all of Mysidia. Marie is extremely intelligent and incredibly well versed in magic, although her personality is quite eccentric. Yet another side of her, however, shows just how obsessed she is with discovering how green magic can push the boundaries of the human body. Behind all of her unusual behavior lies a calculating and logical mind that seeks to understand how much the heart of a person who has been strengthened with magic can take, as well as how low a person who has been enfeebled can fall.
strings.summon:
The stronger I grow,
the weaker my enemies become.
You can't be beat with me by your side!
strings.evolution:
Here I am! Master of all green magi!
I look forward to seeing how much
stronger I can become!
strings.affinity:
Tee hee hee...
Thanks to all of you
I've got some great data.
strings.fusion:
Thanks!
I'm thinking about learning some new magic, so it'd be great if I could get some more power!

strings.description: A machine engineer from Dilmagia who specializes in weaponry. Aileen develops weapons of a smaller, more personal scale than those mounted on the airships constructed in her hometown. Currently, she travels across the world polishing her skills in combat and claims that there is a weapon for everyone.
strings.summon:
Alright, what kind of weapon
would you like me to make?
Huh? You want me to fight?
strings.affinity:
This body of mine must have
been a strong weapon for you?
That makes me blush.
strings.fusion:
I have an idea!
Just do this a little bit more, and...
Yeah, now I can do it!

strings.description: A machinist who designs technical weapons and small arms. Although Aileen's home may be Dilmagia, she decided to leave on a journey of self-improvement after being tasked to create weapons for the airships constructed there. Shortly afterwards, she was offered a job manufacturing weapons in large numbers for the militant empire of Zoldaad, which she took as an insult to her craftsmanship, immediately refusing the post.
strings.summon:
I can take on any sort of machine!
If it's got gears, leave it to me!
strings.evolution:
Thank you!
I feel refreshed, and I'm pretty sure
I'll have a great plan, soon!
strings.affinity:
This body of mine must have
been a strong weapon for you?
That makes me blush.
strings.fusion:
What a great idea!
I guess I should try just a little bit harder, eh?

strings.description: A young woman with berserker abilities that allow her to unleash her innermost potential through a trance when faced with mortal danger on the battlefield. Although usually quite gentle in nature, Ulrica goes into an involuntary and aggressive frenzy after spotting anyone she considers an enemy. She makes a living by using her skills as a bodyguard for others, but even she fears the state of her own health.
strings.summon:
Who are you?
Do you need the power of
my "other me"?
strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.fusion:
Hmph... I am to become stronger?
But it isn't the real me,
so I feel nothing.

strings.description: A berserker who loses her consciousness after going into a battle trance that quickly enhances her physical abilities on the field. Ulrica's genetic abilities cause her to black out directly before and after each battle, jumbling her memory and impairing her logical reasoning. The lack of memories of her own life made her afraid of herself until she received the aid of a certain black mage.
strings.summon:
The me who fights.
The normal me.
Which memories are these from...
strings.evolution:
If you'd just leave me be, when it
comes time to battle I will awaken...
Huh? This type is different, you say?
strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.fusion:
So you're doing this because
I'm valuable to you on the battlefield?
I will do my best to keep calm.

strings.description: A young woman with berserker abilities running through her blood that activate in the presence of mortal danger to awaken her dormant potential. Ulrica was abandoned by her family due to her particular condition, and was forced to wander the land by herself without the slightest memory of her parents. However, one day a black mage who could clarify her predicament appeared. Claiming that her condition stems from an imbalance of magical power, and not spiritual power, he is currently doing everything in his power to help her.
strings.summon:
There are two sides to me.
I think the fighting me can
be of use to you.
strings.evolution:
Even the normal me understands.
My fighting form is truly powerful.
strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.fusion:
Becoming stronger is not scary.
The fighting me will do its best
to protect you all.

strings.description: A general of the Zoldaad Empire. Wilhelm wears extremely heavy armor, and once boasted of the title of Imperial Shield for his efforts on the field. Although he was in charge of the empire's Magitek squadron, everything changed when Zoldaad began implementing dictatorial practices into their government. Following this, his superiors saw to his removal from any crucial missions, and expelled him to a remote location.
strings.summon:
These are my memories...?
I never thought the next time I fought
I'd be like this.
strings.affinity:
I wonder if I was able to help you to
protect what needed to be protected.
See to the safety of this world.
strings.fusion:
You wish to bestow me even more power?
I am grateful.

strings.description: A general of the militant empire of Zoldaad. Wilhelm has served Sozhe, the emperor of Zoldaad, for many years, having shared countless battles by his side as his comrade in arms. He is well acquainted with the emperor's past, and thinks of the crowned prince Shera as his own son. However, recently he has been kept from participating in pivotal missions for reasons unknown.
strings.summon:
It's been many moons since I last fought.
I'll show you a style of fighting worthy
of one called the shield of the empire.
strings.evolution:
I am your shield.
Feel free to use me as you please.
strings.affinity:
I wonder if I was able to help you to
protect what needed to be protected.
See to the safety of this world.
strings.fusion:
I will repay you for this favor.
I swear as a warrior.

strings.description: A woman in charge of the empire of Zoldaad's Magitek squadron. Grace seems to be void of emotion, and gives the impression of being manipulated by someone else from the shadows. She was originally a member of the rebellion against the empire, but was captured and made into a mechanized soldier by a genius yet evil scientist who was able to draw out her abilities.
strings.summon: What is my next order?
strings.affinity:
I feel like I'm remembering...
not the empire, but...
...something else important.
strings.fusion: ...Energy insertion confirmed.

strings.description: The woman currently in charge of Zoldaad's Magitek squadron, the empire's most dominant forces. A scientist working under the emperor used people like Grace, a captured soldier from the rebel army, to create fully mechanized soldiers for their Magitek squadron. Since she still retains the same physical appearance she was captured in, she has been used to trick her former rebel army comrades into thinking she remains their ally.
strings.summon:
With this magitek armor,
there's no enemy I can't annihilate!
strings.evolution:
Magic level increase confirmed.
Releasing limiter.
strings.affinity:
I feel like I'm remembering...
not the empire, but...
...something else important.
strings.fusion: Enhancement complete.

strings.description: A cyborg in command of the militant empire of Zoldaad's Magitek squadron. Grace's original position as a pivotal member of the group rebelling against the empire has served to compromise the rebel army's resolve to fight as they face off against their former comrade. She also shared a close relationship with the mercenary Abel, further complicating the rebel army's execution of their plans.
strings.summon:
There is no such thing as failure
to the imperial magitek armor brigade.
strings.evolution:
Magic level increased to class six.
Unlocking further limits.
strings.affinity:
I feel like I'm remembering...
not the empire, but...
...something else important.
strings.fusion:
Systems all green.
Energy pathways clear.

strings.description: A veteran member of the Raven, the group behind the rebellion against the empire of Zoldaad. Abel has been friends with Jake, the leader of the rebel army, for quite some time. Naturally, the rest of his comrades are rather fond of his sociable attitude as well. However, when tragedy struck after a fellow member of the rebel army was captured and brainwashed, he went on a suicidal rampage.
strings.summon:
I knew I had an indomitable will,
but I never would have thought
I would become a vision.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.fusion: Even normal people can be strengthened by their memories.

strings.description: A veteran member of the rebel army opposing the militant rule of the Zoldaad Empire. Abel is such a capable soldier that he has earned leader Jake's trust. However, being deeply in touch with his emotions has caused him to lose composure at the sight of the countless tragedies that have befallen his country, and after witnessing his lover being turned into a mechanized soldier by the empire.
strings.summon:
Are these memories toward that person,
or will I never escape this torment.
Either way, as long as they can be of use.
strings.evolution:
My power is overflowing!
...No, if I get caught up in this,
it'll be the empire all over again.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.fusion:
Power should be used to help the weak.
That is what the Ravens believe.

strings.description: A veteran member of the Raven, the rebel army opposing the Zoldaad Empire, and a highly emotional man. Following Jake's departure from Zoldaad, Abel sought to return to the man he had once been by helping to re-establish a just empire from the shadows. Now he aids the unfortunate who cry for help while devoting his best efforts to accelerating the recovery of his lover, who had previously been made into a mechanized soldier by the former militant empire.
strings.summon:
I will do everything I am capable of doing.
Just like when I was with the Ravens.
strings.evolution:
This power is to be used for the weak?
I'm not mistaken, right?
strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.fusion:
I, with this power...
I want to save as many people as possible.

strings.description: A martial artist in command of eradicating monsters and patrolling the Kingdom of Pharm. Though blessed with talent and a good physique from a young age, though of by many as a prodigy, one day he was defeated by a travelling martial artist which shook him to his very core. Though he aims to defeat that person, there is still much he is unable to get over.
strings.summon:
I'm now a...vision?
As long as I'm not a gh-ghost...
strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.fusion:
It's kind of strange, I guess,
but it is a sort of...training.

strings.description: A martial artist from the Kingdom of Pharm. Though highly trusted and capable, responsible for investigating incidents and performing exterminations, he is secretly afraid of reapers type monsters like ghosts and skeletons, making it hard for him sometimes to complete his work. He appears to have a strong mind since this does not affect his fighting, but he still doesn't like ghost stories.
strings.summon: I can't believe I became one of these ghastly visions.
strings.evolution:
I've got my techniques down.
So this is what you call an awakening?
strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.fusion: I wonder if training like this affects the soul, as well?

strings.description: A martial artist who leads others in investigating and dealing with monster-related incidents in the Kingdom of Pharm. Though he wants to be strong like the person who defeated him back when he was a proud and determined young man, he has some serious fears concerning ghosts and the like.
strings.summon:
This temporary body...
This ghost like form of mine,
use it as you will.
strings.evolution:
So I had power like this lying
inside me this whole time...
strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.fusion:
Limit breaking power...
All that's left is to prepare the soul.

strings.description: A member of the rebel organization known as the Raven currently opposing the militant empire of Zoldaad. After losing her parents to the horrors of war, Jean grew up learning from Jake and the other members of the rebel army, and took up arms in hopes of helping her brothers and sisters with their cause. Quick to adapt in battle, she is currently an active member of secret tactical maneuvers being executed by the group.
strings.summon:
So I'm now one of those rumored visions?
I guess I, too, had such memories
inside of me.
strings.affinity:
My true memories...
I tried to be cool and hide them...
Sorry, I mean thank you.
strings.fusion:
I can see so much more clearly now.
It's so refreshing.

strings.description: A young member of the Raven, the rebel army opposing the Zoldaad Empire. Jean considers the older members of the organization, such as Jake, Grace, and Abel to be her siblings. Although still tender of age, her reasonable judgment and skills in battle make her a valuable asset to leader Jake, who makes the best of her abilities by sending her on infiltration and reconnaissance missions.
strings.summon:
I'm here, so I will help you.
I am a pretty confident marksman.
strings.evolution:
Thank you, this will do.
Please use my power properly.
strings.affinity:
My true memories...
I tried to be cool and hide them...
Sorry, I mean thank you.
strings.fusion:
I can see clear through to my enemy's weakness.
What a convenient power.

strings.description: A member of the rebel army known as the Raven that opposes the Zoldaad Empire, and an expert in firearms and intel gathering. Jean made the best of her ability to make logical decisions with sound judgment by reaching out and supporting the people in each corner of the empire after Jake left Zoldaad with Rain and his companions. Currently, she is also gathering intel in hopes of returning her friend Grace to her normal self after having been brainwashed by the former militant empire.
strings.summon:
It's usually important to stay cool,
but for this battle I think we
should let the memories flow.
strings.evolution:
If the rebel army had
the power of these visions...
...It's nothing, never mind.
strings.affinity:
My true memories...
I tried to be cool and hide them...
Sorry, I mean thank you.
strings.fusion: At this rate, there's no target that can get past me. Not one.

strings.description: A novice mercenary seeking to further hone her skills. Although most novice warriors who seek to quickly improve their fighting skills join the army or become knights under the wing of their nation, Camille chose to gain experience by relentlessly vanquishing beasts on her own. Her hard work has gained her the admiration of various veteran mercenaries who have seen her in action.
strings.summon:
I will accept your request!
My dream is to gain experience and grow stronger!
strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.fusion:
I'm not sure, but...
As long as I can get stronger, I'm happy.
So thanks for this, I guess!

strings.description: A mercenary who is gradually becoming more popular thanks to her resilience. Camille's fast improvement in the art of battle cannot be solely attributed to her genuine desire to become stronger, but also to her astonishingly quick learning rate. Although she initially held no interest for international affairs, her missions on the field opened her eyes to the suffering of the people. This sprung within her the desire to begin protecting others.
strings.summon:
I am Camille.
Whether it be bodyguard duty or pest control,
leave all your mercenary duties to me.
strings.evolution:
Hmph...I feel more able...
I guess this is what you call awakening.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.fusion:
I have to keep trying.
That's all there is to becoming stronger.

strings.description: A novice mercenary of great talent. Camille's desire to protect others sprung from the people she witnessed suffering as she carried out her missions. Recognizing her resilient personality and determination, Amelia from the Zoldaad Empire invited her to join a special group of warriors as their commander to carry out missions for the imperial family whilst traveling the world.
strings.summon:
You want me to help save the world?!
...All right, then.
My power is yours!
strings.evolution:
I feel as if my skills have sharpened...
This is what it feels like to grow stronger.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.fusion:
If I can keep becoming stronger,
then I'll be able to fight alongside the
rest of you in defending the world.

strings.description: A salve-maker who wanders the world treating people's illnesses. Although many prefer to use more contemporary methods such as magic to treat the ill and the wounded, Ilias has always turned to nature in order to make organic concoctions to the same end. He may not serve for brute force in battle, but his resilient attitude and wide knowledge of various types of medicine have seen him through his journey.
strings.summon:
I am a doctor.
I wonder if I could be of some help?
strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.fusion:
Huh, this is for me!?
I'd better get on to my next line of research!

strings.description: A salve-maker who wanders the world freely. Ilias has devoted himself to creating medicinal remedies that everyone can have easy access to without having to rely on magical recovery methods. The root for his motivation lies in the stories he heard as a child, where the salve-maker Mel sacrificed her own body to further research the effects of her concoctions. Like Mel, Ilias has come to show a sense of self-sacrifice himself as he follows in her footsteps.
strings.summon:
I want to make everyone feel better.
If my medicine can be of use to you,
please use it as you will.
strings.evolution:
So this is an awakening...
I feel a wave of new ideas
coming to me.
strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.fusion: I'll do my best to make some new medicine so that this improvement doesn't go to waste!

strings.description: A salve-maker who travels the world in search of ingredients to create new concoctions that can help people of all kinds. Prince Shera invited Ilias to join his own personal forces, a squadron operating in secrecy within the Zoldaad Empire, to put his strong motivation and talents to good use. There he gained powerful companions with whom he accomplished a number of rigorous missions by playing the crucial role of their logistical support during battle.
strings.summon:
Please use my medicine in your travels.
That will take care of the first step
in me accomplishing my dreams.
strings.evolution:
With this power I feel I can
make even better potions.
Thank you so much!
strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.fusion:
Thank you for the enhancement.
The more knowledge I have,
the more people I'll be able to save.

strings.description: An eccentric knight who fights atop a chocobo. Fohlen wears flexible and adjustable armor that allows him to wander around the world working as a mercenary for hire. Chocobos are usually used as a means of transportation and as a tool for cultivating the land, whilst most military forces prefer airships to carry out their duties. For this reason, chocobo knights are often frowned upon, making their numbers scarce.
strings.summon:
I am Fohlen!
This chocobo is my partner.
We both look forward to working with you.
strings.affinity:
To have believed in a weird one like me,
you must be quite strange, yourself.
I look forward to our continued path together!
strings.fusion:
Chomp, chomp!
...That wasn't me just now,
it was my happy, little partner.

strings.description: A knight that combines his strength as a warrior with the swiftness of his chocobo. Chocobo knights make for chivalrous and heroic figures in battle, but Fohlen didn't learn his true purpose until he set out on a journey of self-discovery with his feathery partner. He learned every single fighting skill he knows firsthand by vanquishing beasts in order to cover for his traveling expenses. A free-spirit by nature, Fohlen allows very little to ruffle his feathers.
strings.summon:
Do you think it's old-fashioned
for a knight to ride on a chocobo?
Wait until you see what I'm capable of.
strings.evolution:
Chomp! Chomp!
...Oh? Seems my partner is pleased!
strings.affinity:
To have believed in a weird one like me,
you must be quite strange, yourself.
I look forward to our continued path together!
strings.fusion:
Oh wow, isn't that nice!
My partner and I can grow stronger together.

strings.description: A sorceress from long ago who paved the way for black mages in her home of the Magi Nation, Mysidia. Victoria was no less bizarre than the other inhabitants of Mysidia, as she too masked her questionable behavior under the guise of scientific research. Rumor has it that night after night she would collect the blood of young men, and then bathe in it to heighten her magical powers. As with other witches of legend, whether there is any truth behind these claims or not remains a mystery.
strings.summon:
Hey you kids, where did you
learn about all this vision business?
strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.fusion:
You wish for power?
Can't be helped, I guess.

strings.description: A sorceress who laid the foundation for black magic research hundreds of years ago in the Magi Nation, Mysidia. Victoria was dubbed "the bewitching witch" by many who claimed that she conducted experiments on the young men she lured towards her, and then used her evil ways to turn each of them into her puppets. Although it is hard to separate fact from fiction, her magical ability at least was true enough.
strings.summon:
Would you like to feel my magic
with every fiber of your being?
strings.evolution:
What do you think you're doing to me?
Best not treat me like a kid.
strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.fusion:
Not just yet...
That still isn't enough.

strings.description: A sorceress from a long line of black mages who conducted her own research in Mysidia hundreds of years ago. Many legends claim that Victoria was either a "bewitching witch," or a woman who enjoyed robbing young men of their blood, but none of these are true. She was actually a very caring teacher who went to great lengths in order to establish a good relationship with her countless pupils. In fact, they were the ones to lovingly dub her a "witch" for her strict, yet kind manner of teaching others.
strings.summon:
Hey...you kids aren't too bad.
I give all I have to you.
strings.evolution:
My body is hot...
I think this is it!
strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.fusion:
My magic power...
I can feel it growing...

strings.description: A maid who serves the imperial court of Zoldaad. Amelia works as a regular maid in service of the crown prince Shera, although this is just a cover to hide her true identity. Formerly known as "Dual Gunner Amelia" during her times as a mercenary, she will not hesitate to use her twin pistols against any who dare lay a finger on her prince.
strings.summon:
I don't miss what I aim at...
As long as it is in service of my lord,
I will wield these guns of mine.
strings.affinity:
Not belief...but trust.
It's a strange feeling, but...
It feels very warm.
strings.fusion:
I swear to compensate you for this.
My word is my bond.

strings.description: A maid who serves the court of the militant empire of Zoldaad, but Prince Shera in particular. Amelia is a former mercenary with experience fighting in the front lines who established herself in the empire amidst rumors of military action. An extremely talented markswoman, she has been entrusted with Shera's protection, as he is the most valuable asset of the empire. She now works for him as his confidant knowing that he is the only noble who can gather the support of other nations behind the scenes.
strings.summon:
Now is the time to throw away this maid facade.
With this two guns,
I promise to keep you all protected.
strings.evolution:
I can remember how I once felt.
I wonder if I'll be of better use, now.
strings.affinity:
Not belief...but trust.
It's a strange feeling, but...
It feels very warm.
strings.fusion:
You seem to believe in me.
I will repay your kindness
with my actions.

strings.description: A maid in the service of the imperial family of Zoldaad. Amelia was once a mercenary who fought alongside Jake, a gunner like herself. In fact, it was Jake who arranged for her to handle the crown prince Shera's protection from the shadows. Her upbringing on the battlefield made it difficult for her to settle into her cover as a simple maid, but she has grown quite proficient at her new job. Rumor has it she makes quite the exquisite tea.
strings.summon:
The feel of battle... I remember now.
Please use this body of mine
to fulfill whatever needs you have.
strings.evolution:
Two-guns Amelia...
I feel as if she's back.
strings.affinity:
Not belief...but trust.
It's a strange feeling, but...
It feels very warm.
strings.fusion:
Thank you.
I promise to carry out my guard duties.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. Because she has amnesia, she relies on impulse to guide her actions, which can often cause trouble for her comrades. Having woken in a strange world without her memories, she struggles with confusion and anxiety, but displays great inner strength in joining Rain and Lasswell on their quest.
strings.summon:
I-it's my turn?
Uh, okay... I-I'll do my best!
strings.evolution:
...It seems the power hidden
inside of me has awoken.
strings.affinity: Thank you for fighting by my side all this time. Can I assume you trust me now?
strings.fusion:
I want to get even stronger
so I can be of help to you all.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Her childlike behavior, in part the product of memory loss, may also stem from her original, lost personality.
strings.summon:
You, who called me here, I bestow you...
...Huh? What was it, again?
Anyway, nice to meet you!
strings.evolution:
The power inside... It's awoken...
Yeah. I'm definitely stronger.
strings.affinity: Thank you for fighting by my side all this time. Can I assume you trust me now?
strings.fusion:
It seems I was able to make myself
useful to you all after all.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. As a warrior of Hess, Fina once used her immense magical powers as a weapon, but currently channels them as white magic to help others for reasons unknown. Although her new personality is much more innocent and kind than that of her past, the desire for peace she has felt since ancient times remains unchanged.
strings.evolution:
I feel I finally understand.
I know what this power really is,
and what I must do...
strings.affinity: Thank you for fighting by my side all this time. Can I assume you trust me now?
strings.fusion:
I want to use this power
to protect everyone.

strings.description: Fina's alternate form. This, it seems, is the true Fina, before she lost her memories...but since she is a vision, there is room to doubt this explanation. This Fina possesses powerful magic and a quick tongue — both mainly offensive. Yet behind her jibes and patronizing tone, one clearly senses a firm determination.
strings.summon:
As temporary as this body may be,
I will lend my power to you for now.
As a favor, got it?
strings.affinity:
He he... Here you are!
It's a thank you for all the power you've shown me!
strings.fusion:
That's it...
My emotions are growing.

strings.description: Fina's alternate form, a powerful attack magic-wielding warrior. Though completely different from the mysterious-yet-adultlike girl Rain first came across, the sincerity she shows from time to time is just like the old Fina. She seems to yearn for being given power, as if she has some sort of mission that depends on it.
strings.summon:
Are you capable of using me as I am?
I'll have a look at what you can do.
strings.evolution:
Now it's time for the real thing.
I wonder if you can keep up with my power?
strings.affinity:
He he... Here you are!
It's a thank you for all the power you've shown me!
strings.fusion:
Hehe, you know what I like.
Make me even stronger.

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado, who grew from a kid toying with machines in her parents' workshop to the finest engineer in the Industrial City. Lid is determined to inherit the name Cid, an honor granted only to the greatest in her trade. Her only serious flaw seems to be her love of money.
strings.summon:
Oh, what am I doing here?
A vision, you say?
You mean you even called on me!?
strings.affinity:
To have stayed with me this whole time...
Rain, he's really...
Oh, it's nothing!
strings.fusion:
Alright, time to rake in the gil!
That has nothing to do with what
I'm wearing, you know?

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado. Lid had an interest in machinery from childhood, but it wasn't until her older brother began showing her the ropes (and gears) that her aptitude blossomed into real talent. Her most treasured possession is her robot chocobo named Mechabo, which she and her brother built together. She became even more attached to Mechabo when her brother left home.
strings.summon:
Hmm... I guess I can become a vision,
even if we're together.
strings.evolution:
I will surpass him in my own way.
I'm gonna build so many airships!
strings.affinity:
To have stayed with me this whole time...
Rain, he's really...
Oh, it's nothing!
strings.fusion:
When you feel down,
are you the type that looks at the ground,
or do you look to the stars?

strings.description: An airship engineer who is paving the way to a new era. Unfortunately for Lid, her older brother was the one to inherit the Cid name she so coveted, after he left home. Regardless, she single-handedly renovated the desolate workshop her brother had abandoned, using the first Cid and his philosophy of freedom as her inspiration. Lid now seeks to become the embodiment of her hero as she travels with Rain.
strings.summon:
Since I've been called and everything,
I guess I can't just not lend you
my power now, can I?
strings.evolution:
I will be the one to take the name of "Cid."
I have a responsibility to, that's why.
strings.affinity:
To have stayed with me this whole time...
Rain, he's really...
Oh, it's nothing!
strings.fusion:
I will make airships that anyone can fly,
regardless of nationality or status.
Did I say something funny just now?

strings.description: The head soldier of an elven tribe, especially talented in literary and military arts. Long ago, he lived in an underground castle in Gronoa where he was in charge of rounding up survivors from a tragedy which had befallen them. Though the typically strict, law-abiding and conservative elves disliked other races like humans and dwarves, it appears he had a sweet spot for their arts.
strings.summon:
So the power hungry humans wish
to use even the emotions
hiding within me...
strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.fusion:
This reminds me of the power I once had.
The time...when I was a soldier.

strings.description: A member of an elven tribe, strictly devoted to protecting their elven traditions. In love with nature, distrusting of other races, and devoted to protecting the law, he was in charge of governing one of the elven colonies scattered across the land. 700 years ago, one by one the elven colonies were blown away by the war of Paladia, and the miasma which followed took the lives of his wife Lunera as well as the rest of his brethren, leaving him alone.
strings.summon:
Can't I be allowed to sleep in peace?
It matters not, use me as you will.
strings.evolution:
In the past, this is how
elves used to hone their skills.
In theory, these techniques are similar.
strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.fusion:
I only wanted power so that
I could protect my brethren.
What is it you wish to protect?

strings.description: Leader of the elves, a race that values law and tradition. Leaving in an underground castle in the land of Gronoa he was cut off from all other races, but through trading art with others and meeting with the dwarf Ruggles, his frozen heart began to thaw. Under the care of his friend Ruggles, it is said he was able to peacefully return to the nature he loved so much.
strings.summon:
It seems those who look past war are fated
to fight even after they have passed...
Or maybe this is a chance for atonement.
strings.evolution:
Magic that enhances one's power,
like a miracle straight from nature...
This is similar to elven techniques.
strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.fusion:
Even glorious power can produce
great tragedy in the hands of the foolish.

strings.description: A girl of the elven tribe which once lived in an underground castle in Gronoa. Like dwarves, elves are highly intelligent, and hold powers that no other race has. Though because of their love for nature they despise humans who dare to harm it, her feelings were changed by the war that happened long, long ago.
strings.summon:
To surpass time...
Alas, the time where we can
all hold hands has come.
strings.affinity:
I believe in you.
Allow me to contribute my power
in hopes of making a world without war.
strings.fusion:
The power which all men seek.
I believe it to be a good thing.

strings.description: A long-lost girl from an elven tribe, endowed with both intelligence and magical powers. In the land currently known as Gronoa, she was once a powerful soldier who led a squad with her husband Bran. She was much more tolerant than her conservative husband, and it said that while she was alive she sometimes even met with people from other races.
strings.summon:
So that the failings of the past are
not repeated, let us entrust
our feelings to the children.
strings.evolution:
I can feel my true power returning...
It seems one's feelings truly can
progress beyond death.
strings.affinity:
I believe in you.
Allow me to contribute my power
in hopes of making a world without war.
strings.fusion:
Becoming stronger and stronger...
It reminds me of my time as a soldier.

strings.description: A dwarf that found himself lost and alone long ago in the land of Gronoa. Having collapsed due to hunger and the surrounding miasma, he was rescued by Lunera, an elf who was living by, and soon began a friendship with her husband, Bran. Though much like the hard-working dwarves of today, having strayed for so long from his friends, his dwarfish optimism had begun to fade.
strings.summon:
Rally-ho!
I wonder if this manner of speech
is still understood these days?
strings.affinity:
Race doesn't mean anything.
I entrust my memories to you.
strings.fusion:
If you humans wish of it,
then Ruggles shall become stronger.

strings.description: A dwarf blacksmith who was saved by an elven couple long ago after finding himself all alone on the continent of Gronoa. Though he spoke in a bright manner similar to the dwarves of today, he had a serious personality, well aware of his crime in having committed to war efforts by creating weapons, which he dedicating himself to making atonement for.
strings.summon:
The humans find themselves in another war.
...Nothing ever changes.
strings.evolution:
I feel like the power of magic
doesn't really agree with us dwarves.
strings.affinity:
Race doesn't mean anything.
I entrust my memories to you.
strings.fusion: Ruggles's power is to be used justly.

strings.description: A dwarf who wandered around Gronoa after being separated from his brethren when Paladia was split during the war which took place 700 years ago in Paladia. He developed a friendship with an elven couple which was initially strained, but in the end did all he could for them as they found themselves threatened by the miasma. The results of his works are still visible in the underground passages below Gronoa.
strings.summon:
Ruggles's weapon is for protecting.
Never you forget that.
strings.evolution:
Magic and visions...
Us dwarves probably should have
accepted these already.
strings.affinity:
Race doesn't mean anything.
I entrust my memories to you.
strings.fusion:
Ruggles's will protect you all,
now that he has grown stronger.

strings.description: A member of the Sworn Six of Paladia who suddenly appeared before Rain and his friends to destroy the crystals. Claiming that humanity has committed grievous sins, Veritas of the Dark is determined to shatter all of the crystals found across the land. This ultimately leads Rain and his friends to set off on a journey to halt his plans.
strings.summon:
...So you would accept the help of even
one who is an enemy of your homeland?
strings.affinity:
...Accept this.
Now you can surpass even myself.
strings.fusion: Power of darkness, come to me!

strings.description: A member of the Sworn Six of Paladia bent on invading the world that Rain and his friends inhabit. Veritas of the Dark has faced Rain in battle on multiple occassions, and each time has displayed great martial expertise and an undying resolve to accomplish his goals. Only a handful of people know of his real motives, his past, and the identity hiding behind the dark armor.
strings.summon:
What hateful power...
You wish to use even this malice of mine, do you?
strings.evolution:
This still isn't it...
This is no true power...
strings.affinity:
...Accept this.
Now you can surpass even myself.
strings.fusion:
I am deeply interconnected
with darkness and hatred...

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia targeting the Wind Crystal located in Dirnado. Never making his intentions clear, Veritas of the Heavens only concerned himself with destroying the Crystal and obtaining the treasure sleeping within. When his true identity was revealed to be that of Lid's role model and hero, the young airship engineer suffered quite the shock.
strings.summon:
So you'd have even me as an ally...
What an incomprehensible lot, you are.
strings.affinity: ...This is the most I could do in my current state.
strings.fusion:
...Go ahead, if you must.
This body is temporary, anyway.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia targeting the Wind Crystal who encountered Rain and his friends in Dirnado. The identity of the man behind the armor of Veritas of the Heavens seems to be that of none other than the first Cid, a legendary and widely respected airship engineer. It was he who refurbished the airship known as the Invincible with the help of Lid's brother, Evan.
strings.summon:
So there was still enough...
Enough left of my memories
for me to become a vision.
strings.evolution:
What do you desire should
you attain my wind power?
strings.affinity: ...This is the most I could do in my current state.
strings.fusion:
If I am only to obey you,
then I understand.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who destroyed the Wind Crystal in order to claim the Heart of Babel hidden within it, and use it to make the airship known as the Invincible functional once again. Veritas of the Heavens is actually none other than the first Cid, a legendary airship engineer who many in the Industrial City of Dilmagia respect and admire.
strings.summon:
I wonder if it was my deepest wishes or
my dreams of soaring the skies that led me
to be crystallized as a vision...
strings.evolution:
When I'm with you, I remember...
I once chased after a dream of soaring through the skies.
strings.affinity: ...This is the most I could do in my current state.
strings.fusion: ...A fine wind is blowing, indeed.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who invaded Olderion. She used cruel and foul means to take the lives of many of Olderions citizens, including those of the family of Nichol, her longtime enemy. On the other hand, she has another gentle spoken side to her, though the source of this dangerous two-sided personality is unknown.
strings.summon:
Huh, you called on me?
You must really want a lot of power, huh?
strings.affinity:
All I can do to make up for...
No, never mind.
Shut up and take this.
strings.fusion:
It's okay, I will not betray you as a vision.
Now give me more power.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who took aim at Olderion's water crystal. The traps she used and inhuman deeds she commited against the citizens were especially harsh even for one of the Sworn Six, and though she was particularly hated by Nichol for having taken his family, having had memories so strong that she was brought back as a vision could only mean there is some other story behind her actions.
strings.summon:
As a vision, I feel like I can enjoy fighting
to my heart's content.
strings.evolution:
The feeling of one's true power
being awakened isn't so bad.
strings.affinity:
All I can do to make up for...
No, never mind.
Shut up and take this.
strings.fusion:
Since I'm going to fight,
why don't you give me more power?

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who attacked the citizens of Olderion. Later, after meeting Rain and his friends again, she was completely different, establishing that she indeed had a split personality. Though she was still hated by Nichol for having killed his family, the two developed mixed feelings for each other after learning of her true identity.
strings.summon:
To have called me even after
everything I've done...
How soft hearted you are.
strings.evolution:
Even though I was once a
loathsome enemy of yours...
Whatever, use me as you please.
strings.affinity:
All I can do to make up for...
No, never mind.
Shut up and take this.
strings.fusion:
You need my power, do you not?
Then go ahead and use it.

strings.description: An undogmatic man and one of the Six Sworn of Paladia who interfered with Rain and company's journey in Zoldaad. Not only is Veritas of the Flame extremely skilled in battle, but he is also a masterful blacksmith with a great curiosity for ancient weaponry. It would seem he shares strong ties with Lasswell's blade, Purple Lightning.
strings.summon:
How strange to be called forth
as a vision by the enemy.
strings.affinity:
We might've been good friends had
we not first met as enemies.
Say hello to the true me.
strings.fusion:
Ha ha ha, why not.
Try a little more, won't you.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Zoldaad. A large-hearted man who hardly concerns himself with insignificant things, Veritas of the Flame has unexpectedly shown an interest in watching Rain and Lasswell grow. Regardless, his desire to achieve his goals burns as brightly as the flames he summons forth, and he will stop at nothing to take the Fire Crystal from the hands of the Zoldaad Empire.
strings.summon:
You would actually count this shadow of
myself as one of your own?
What an interesting fellow.
strings.evolution:
I've been too weak up until now.
From now on, I'll show you what I'm really capable of.
strings.affinity:
We might've been good friends had
we not first met as enemies.
Say hello to the true me.
strings.fusion:
Not bad at all.
You're pretty tough, yourself.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Mysidia. Deeming Fina as a worthy opponent, Veritas of the Earth has been pursuing her in hopes of facing her in battle. However, he quickly loses all hope of fighting a deserving opponent upon realizing that she has lost both her powers and memory. A proud man, he looks down on the weak, but assesses everything with collected composure.
strings.summon:
Hmph.
I must have been quite strong to
have reappeared as a vision.
strings.affinity:
...Hmph.
This should suit you greedy humans.
strings.fusion:
It matters not.
Grant me more power.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Mysidia. Although Veritas of the Earth regarded Fina as a worthy opponent once, he is very disappointed to find out she has lost her powers and memory. And yet, as a warrior he still shows an unnaturally keen interest in her person. A proud soldier of his native world Paladia, his ego can sometimes get the best of him.
strings.summon:
This may just be an empty shadow of myself,
but do not take it lightly.
strings.evolution:
This is not my true power.
Allow me to advance even further.
strings.affinity:
...Hmph.
This should suit you greedy humans.
strings.fusion:
And...?
How long do you wish me to fight?

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Mysidia. Veritas of the Earth once admired Fina for her prowess as a warrior, and looked forward to facing her superior skills in battle someday. Unfortunately for him, however, she sided with Rain and his admiration turned into more of an unhealthy obsession. He was born from a noble family in his home of Paladia, and is said to have quickly climbed through the ranks of the Sworn Six.
strings.summon:
For you to have called upon me must mean
you can offer me a satisfying fight, correct?
strings.evolution:
You wish to draw out my true power?
If you think you can, then do so.
strings.affinity:
...Hmph.
This should suit you greedy humans.
strings.fusion:
Fine then.
Go ahead and try to please me.

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Mysidia. Veritas of the Light is extremely proud, and her motivation for realizing the group's ambitions is far greater than that of any other member. After learning that Rain has joined Sakura's cause, she displays a deep resentment for the young knight and ruthlessly attacks him. The intensity of her feelings was such that it manifested into a vision, although she does not pride herself on this.
strings.summon: Why have I become one of these visions...?
strings.affinity:
Hmph...
You who thirst for power, this should suit you.
strings.fusion:
I've no need for charity!
Do not make fun of me!

strings.description: One of the Sworn Six of Paladia who encountered Rain and his friends while they journeyed through Mysidia. Not only is Veritas of the Light Sakura's older sister, but she also seems to have a connection with Sir Raegen, Rain's father. Once a warrior of noble intentions long ago, it wasn't until a certain event occurred that her purity turned into furious resentment. She regrets that her own feelings manifested into a vision of herself.
strings.summon:
Visions... How provocative...
So you intend on controlling me too, do you?
strings.evolution:
Why do you grant me power?
Is it out of pity for me?
strings.affinity:
Hmph...
You who thirst for power, this should suit you.
strings.fusion: I have no plans of becoming friendly with any of you!

strings.description: An self-proclaimed adventurer, travelling the world in search of romance. Having read the legendary explorer Montana's auto-biography, "Montana's Adventure Log," at a young age, she decided to follow in his footsteps and become an adventurer herself, at which time she left her hometown. Though not particularly adeept at fighting, her quick wittedness has somehow helped her to continue along on her journey.
strings.summon:
My name is Helena.
You can call me the adventurer.
strings.affinity:
What a fun adventure it's been!
I'll be sure to write about
you all in my adventure log!
strings.fusion:
Have I been made stronger?
Let's go on a new adventure!

strings.description: A girl who, in following in the footsteps of the legendary adventurer Montana, stepped foot into Gronoa a little before Rain and his friends where she then began investigating. Upon examining an underground castle, accompanied by a mercenary named Camille, she came across the dwelling an elven couple of the nowadays rarely seen elven race, as well as an important document detailing one of their friends.
strings.summon:
The reason for travelling is
to get lost in the adventure.
That's all I need.
strings.evolution:
Hmm... Am I stronger?
I wonder if I'm any better at
reading ancient writings and such.
strings.affinity:
What a fun adventure it's been!
I'll be sure to write about
you all in my adventure log!
strings.fusion:
I can investigate more dangerous areas
if I just get a little stronger.

strings.description: An adventurer traveling all around the world. Though following in the footsteps of a legendary explorer, along with the mercenary Camille she came across something in an underground castle greater than anything the man she looked up to could have found. The stories she discovered, those of Bran and Lunera of the elves, as well as their friend, the dwarf Ruggles, would come to be known by everyone around the world.
strings.summon:
One day, I'm going to write a book
about all of my adventures.
That is my dream.
strings.evolution:
I wasn't very confident in my skills,
but thanks to you all I feel
I can do a little better now.
strings.affinity:
What a fun adventure it's been!
I'll be sure to write about
you all in my adventure log!
strings.fusion:
I would like to record this
experience in my travel log.

strings.description: A white mage from the Kingdom of Pharm, she is highly relied upon being one of the few healers from a land full of monks and samurai. She was taught the art of magic by Sakura, and still holds her in high regards as her master to this day.
strings.summon: White magic is sure to come in handy.
strings.affinity:
I must thank you for having such faith in me.
Here, have some candies or whatever.
strings.fusion: I'm happy if I can be of use.
