strings.description: One of the few girls capable of using white magic from the Kingdom of Pharm. Though her and Sakura share a teacher-student relationship, with Ayaka trying to earn her master's favor with delicious candies every time they meet, Sakura things this is a bit much to deal with.
strings.summon:
I have confidence in my white magic.
Please make use of my talents.
strings.evolution:
Now I should be able to be
acknowledged even by my master.
strings.affinity:
I must thank you for having such faith in me.
Here, have some candies or whatever.
strings.fusion:
Give me more power, MORE!
I want to support everyone!

strings.description: A magical creature called a "sprite" that was known to dwell in the forests long ago. Although sprites like Timothy are only ever seen in fairy-tales nowadays, even scholars who specialize in the subject have yet to agree on whether they ever existed in the first place. However, the personality of this particular sprite who reappeared as a vision of his former self closely resembles that of the charmful tricksters so often heard from in fables.
strings.summon:
If you make fun of me for being small,
I'll write stuff all over your face!
strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.fusion: Give me some more of that power you have!

strings.description: A sprite from times past who dwelled in a small village within the forest with other magical creatures. Recent discoveries have found that Timothy and many others like him lost their homes at the hands of humans, who sought to further expand their territories. Many believe that this traumatic experience is what caused him to return as a vision, but asking him directly yields no straight answers, as he jokingly evades the question every time.
strings.summon:
You use a very interesting kind of magic.
Mind if I tag along?
strings.evolution:
I am stronger now.
It's like the protection of the forest gods.
strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.fusion:
What kind of mischief should I get up to
now that I have this power?
Haha, just kidding!

strings.description: A young sprite from ancient times who fought to protect his village as it faced utter destruction by human hands. Sprites such as Timothy have been said to be blessed with amazing longevity, usually making them much older than what their youthful appearance tends to indicate. Although many agree that sprites disappeared from the world when their homes were destroyed by mankind, some theories claim that they actually ceded their lands to humans out of pity. Feeling sorry for their short and delicate lives, sprites are said to watch over humanity in secret to this day.
strings.summon:
Humans just can't stop fighting, can they?
That's okay, I'll help as much as I can.
strings.evolution:
This is the power of the fairies, you know.
Wanna see how far I can go?
strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.fusion:
More! MORE!
I want to become stronger for you!

strings.description: A moogle that serves King Mog in the Farplane, kupo! If you haven't heard, this moogle is a brave soul that has defeated many an enemy within the walls of the castle. An admirable warrior indeed, kupo! Moogles may be small and cute, but they hide tremendous and unimaginable power... You don't believe me? It's true, kupo!
strings.summon:
Did you call me, kupo?
It's the Mog's turn to shine, kupo!
strings.affinity:
It's been a fun adventure with you, kupo!
I wish to give you this bubbly feeling as proof of our friendship, kupo.
strings.fusion:
With power like this,
it doesn't matter what kind of monster it is,
I'm not scared, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle that serves King Mog in the Farplane, kupo! This moogle is such a go-getter that it was even entrusted with King Mog's personal guard. That's not to say that our king needs any help with monsters though. King Mog can easily destroy most of them in the blink of an eye, kupo! That's why this little moogle is so eager for a chance to prove its true abilities. Adventure awaits, kupo!
strings.summon:
Just guarding the castle that
whole time got kind of boring, kupo!
I'll show you what I can do, kupo!
strings.evolution:
If you think us mogs are just cute,
then you've got another thing comin', kupo!
strings.affinity:
It's been a fun adventure with you, kupo!
I wish to give you this bubbly feeling as proof of our friendship, kupo.
strings.fusion: You still have yet to see the true power of us mogs, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle that serves King Mog in the Farplane, kupo! There are many strong moogles who guard the king, but this particular moogle has proved itself above all others. You have to believe me, kupo! Moogle has been a fierce protector of the castle for quite some time now. If you ask me though, I think it would much rather find a place where it can really prove its worth, kupo!
strings.summon:
I'm a famous soldier back in our
castle in the Farplane, kupo!
I'll show you exactly why, kupo!
strings.evolution:
ku, ku, ku, kupo!
I'll show you what I can do, kupo!
strings.affinity:
It's been a fun adventure with you, kupo!
I wish to give you this bubbly feeling as proof of our friendship, kupo.
strings.fusion: This mog may just have become a bit too powerful, kupo!

strings.description: A ruffian nicknamed "the Thunder Blade," who ran around the world with his friend named "the Wind Spear." Though it is said he commited many thief-like acts tens of years before Rain's time, the accounts of him helping the weak made the legendary stories of him very popular. Still, what he was actually like remains a mystery.
strings.summon:
Bow to my shocking assault!
Guromu, the Thunder Blade, is here!
strings.affinity:
I have a treasure for you!
Please take it!
strings.fusion:
This isn't bad at all, is it!
You've quite the eye!

strings.description: A man nicknamed "the Thunder Blade" who ran around with his accomplice Aura, "the Wind Spear," saving the weak, and hacking down the strong. Known for their pompous way of talking, a story based on them became a huge hit as soon as they disappeared. Because of this, what they were really like is still shrowded in mystery.
strings.summon:
Before those who desire it,
this blade crashes down like lightning!
Leave everything to me!
strings.evolution:
Oh!?
With power like this, even Sister Wind Spear
might acknowledge me.
strings.affinity:
I have a treasure for you!
Please take it!
strings.fusion:
Huh?
Where are these beasts you want gone hiding?

strings.description: A ruffian warrior which tens of years ago ran about the world with his partner Aura, "the Wind Spear." Many books were based on them and their pompous ways of speaking and chivalrous thief-like ways, which are beloved by boys and girls. As a vision, he is still no match for his partner, just as it was written in the books.
strings.summon:
My blade is like an endless storm!
Guromu, the Thunder Blade, has arrived!
strings.evolution:
Sister Wind Spear is the only one who
need not bow before my lightning!
strings.affinity:
I have a treasure for you!
Please take it!
strings.fusion:
Those you wish to lay to rest,
I shall destroy them in an instant!

strings.description: A ruffian warrior who goes by the name "the Wind Spear," and travels the world with her companion Guromu, "the Thunder Blade." Though she lived many years before Rain's time, her vision was every bit as exaggerated as how she was written in the mystery full stories which would come to be read by boys and girls.
strings.summon:
Feel this blowing wind!
Aura, the Wind Spear, is here!
strings.affinity:
Y'all are pretty good folks, you know that!
Here, this is for you!
strings.fusion:
How nice this power is!
You have good sense!

strings.description: Part of a two man group of ruffians that once ran around the world tens of years ago, she was nicknamed "the Wind Spear." Though she would often steal from the wealthy, she was a chivalrous thief in that she would also exterminate monsters for poor villages, but since she led such an unprecedented life, little is actually known about her.
strings.summon:
Before those who desire it,
this spear appears like a sudden breeze.
Your wish is my command!
strings.evolution:
What a fine wind is blowing!
I wish my good friend the Thunder Blade
were here to feel it!
strings.affinity:
Y'all are pretty good folks, you know that!
Here, this is for you!
strings.fusion:
Well then!
Who is it you wish me to cut through?

strings.description: A spear-wielding girl known as "the Wind Spear" who was part of a two man group of ruffians who would eventually become legends. Though they would take from the strong to aid the weak, their pompous ways of speaking and unprecedented lifestyle saw to it that as soon as they disappeared they became legends. She also seemed to really enjoy herself.
strings.summon:
My spear is like a powerful tornado!
Aura, the Wind Spear, has arrived!
strings.evolution: No one can stop this wind!
strings.affinity:
Y'all are pretty good folks, you know that!
Here, this is for you!
strings.fusion:
All who wish to be sliced apart,
line up in front!

strings.description: A knight captain, once known in Grandshelt as the twin blade general. Being already retired, outside of being strict on her successive knights, she seems to be acquainted with Rain's father Raegen. After the attack of the Veritas, she became curious about their movements, only to appear as her youthful self.
strings.summon:
Hmph...
To recall such days of ole.
strings.affinity:
This is my thank you for allowing
me to fight once again
as a knight.
strings.fusion:
My twin blades may yet become sharp
enough that they can protect the people.

strings.description: Once, before Rain's time, she led all Grandshelt's knights as the twin blade general, but now she only instructs her successors. Very lively, she was something of a "demon teacher" to Rain in his youth. Talented in both military and literary arts, and distrought at what the world is coming to, her strong visions manifested as a vision. This vision was of when she was a young knight.
strings.summon:
Were you surprised by the old me?
Grandshelt's twin blade general
shall fight once again!
strings.evolution:
Grandshelt's twin blade general!
You had best remember this name!
strings.affinity:
This is my thank you for allowing
me to fight once again
as a knight.
strings.fusion:
I will absolutely use this power
for the sake of my people.
As a knight of Grandshelt.

strings.description: A young genius from Mysidia. However, he since he was raised in Dilmagia, he is skilled not only with magic but also with machines. All of the research that he poured his magic and knowledge of machinery into resulted in him developing the magic arms that float beside him. By freely manipulating these arms, Kelsus is able to stand up to even the greatest of foes.
strings.summon:
I think it's important to obtain
as much experience as possible.
Please take me somewhere interesting.
strings.affinity: Both magic and knowledge can be good or bad depending on who uses them. However, I get the feeling I can trust you.
strings.fusion:
If I were to obtain new knowledge,
then I should do my very best to figure
out how to put it to good use.

strings.description: A young genius from Mysidia who freely wields a pair of giant magic arms. He is able to analyze and understand any machine with a single glance. Thanks to his genius, and even despite his young age, it is said their is no end the the invitations he receives to join various government agencies. However, he declines every one of them, prefering to focus on his own research.
strings.summon:
Leave all the magic and machinery to me!
I'm sure I'll be of help to you all!
strings.evolution:
My magic arms have been upgraded!
I should be of more use to you now!
strings.affinity: Both magic and knowledge can be good or bad depending on who uses them. However, I get the feeling I can trust you.
strings.fusion: My magic arms are moving more smoothly than ever before!

strings.description: A girl once interested in both magic and becoming a knight of Grandshelt, she would go on to become one of Mysidia's spellblades. The power of the spellblade was thought to be special and only attainable by citizens of Mysidia, but as research has continued, now even outsiders can obtain it with proper training.
strings.summon:
Well now, isn't that unusual.
To think I could become a vision.
strings.affinity:
I am actually from Grandshelt.
As members of the same homeland,
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion: Hmm, so this is how you enhance the magic of visions.

strings.description: A girl who, though born into a family of Grandshelt knights, would later move to Mysidia where she would come to obtain a magic sword. She was told by her family to bring her powers back and serve as a knight, but since she was not into how strict the life of a knight was, she decided to remain in Mysidia.
strings.summon:
I'm a modern-day magic swordswoman.
I'm not as secretive as my
counterparts from the past.
strings.evolution:
I see...
If you keep training,
you can obtain power like this.
strings.affinity:
I am actually from Grandshelt.
As members of the same homeland,
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion:
That is how you train.
The way of the knight or whatever it is,
there's no complaining about it.

strings.description: A girl who after studying to become a knight of Grandshelt, went on to become a spellblade in Mysidia. She was one to chase after her dreams, and a large part of the reason she decided to become a magic swordswoman was from her admiration for Rakshasa who she read about in stories when she was young. Her dream now is to somehow get to Ardra, home of the magic swordsmen.
strings.summon: Us modern magic swordsmen must be stylish.
strings.evolution:
I feel I've grown even stronger of the
magical swordswoman talked about in fairy tales.
strings.affinity:
I am actually from Grandshelt.
As members of the same homeland,
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion:
Both my magic and sword skills are on point.
Being a vision is remarkable!

strings.description: A young samurai from the Kingdom of Pharm who protects his people. He is a little off compared to those around him, having taken to studying the now lost bushido from texts handed down over the generations. He is proud of his distant ancestors who would commit harakiri.
strings.summon:
You are my master, right?
I'll do everything I can for you!
strings.affinity:
This is the bond between lord and servant.
I'm so moved I feel I could do
anything for you!
strings.fusion:
You have given me power.
I am both happy and grateful.

strings.description: A young boy who, in the Kingdom of Pharm with its distinctive culture, lives his day as a samurai, a people unique to the region. In a time when the culture of master and servant has faded, he swore an oath to his people, mainly carrying out monster eradications and investigations. Though proud in his job, he longs for the return of bushido. His way of speaking is also somewhat unusual.
strings.summon:
As a samurai, it was always my dream
to have a sole master to serve!
strings.evolution:
Oh!
This is how you get your
blade to ring true!
strings.affinity:
This is the bond between lord and servant.
I'm so moved I feel I could do
anything for you!
strings.fusion:
I can be of use wielding the power
you have bestowed me, Master!

strings.description: A samurai who protects the people of the Kingdom of Pharm. He took a great interest in bushido after learning about his ancestors Shiki, dreaming of its revival. Though he is usually very serious about his job taking care of monsters and keeping the peace, there are times when, unable to make sense of it all, he just wants to commit harakiri.
strings.summon:
As a samurai in service of a sole master,
I swear to give it my all!
strings.evolution: I realize I've taken a step further in bushido.
strings.affinity:
This is the bond between lord and servant.
I'm so moved I feel I could do
anything for you!
strings.fusion:
You've given me so much power, Master...
I am so very thankful!

strings.description: A descendant from a long line of ninjas in the Kingdom of Pharm, she is an optimistic girl who doesn't sweat the small stuff. Though a modern girl who often worries her family with her longing for other countries, she has another deeper, darker side which includes her talents with a sickle and chain.
strings.summon:
What is this...vision?
Awesome!
It's like a fairy tale!
strings.affinity:
I don't care much about ninja law,
but I am very thankful to you!
strings.fusion:
Huh? This is power?
I have become stronger, huh.

strings.description: Born into a family of ninjas who work in the shadows, she excels at ninjutsu and the sickle and chain, but not much else. She thinks that being a ninja is too old-fashioned, longing to be like the spies from the Zoldaad Empire. However, she is constantly being yelled at as despite having natural talent, she is always skipping out on her training.
strings.summon:
He he he, that's it.
As long as I'm a vision,
I can't be yelled at for leaving home.
strings.evolution:
Hey look!
I can shoot out an aura now!
strings.affinity:
I don't care much about ninja law,
but I am very thankful to you!
strings.fusion:
While we're off fighting, would you mind
teaching me about other countries?

strings.description: Despite being a descendant of a ninja family with a rich history, this modern girl rarely takes her training seriously. Though she longed to be like the spies from other nations, lately she has taken up interest in a ninja called Miyuki, a descendant of a samurai family who became absorbed in darkness. However, there was no awakening of any dark power for this bright girl and her endless positivity.
strings.summon:
Visions are amazing!
I don't know much about the world,
but I wanna go with you because it seems fun!
strings.evolution:
Incredible!
This strong light is so mesmerizing!
strings.affinity:
I don't care much about ninja law,
but I am very thankful to you!
strings.fusion:
Hmph...huh?
You strengthened...me?
How curious...

strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world. One of the warriors of light whose coming was foretold in the prophecies of old. The four warriors of light arrived in the land of Cornelia, each bearing a crystal that had lost its light, and with no memories to speak of. In time, they realized that the crystals they held were inextricably linked to the four elements that sustained their world, and set off on a journey to instill them with light anew.
strings.summon:
Is it the crystals that guide me here?
No matter, my strength shall be yours!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
Until the crystals shine bright
once more, I shall not
abandon my quest!

strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world. A legendary warrior who, with the blessing of the crystals, did battle with the shadows and saved the world. Arriving in the land of Cornelia, they saved Princess Sarah from the clutches of the rogue knight Garland, the first step in a journey which would see them restore light to the crystals. In listening to the tales of the people in the lands they explored, they gradually uncovered the true nature of the darkness that threatened the realm.
strings.summon:
A world threatened by the darkness...?
Yes, this shall be my new battlefield!
strings.evolution:
I feel new powers awakening...
Is this a gift from the dragon king?
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
I must grow stronger, that we
may at last break free from
the bonds of chaos!

strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world and one of the legendary warriors who, with the blessing of the crystals, did battle with the shadows. Setting off on a quest to restore the Crystals' shine, he and his companions learn of the existence of Chaos, the demon shrouding the world in darkness. The four fiends that eventually spring from Chaos are vanquished by the Warriors of Light, who then confront the perpetrator of all this turmoil by traveling 2,000 years into the past.
strings.summon:
I have no name or memories.
However, I have the will to move forward.
Let us cut a path forward.
strings.evolution:
This light will lead me to greatness!
I have the power to crush the dark!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
As long as there's light, I will fight!
Whatever obstacles may lie ahead,
I'll ne'er stop, until I'm dead!

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. He was the finest knight in all the kingdom of Cornelia, but when Princess Sarah rebuffed his love, he kidnapped her and barricaded himself in the Chaos Shrine. Four Warriors of Light, under command from the king, struck down Garland in his depravity and it seemed that his evil desires would be thwarted—but it was not to be. Escaping from death, Garland was drawn back through time to be reborn, two millennia in the past, as the immortal god known as Chaos.
strings.summon:
Ahahaha!
Do you remember me?
Of course you do! I am Garland!
strings.fusion:
I seek a strength that will silence all!
This paltry power cannot sate me!

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. He kidnapped the princess of his kingdom, Princess Sarah, and barricaded himself and the princess in the Chaos Shrine, until he was eventually struck down by the Warriors of Light. But instead of meeting death's final embrace, Garland was pulled back in time to be reborn, two thousand years in the past, as the being known as Chaos. To maintain his immortal existence, he sends the four fiends—one for each of the elements: wind, water, earth, and fire—into the future, to appear every two centuries to drain power from the Crystals and bring eternity within his grasp.
strings.summon:
I am the one who lives forever.
The dark presence, Chaos.
You would seek my power?
strings.evolution:
Chaos...
That shall be my new name as I lead the world to its destruction.
strings.fusion:
Yes... I feel it filling me now!
A power to equal that of the
Crystals themselves!

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. He was struck down by the Warriors of Light, but escaped death by traveling two thousand years into the past to be reborn as the dark god Chaos. From there he sends his four fiends into the future to steal power from the Crystals, fuelling his endless cycle of reincarnation. With each repetition of the cycle, the resentment he feels over the princess's rejection of his love grows within him.
strings.summon:
You seek to wield the power of chaos?
Intriguing! But do you have the strength to see this through?
strings.evolution:
Ahahahaha!
Yes, give me more power! MORE!
strings.affinity:
I live in an endless cycle of rebirth.
It would get rather dull without anyone
else to amuse myself with!
strings.fusion:
You would make an offering to me?
Then I accept. Behold the
true power of Chaos!

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. After Garland suffers defeat at the hands of the Warriors of Light in the Chaos Shrine, he uses the power of the four fiends to escape to the past. Now 2,000 years behind in time, he uses his power to recreate the four fiends anew whilst accumulating enough energy to send his future self to the past once again. He hoped this would create and endless cycle in which he would live for eternity.
strings.summon:
Leave none who dare stand
before us standing!
strings.evolution:
Time is always moving...
I will continue on living!
strings.affinity:
I live in an endless cycle of rebirth.
It would get rather dull without anyone
else to amuse myself with!
strings.fusion:
No one can escape their fate!
No matter how much you struggle,
you're destined to meet the same end.

strings.description: A princess from the far-off world of Corneria, whose story is sung in a tale of the Warriors of Light. Raised with care by the king and queen, she has a sister whom she looks after dutifully. Beloved throughout the realm for her beauty and kindness, she is kidnapped by the fallen knight Garland and imprisoned in the Chaos Shrine. In time, she is rescued by the Warriors of Light and returns to the castle, where she prays for the heroes' safety in their journey to restore the light of the crystals.
strings.summon:
You truly think I can help?
Then I am honored to accompany you.
strings.fusion:
This mysterious power...
It feels so warm...
Is this the power of the Crystals?

strings.description: A princess from the far-off world of Corneria, whose story is sung in a tale of the Warriors of Light. Beautiful and kind, she is beloved by all in the realm. Her kidnapping and imprisonment at the hands of the fallen knight Garland devastates the kingdom, but she is rescued by the Warriors of Light. She entrusts to the heroes her magic lute, which grants them passage to their final confrontation with Chaos, and the end of their long journey.
strings.summon:
I feel the power of light within you.
Pray allow me to fight by your side.
strings.evolution:
It's just like the light within those four...
If I grow stronger, I'll be able to help everyone too!
strings.affinity:
I must thank you...
For teaching me that I am also strong enough to walk this path at your side.
strings.fusion:
Will this infusion of power bring me
closer to the Warriors of Light...?

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. He lost his parents at a young age and was taken in by another family. He was like a true brother to their two children, Maria and Leon, and to Guy, another parentless child who came to live with them. When his homeland is destroyed by the Palamecian army, he is forced to flee. After leaving Fynn, he and his friends encounter Princess Hilda, the leader of the rebel army, and are saved by her. Without any home to return to, he, Maria, and Guy throw their lot in with the rebels.
strings.summon:
The Empire took everything from me.
Are you fighting to reclaim peace, too?
Then I'll gladly join you!
strings.fusion:
The wild rose...
It is how we recognize one another.
The very reason for our struggle.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. His homeland, Fynn, is targeted by the Palamecian Empire, whose aim is to rule the entire world. Firion loses his home and joins the rebellion, along with his friends and fellow survivors, Maria and Guy. They throw themselves into the fight against the empire. Firion has a strong sense of justice and the wise judgment needed in a leader, yet also a certain weakness when it comes to women, which allows him to be tricked by the pirate Leila, and even once by a monster disguised as Princess Hilda.
strings.summon:
I won't bend to oppression.
I'll fight for my ideals to the end!
If you feel the same, let us go forth together!
strings.evolution:
I will summon every last bit of my strength...
That we may all live in peace again!
strings.fusion:
I've learned to be wary of women,
and anyone offering me a free ride.
Should I trust in this power?

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. To defeat the Palamecian Empire, which destroyed his homeland, he joins the rebel army led by Fynn's own Princess Hilda. His friend and adopted brother Leon also survived the fall of Fynn, but now stands against him as a key member of the Palamecian army. Firion loses many allies, including the White Wizard Minwu, and is toyed with continually by cruel fate, but never do his eyes stray from his goal: to put a stop to the Emperor of Palamecia.
strings.summon:
I won't let my friends' sacrifices be in vain!
I'll build a new future with my own hands!
strings.evolution:
I will take back what we've lost!
That is why we've come this far!
strings.affinity:
My friends give me strength.
Nothing would make me happier than to make you feel the same.
strings.fusion:
I will not stand down from this fight.
This is our battle...
You have to let us finish it!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Firion joined the rebel army led by Princess Hilda in order to recover his homeland of Fynn from the clutches of the Palamecian Empire. Unfortunately, however, the war costs Firion many of his allies and he is left to cope with the grief accompanying their loss. Eventually he welcomes back his childhood friend turned Dark Knight for the empire, Leon, and together they face off against the Emperor seeking to destroy their world.
strings.summon:
It seems you are able to fight without
giving up on your dreams, as well.
Allow me to assist you.
strings.evolution:
No matter what trials befall us,
we must keep moving forward.
strings.affinity:
My friends give me strength.
Nothing would make me happier than to make you feel the same.
strings.fusion:
Believe in the future, and push forward!
That's all you've got to do!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in a tale of rebels and empires, in a far-flung world. Raised in Fynn with her elder brother Leon and fellow orphans Firion and Guy, she exudes a kindly confidence despite being lonely at heart. After losing her parents and being separated from her beloved brother after an attack by the Empire, she pledges herself to the rebellion alongside her friends.
strings.summon:
War frightens me. War took from me my home, my family...
I would fight with you to protect what you hold dear.
strings.fusion:
I'm going to do everything I can...
to end this war as quickly as possible!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in a tale of rebels and empires, in a far-flung world. Driven from her homeland after a strike by the Palamecian Empire, she joins the rebellion alongside her childhood friends Firion and Guy. She worries deeply for the fate of her lost brother, and is devastated when he reemerges before her as the evil emperor's Dark Knight. Though strong of spirit, she is profoundly affected by the death and suffering around her, and wishes nothing more than to regain the peace she once knew.
strings.summon: I don't want to lose any more of my friends. I don't want to see anyone else hurt. So I will go with you...to stop this war!
strings.evolution: I must put an end to this terrible conflict, that everyone may live together in peace once more!
strings.affinity:
We will need your strength if we hope to ever live in peace again.
I hope you will continue to aid us.
strings.fusion:
Leon... Firion... Guy...
I miss how the four of us were,
back when we were all still together...

strings.description: A young lady who appears in a tale of rebels and empires, in a far-flung world. Maria joins the rebel army alongside Firion and Guy, and together they succeed in liberating Fynn after rescuing the captured Princess Hilda. Eventually they learn that the Palamecian Empire's Dark Knight is none other than Leon, which rocks Maria to the core. When Leon sought to crown himself the new emperor after the original Emperor's , Maria volunteers to help her brother regain his senses. Although stubborn by nature, Leon is moved by Maria's words and rejoins his friends.
strings.summon:
I'm looking for my long-lost brother.
If you know anything about him,
please let me know.
strings.evolution:
I wish there was no fighting in the world,
then no one would have to die...
strings.affinity:
We will need your strength if we hope to ever live in peace again.
I hope you will continue to aid us.
strings.fusion:
I can't allow myself to die
until I'm reunited with my family.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Guy was taken in by Leon and Maria's parents along with the orphaned Firion as part of their family. He boasts of great physical power to match his bulky and gigantic stature, but contrary to what his appearance may lead others to believe, is very gentle and kind in nature. His eloquence with words leaves much to be desired, however, as being raised by wolves when he was a babe impaired his ability to speak from infancy.
strings.summon:
I will follow you.
I, now with you.
My power, now yours.
strings.affinity:
I am happy with you.
Our journey was fun.
Fight more, with me!
strings.fusion:
I'm stronger.
Still, I can grow stronger.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Guy possesses both an superhuman strength and a massive physical frame not present in any of his other adoptive siblings--Firion, Leon, and Maria. However, contrary to what his appearance may suggest, he is a kind a gentle soul at heart. Guy's ability to speak is no better than a child's after having been raised by wolves during the earliest years of his infancy. Curiously enough though, he is rumored to have been able to understand animals.
strings.summon:
I can understand animals.
They want to save you.
Surely, they will be of help.
strings.evolution:
Leave it to me.
I will protect everyone.
I will not lose!
strings.affinity:
I am happy with you.
Our journey was fun.
Fight more, with me!
strings.fusion:
Are there giant beavers
in this world, as well?

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Guy is a gentle-hearted lad of great prowess and stature who decided to join the rebel army alongside Firion and Maria after his homeland of Fynn met its destruction at the hands of the Emperor. He uses both his strength and his unique ability to communicate with animals in order to protect his friends throughout their journey. Vowing to fight until peace returns to their world, Guy continues supporting Firion every step of the way.
strings.summon:
You and me, now friends.
Friends make me happy.
I can try even harder.
strings.evolution:
I will end the fight.
I won't let anyone die.
No one!
strings.affinity:
I am happy with you.
Our journey was fun.
Fight more, with me!
strings.fusion:
I am happy.
With this power,
I can protect my friends.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Leon is older brother to Maria, and adoptive brother to Firion and Guy. Eventually he loses his parents to the invasion of the Palamecian Empire that strikes his homeland, and becomes separated from his siblings after suffering an attack by a Dark Knight. Lead astray by the circumstances surrounding him, he comes to believe that power is everything and joins forces with the empire, where his skill is immediately recognized and rewarded.
strings.summon:
It was you who called upon me?
You think you can beat me?
strings.affinity:
To have supported me,
a betrayer of my homeland, for so long...
You're quite a curious one.
strings.fusion:
I've become stronger!
There's no way I'm letting go
of this new power!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. After the Palamecian Empire gains control of Fynn, Leon leaves the empire's forces to become the Dark Knight. He is then tasked with the building of the Dreadnought and serves as the right-hand man of the Emperor, doing his bidding throughout the land. Leon encounters Firion and the others under the guise of the Dark Knight numerous times, but it was not until they heard him speak that his sister Maria recognized his true identity.
strings.summon:
Rest assured,
I will not abandon my responsibilities
and leave you in the thick of it.
strings.evolution:
What is it that rules over all?
It's power, I tell you!
strings.affinity:
To have supported me,
a betrayer of my homeland, for so long...
You're quite a curious one.
strings.fusion:
This power is mine!
I'm not giving it to anyone!

strings.description: The ruler of the empire that a rebel army opposes in tales from a distant world. The Emperor stands atop the war-hungry empire of Palamecia, and is a man with no regard for human life. Capable of terrible magic, he summons demonic forces from hell into the mortal realm to destroy the world. After leaving the kingdoms of Deist and Kashuan in ruins, he subjugates the remaining territories around him to his merciless rule. Even more disconcerting, however, he has also begun the construction of the Dreadnought, a war machine of great power capable of ruthless destruction.
strings.summon:
You require my power?
It will be quite costly, you know.
strings.affinity:
Ha ha ha ha...
I approve of your service to me.
strings.fusion:
You're quite thoughtful.
I shall use this gift you have given me.

strings.description: The ruler of the empire that a rebel army opposes in tales from a distant world. The Emperor is the leader of the war-hungry empire of Palamecia, and a cruel man who believes in using any means necessary to satisfy his ambitions. He also views the rebel army based in Altair as nothing more than a source of entertainment on his path to world domination. However, he does kidnap the rebel army's leader Princess Hilda, in order to draw Firion and his friends to him. Not only does this lead to their first face to face encounter, but this underhanded tactic also results in the rebels' capture.
strings.summon:
What a feast we have before us.
I shall personally accompany you.
strings.evolution: Bow before my power!
strings.affinity:
Ha ha ha ha...
I approve of your service to me.
strings.fusion:
I will crush the hopes and dreams
of all those pitiful little insects.

strings.description: An elusive thief who appears in a tale of empires and rebels, told in a faraway world. His claim to be the best thief in the world is undisputed, provided you don't ask anyone else. No-one, though, can fault his moral fiber, as he steals only from the dastardly Empire. His infiltration of Castle Palamecia was an indubitable display of his talents, but his constant braggadocio has a tendency to wear on his companions.
strings.summon:
I'm Paul, greatest thief in all the world!
There's no loot I can't pilfer or pinch!
strings.fusion:
I always pay my debts.
Paul, greatest thief in all the world,
will pay you back, all right!

strings.description: An elusive thief who appears in a tale of empires and rebels, told in a faraway world. An honorable type who boasts that the Empire holds no ill-gotten treasure he cannot reappropriate, he won fame for infiltrating the nigh-impregnable Castle Palamecia. Sometimes saving, sometimes being saved by Firion and his fellow rebels, he provides them with valuable weapons and information after the liberation of his hometown of Fynn.
strings.summon: Leave the looting to Paul, the greatest thief the world has ever seen! Surely you've heard of me?
strings.evolution:
So you're a collector, too?
Do you need to me to steal you something?
strings.affinity:
That's it! I like you.
What do you say?
Come steal a fortune with me!
strings.fusion:
You want to hear about the time I snuck into Palamecia?
Sure, I used a kite to land on the roof...
Hey! Wait! What, you don't believe me!?

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. The Onion Knight is an orphan who was raised along with three others by an elder in the village of Ur. When he goes to explore the Altar Cave one fateful day, the Wind Crystal enshrined within chooses him as one of four Warriors of Light destined to save the world. This task would send him on a journey where he could share hope with friends who would come and go, ridding the world of the darkness consuming it one step at a time.
strings.summon:
O-o-ouch...
I-I fell into a hole in the ground!
strings.affinity:
I have had many friends who
have helped me out.
It's my turn now to help you!
strings.fusion:
In order to use this much power,
one must have enough capacity in their soul!

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. The Onion Knight is one of four orphans chosen by the Wind Crystal as one of the Warriors of Light destined to save the world. On his journey to complete his mission, he meets a mysterious and amnesiac man named Desch, a priestess named Aria who serves the Water Crystal, the mages Doga and Unei, and many others. Together they would fight the darkness taking over and find whomever had unleashed it upon the world.
strings.summon: So you received power from a talking crystal and decided to head out on a journey!?
strings.evolution:
Alright!
That strenghthened me up a bit.
strings.affinity:
I have had many friends who
have helped me out.
It's my turn now to help you!
strings.fusion:
I will not misuse this power
that you have given me!

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Like Arc, Luneth is an orphan raised by Elder Topapa in the village of Ur. A very active boy with a strong sense of morality, he is definitely a leader type figure amongst the other children of the village. However, his recklessness can prove to be his weakness at times. On a fateful day, Luneth went to explore the Altar Cave and received a revelation from the Crystal enshrined within. Incredulous, yet willing, he then set off on a journey to save the world.
strings.summon:
I give up.
I mean, what am I even doing here?
strings.affinity:
I've finally gotten used to this world.
Must be from hanging around with you!
strings.fusion:
I've no idea the difference
between light and dark...
I just feel there's something I must do!

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Luneth, who saved the neighboring village of Kazus and Castle Sasune from the cursed place upon them by the Djinn, set off on a journey as one of the chosen Warriors of Light to save the world with his childhood friend Arc, the blacksmith's adopted daughter Refia, and Castle Sasune's soldier Ingus. As they wandered from place to place, they searched for the source of the darkness enveloping the world, eventually closing in on the secret surrounding their birth.
strings.summon:
I am Luneth.
I came to this world by the guidance of the crystals.
strings.evolution:
Alright!
I can tell our adventures are gonna get even better!
strings.affinity:
I've finally gotten used to this world.
Must be from hanging around with you!
strings.fusion:
I can't believe us orphans were
selected by the Warrior of Light.
I wonder if there was some special reason?

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Like Luneth, Arc is an orphan raised by Elder Topapa in the village of Ur. Very mature for his age, he would rather spend his time reading books instead of playing outside. This leads other children in the village to bully him and call him a coward, which prompts him to head for the neighboring village of Kazus alone to fight off the ghosts apparently haunting it in order to prove them wrong.
strings.summon:
Please allow me to accompany you.
I want to show that I'm not some crybaby...
strings.affinity:
It's thanks to you that I've
been able to do as well as I have.
I look forward to working with you, more!
strings.fusion:
I think that made me a little bit stronger.
I have to try even harder, now...

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Arc set off on a journey as one of the chosen Warriors of Light to save the world with his childhood friend Luneth, the blacksmith's adopted daughter Refia, and Castle Sasune's soldier Ingus. They faced many trials and tribulations during their adventures, but Arc, who had gained so much knowledge from the books he loved to read, is said to have never failed in presenting a solution to all the problems they encountered time and time again.
strings.summon:
Umm... Can I come along?
I'm pretty sure I can be of use to you...
strings.evolution:
Awesome!
I can't believe I had such powers
hiding inside of me!
strings.affinity:
It's thanks to you that I've
been able to do as well as I have.
I look forward to working with you, more!
strings.fusion: There are so many things in this world that you can't learn from books.

strings.description: A young boy hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Arc set off on a journey as one of the chosen Warriors of Light to save the world along with his friends. Though an avid book reader and a gentle soul, his low self-esteem always made him feel wanting. When he and his friends visited Saronia as part of their journey, they met the exiled Prince Alus, whom Arc helped to gain confidence. This, of course, changed Arc himself as well, helping him grow into the person he was meant to be.
strings.summon: I don't know of how much use I can be to you, but I'd sure like to try!
strings.evolution:
My power is overflowing!
I can't believe I was capable of becoming this strong!
strings.affinity:
It's thanks to you that I've
been able to do as well as I have.
I look forward to working with you, more!
strings.fusion: Seeing someone giving it their all really motivates you to be courageous yourself.

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Refia is a very willful young lady who was raised in the village of Kazus by the mythril smith Takka. Disliking the strict smithing training her father forces upon her, she has run away from home numerous times. Having escaped the curse of the Djinn that struck her village by having run off to skip out on her training one day, she eventually joins Luneth and the others in order to save her foster father and the other villagers.
strings.summon:
What the--?!
Wh-who are you guys?
strings.affinity:
I didn't like my blacksmith training,
but I sure do like fighting alongside you!
strings.fusion:
Wow!
I almost thought I was going to be turned into a frog!

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. The adopted daughter of the mythril smith Takka, Refia never minces her words, but often shows a sort of motherly affection for those around her. Once she succeeded in breaking the Djinn's curse that afflicted her foster father and her village, she set off on a journey as one of the chosen Warriors of Light to save the world with Luneth and Arc from the neighboring village of Ur, and Castle Sasune's soldier Ingus.
strings.summon:
I am Refia.
Mind taking me along with you?
strings.evolution:
You can count on me more now, right?
I'm totally different from Luneth, you know!
strings.affinity:
I didn't like my blacksmith training,
but I sure do like fighting alongside you!
strings.fusion:
The Warrior of Light...
I wonder if I have it in me to protect the world.

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Having been raised by the mythril smith Takka, Refia grew up to be a straightforward young lady. However, she had her doubts about continuing the strict smithing training her father had encouraged her to pursue as a career, and eventually decided to join Luneth and the others on their quest as Warriors of Light. As the only girl in the party, her feminine side shows in how she dislikes becoming a toad to enter certain dungeons, or in the interest she displays for Ingus and Desch's love stories.
strings.summon:
Huh? Where am I?
Did the crystals call me?
strings.evolution:
I want to think about my own future.
That's why I want to know more about the world!
strings.affinity:
I didn't like my blacksmith training,
but I sure do like fighting alongside you!
strings.fusion:
The memories of people take shape...
The crystals of this world sure do have some strange powers.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is an orphan who was raised as a loyal soldier of King Sasune's army. He is a levelheaded and honest young man who has won the trust of the King, and who has pledged his service to his country. Fortunately, he managed to escape the curse of the Djinn one day when he left the castle to train. Now he seeks his beloved, Princess Sara, who has gone missing, and hopes to free his people of the curse by heading to the Cave Altar with Luneth and the others.
strings.summon:
If there are crystals here too,
could that mean the Warriors of Light are here, as well?
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
Sasune...
I wonder how Princess Sara is doing...

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is a dutiful and responsible soldier beloved by many, including the King. He loves Princess Sara, and she loves him in return, but he never acts upon it knowing that their relationship is an impossibility considering their origins. Having finally lifted the curse inflicted upon the castle by the Djinn, he set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save the world.
strings.summon:
I am Ingus, warrior of Sasune.
I'm not very powerful, but I'll do whatever I can to help.
strings.evolution:
How's this?
I hope I'm at least a little bit stronger.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
To protect the world...
I guess in doing that I would be protecting Sasune, as well.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus was chosen as a Warrior of Light when he helped to rid Castle Sasune of the curse it had suffered from the Djinn. He then set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save his country, his people, and the world from the darkness consuming it. Always calm and composed, Ingus never fails to supports his comrades whenever they find themselves in a predicament.
strings.summon:
That smell... There's a battlefiled nearby.
This could be serious...
strings.evolution:
I can become even stronger.
Alright, just need to concentrate a bit harder.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
Regardless the situation,
as long as you keep your cool
there's nothing you can't overcome.

strings.description: A mysterious man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Desch has no memories of his past, and is on a journey to find his true identity. Despite his personal predicament, he has quite a sunny disposition, even managing to form a romantic relationship with a woman named Salina from Canaan. However, he ultimately decides to set leave her behind in order to find the truth about his origins. This leads him to Dragon's Peak, where he meets the Warriors of Light and shortly joins them on their quest. Little did he know then that this would forever change his fate.
strings.summon:
I have lost my memory.
All I am able to recall is my own name.
strings.affinity:
Alright, where are we headed next?
As long as I'm with you,
I'm down to go anywhere!
strings.fusion:
That feels good!
Who knows, maybe my memories might...
Nah, that'd be impossible.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Desch had lost his memory for quite some time until he visited the Tower of Owen with the Warriors of Light, and began remembering his true identity. He was none other than the son of Owen the Ancient, tasked with looking after the Tower of Owen in his father's absence. Upon the Tower's completion, he had been placed in cryogenic sleep, a state that caused his memories to deteriorate over time. Meant to only awaken if the Tower were ever in danger, he fulfilled his duty by sacrificing his life in order to stabilize it.
strings.summon:
I once had an important mission
much like yourselves.
That's why I will help you!
strings.evolution:
I can sense great power...
I must be strong enough to complete my mission.
Leave it to me!
strings.affinity:
Alright, where are we headed next?
As long as I'm with you,
I'm down to go anywhere!
strings.fusion:
A lot happened to me,
and I found myself asleep for a long time.
But I'm wide awake, now!

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Desch begins regaining his memories when he joins the Warriors of Light in their quest to save the world. Once they reach the Tower of Owen, all of his memories come flooding back and he remembers that not only is he is an Ancient, but also the caretaker of the Tower. Tasked with making sure that it never fails to keep the Floating Continent stable, he risks his life to secure the crumbling structure. Although many thought him dead after this feat, he actually survived to lend the Warriors of Light a hand when they needed it most.
strings.summon:
I am Desch.
Repairs on the tower are done,
guess I'll help you all out!
strings.evolution:
The danger never ends!
It's okay, I'll think of something!
strings.affinity:
Alright, where are we headed next?
As long as I'm with you,
I'm down to go anywhere!
strings.fusion:
As strong as I am now,
surely all the beautiful ladies around
will start falling in love with me!

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It lives in the hope of returning all the world to nothingness, and is said to appear when the balance between light and dark is upset. When an ancient civilization, far advanced for their time, exhausted the power of the light, the Cloud of Darkness came forth from the great flood of light as it ran amok. It attempted to fulfill its goal of returning the world to nothingness, but the Warriors of Light and the Warriors of Dark, both chosen by the Crystals, defeated it and returned the world to stability.
strings.summon:
We are the Cloud of Darkness, keeper of the balance between the light and the dark.
You intrigue us.
strings.fusion:
Our power grows...and all for the better.
Now we will show you true destruction!

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It appeared when an advanced civilization exhausted the power of the light, but then was sealed away by the Warriors of Light and the Warriors of Dark. But when the power-hungry wizard Xande calls on the power of darkness some one thousand years later in pursuit of eternal life and control over all the world, the Cloud of Darkness is woken once more. And in order to finally return both the World of Light and the World of Darkness to nothingness, it strikes down the Warriors of Light who would stand in its way.
strings.summon:
We are neither light nor darkness, but a limitless void.
Still, you would peer within?
strings.evolution:
This great flood of power...
We can feel the strength filling us...!
strings.fusion:
Hahaha!
Your hope...your despair...we will use it all
to power your destruction!

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It lives in the hope of returning all the world to nothingness, and is said to appear when the balance between light and dark is upset. When the wizard Xande floods the world with darkness, it awakens from its thousand-year-long sleep and strikes down the Warriors of Light who oppose it. But the Warriors of Dark sacrifice themselves to weaken it, giving the Warriors of Light one last chance to take on the Cloud of Darkness and defeat it once more.
strings.summon:
We are the keeper of balance.
You would seek the power of destruction, greedy mortal?
strings.evolution:
Complete destruction.
That is our true power.
As you shall soon witness...
strings.affinity:
We will return this world to the Void.
That is all we exist for.
And yet you would fight beside us?
strings.fusion:
The stronger the light, the darker the shadows grow.
That is the way of the world.

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Once the balance of light and darkness was disrupted, the Cloud of Darkness emerged to return all the world to nothingness. Having awakened from its thousand-year-long sleep, it is believed to have also appeared when light had consumed the world long before, and again when the darkness brought upon by Master Xande ravaged the same. An emissary of the Void, the Cloud of Darkness cannot be defeated unless both light and darkness are used against it.
strings.summon:
There is none who can stop me.
The Void is unstoppable...
strings.evolution:
I tire of waiting.
I shall cover you all in both light and darkness!
strings.affinity:
We will return this world to the Void.
That is all we exist for.
And yet you would fight beside us?
strings.fusion:
The stronger I become,
the closer this world gets to the Void!

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal. When Master Xande uses his powers to flood the world in darkness, the Warriors of Light offer Aria their aid aboard a wrecked ship on the Surface World. Aria then pleads for them to use the Water Crystal to return the world to normal in exchange for guiding them to the Temple of Water. She has no qualms about what dangers may befall her as long as she can complete her mission.
strings.summon:
...Wh-where am I?
Huh? What is it, this light coming from your hearts...!
strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.fusion:
I will use this power to save the crystals,
and then the world!

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal who met the Warriors of Light on the Surface World following Master Xande's flood of darkness and destruction. She eventually joins them in order to restore the Water Crystal to pristine condition, and is ultimately successful after an arduous journey. Unfortunately, one of Xande's minions named Kraken would suddenly confront them in battle, unleashing a powerful blast on her.
strings.summon:
My name is Aria.
I am the Maiden of Water.
strings.evolution:
It's okay.
There is still some light left.
strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.fusion:
I feel I've grown stronger!
It's all thanks to you. Thank you.

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal who set off to the Temple of Water on the Surface World with the Warriors of Light to restore the Water Crystal to pristine condition. She is ultimately successful after an arduous journey,  but suffers a powerful and fatal blast at the hands of one of Master Xande's minions, Kraken. As she breathed her last breath, she pleaded for the Warriors of Light to banish the darkness, and restore peace to the world.
strings.summon:
I am a maiden in service of the crystal.
It seems the crystals of this world, too,
are in danger.
strings.evolution:
Fight back the darkness,
and bring peace to this world
once again!
strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.fusion:
Having received so much power from you,
I feel that now I too can help
you out!

strings.description: A young lady hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Sara is the Princess of Sasune, and holds deep feelings for one of the Warriors of Light, Ingus. She is last seen when her father's castle and the people within are cursed by the Djinn, many believing her to have been kidnapped. However, she had actually left the castle of her own volition in order to seal the Djinn with the Mythril Ring and save her people. Sara meant to face this terrible monster by herself.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
You! Do you know where
Ingus is?
strings.affinity:
I will not yet return to the castle!
I wish to adventure with you
a little longer!
strings.fusion:
I shan't be a burden to you.
I can fight, I tell you!

strings.description: A young lady hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Although Sara is the Princess of Sasune, she displays the qualities of a tomboy from time to time. Taking the Mythril Ring with her, she leaves the castle alone after it is cursed by the Djinn to chase this monster back to the Sealed Cave where it dwells, defeat it, and save her people. Having received the aid of the Warriors of Light, she decides to remain in the cave and fight by their side, rather than placing the task she set for herself upon them and returning home.
strings.summon:
Allow me to go with you!
It was scary coming here
all alone...
strings.evolution:
Let's do our best!
I want to make myself presentable
for when I meet Ingus.
strings.affinity:
I will not yet return to the castle!
I wish to adventure with you
a little longer!
strings.fusion:
This will help in the fight!
So, would you mind me tagging along?

strings.description: A young lady hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Sara is the dangerously spontaneous Princess of Sasune who takes the Mythril Ring with her to save the people of Castle Sasune from the curse of the Djinn all by herself. She has feelings for Ingus, a soldier who serves her father and has sworn to protect her. Thus, when he is chosen as one of the Warriors of Light, she bravely fights back her tears in order to give him a proper send off.
strings.summon:
I am Sara, Princess of Sasune.
I will do my best not to get in your way!
strings.evolution:
Now I should be able to
fight alongside you!
strings.affinity:
I will not yet return to the castle!
I wish to adventure with you
a little longer!
strings.fusion:
I don't want to just be protected.
I want to save someone as well!

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. He is a Dark Knight, an elite warrior within the great military forces of the kingdom of Baron, and serves as captain of the Red Wings, Baron's airship fleet. He is a serious man, and suffers from grave doubts about the cruel actions his king demands in pursuit of the Crystals, and his own choice to wield the power of darkness. When he reveals these doubts to the king, he is stripped of his duty as captain of the Red Wings. Filled with despair, he sets out to Mist Valley to subjugate the Eidolons which live there—the last order he will ever take from his king.
strings.summon:
If you need help, I will offer my blade.
Such is the duty of a knight.
strings.fusion:
I will take the path I believe in.
Even if I must turn against my king.
I cannot lie to myself!

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. He served as a Dark Knight in the great military forces of the kingdom of Baron, but ultimately found himself unable to obey the cruel orders of his king, who sought the Crystals for himself. After turning his back on his kingdom, he sets out with a new group of allies—including his beloved Rosa, and Rydia, a girl he met in the village of Mist—to try to stop Golbez, his replacement in the Red Wings, from gaining the Crystals. Through this journey, he finally lets go of his doubts and is reborn as a sacred Paladin.
strings.summon: If you have something, someone you would protect...I would offer my aid. Let me journey with you.
strings.evolution:
I must atone for the wrongs I have committed.
For this reason and more, I must continue to grow stronger...
strings.fusion:
The dark sword...
Never again will I lift it!
I will not depend on those dark arts!

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. While journeying to protect the Crystals from the sorcerer Golbez, he experiences betrayal from his closest friend, the forging of new friendships, and the pain of final farewells. He grows stronger throughout these trials, even after the shock of learning his true identity as a descendant of the Lunarians and the brother of none other than Golbez himself. With the support of his allies, who have shared so many joys and pains with him, he commits himself fully to the battle for the future of the Blue Planet.
strings.summon: Were it not for my friends, I would have been lost long ago. Now it is my turn to help you.
strings.evolution:
I mustn't lose!
I cannot let down the people who have stood with me!
strings.affinity:
I would be honored to fight beside you.
On my honor as a paladin, I swear to aid you in this campaign!
strings.fusion:
I feel as though I have the
blessing of the moon itself...
Now is the time!

strings.description: A paladin who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. It was not until Cecil reached a turning point on Mount Ordeals that he finally laid to rest the doubts that had been clouding his mind. Upon reaching the summit, a mysterious voice calling him "my son" bade him cast off his past as a dark knight. Cecil vanquished his former self and was miraculously transformed into a paladin.
strings.summon:
As long as you follow a righteous path,
I shall serve as your shield!
strings.evolution: Justice and retribution are but trifling things. There are victories of greater worth. That mysterious, yet familiar voice spoke thus...
strings.affinity:
I would be honored to fight beside you.
On my honor as a paladin, I swear to aid you in this campaign!
strings.fusion:
I am not alone.
That must be the reason behind this surge of power.

strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Cecil came to regret his part in the mission to seize a Crystal from innocent people by order of the king. However, while yet mired in these uneasy contemplations, he was soon ordered to go on another mission, this time to deliver a special item to the summoner village of Mist. After Cecil and his good friend Kain arrived at Mist, they both watched the village burn to the ground courtesy of an incendiary bomb—the very item they had delivered.
strings.summon:
I am a dark knight.
The dark power I possess may not suffice to face true evil...
strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.fusion: I wish to use this power to aid others, even if my powers as a dark knight make them uneasy...

strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. At first forming doubts about the king of Baron's unjust deeds toward surrounding lands, then witnessing firsthand the destruction of the summoner village Mist by an incendiary bomb the king himself had ordered sent there, Cecil decided to defect from his country. He was also forced to part ways with his loyal friend Kain, who had accompanied him to Mist. However, Cecil did befriend a survivor of the village named Rydia, and together they set off to the oasis town of Kaipo.
strings.summon: I shall never forget the atrocities I have committed. I shall wear this burden along with my armor, and press forth.
strings.evolution: I have no intention of allowing the darkness to consume me. I shall not commit vile acts, no matter who gives the order!
strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.fusion: The day will come when I will have to stay true to my heart. I can feel it.

strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky. Leader of the dragoons, the elite regiment of Baron, he is both a loyal friend and strong rival to Cecil. While possessing a strong sense of justice, he is not at ease expressing his emotions to others. Disillusioned at the actions of their king, he and Cecil both defect from their homeland, but become separated. He reappears as Cecil's adversary, his true motivations unknown.
strings.summon:
Heh...
I'll show you the true strength of Baron's elite: the dragoons...
strings.fusion:
Rosa... Cecil...
What should I have done differently?

strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky, his pride and honor as one of the elite dragoons make it difficult for him to unguard his inner self. Despite his deep affection for Rosa, he concealed his feelings upon realizing it was Cecil she truly loved. His emotions manipulated by Golbez, he reappears before his friend—now as a formidable foe. After rediscovering his true self, he joins Cecil in his quest, seeking to atone for his sins.
strings.summon:
No-one can match my strength in the air.
The tip of my lance will pierce through evil!
strings.evolution:
I will not betray my friends again.
If I lose control of myself...
You must cut me down.
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.fusion:
I am a dragoon.
I cannot bring disgrace to my rank.
Not...again.

strings.description: A young dragoon who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Kain had his emotions manipulated once again by Golbez, leading him to betray his friend Cecil and his companions a second time. Yet no one felt more humiliated by this than Kain himself. Having finally returned to his senses, he rejoined his friends to defeat Zemus, the true enemy: an evil presence who had been pulling Golbez's strings from the very beginning.
strings.summon: I never imagined someone would summon me to this world. If you are in need of my lance, I shall lend you my aid.
strings.evolution: One day I shall overcome my own weaknesses and doubts, and become a greater dragoon than my father!
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.fusion:
You grant me...power?
I see we are all victims of curiosity. I shall repay this debt on the battlefield.

strings.description: A white mage who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rosa was an expert archer possessed of great beauty and grace, but who had eyes only for her childhood friend Cecil. When informed that Cecil had perished during a mission to vanquish a certain Eidolon, she refused to accept it and left Baron in search of him. Alas, she was stricken with desert fever and collapsed in the outskirts of Kaipo.
strings.summon:
Cecil... Please, Cecil... Be alive!
Oh, my apologies.
I believe I was having a nightmare.
strings.affinity:
I am happy you find me reliable!
I would like to continue using my magic to mend your wounds.
strings.fusion:
Please, I beg of you.
Help my prayers reach the heavens...

strings.description: A white mage who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rosa left the kingdom of Baron in search of Cecil, who had failed to return from an Eidolon-slaying mission. However, this resulted in her falling ill with desert fever, and eventually she collapsed. Once Cecil and his comrades managed to cure Rosa's illness using a sand pearl, the recovering Rosa begged to stay by Cecil's side and convinced him that they ought to travel together. No matter what peril they encountered, her restorative magic and skill with the bow allowed the party to press onward.
strings.summon:
I do not know how much aid I will be able to provide, but please...
Allow me to stay with you till the end!
strings.evolution: I will face any peril to be with my loved ones. I have made my choice!
strings.affinity:
I am happy you find me reliable!
I would like to continue using my magic to mend your wounds.
strings.fusion:
You have my thanks!
I shall not waste the power you've granted me. I will protect everyone!

strings.description: A young girl from a distant world with two moons. Born to a family of summoners in Mist, she lost her mother when the kingdom of Baron, fearing the power of the Eidolons, razed her home. Initially despising Cecil for his role in the attack, she gradually opens up to her new companion upon witnessing his kindness. Carrying the scars from the loss of her village, she matures as a summoner under the gentle care of Cecil and Rosa.
strings.summon:
I'm Rydia.
My magic will help you all. Just watch!
strings.fusion:
I may have lost my home,
but I still have Cecil and Rosa.
I still have friends!

strings.description: A young summoner girl who hails from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky. Pure and true of heart, she suffers a tragedy when her home, the village of Mist, is burned to the ground by order of the king of Baron, who feared the power of the Eidolons. She joins Cecil and his companions on their journey, but is thought to be lost when swallowed by the great Leviathan. Later she returns from the Feymarch, home of the Eidolons, as a woman grown, lending her prodigious powers to her former companions as they face their greatest challenge.
strings.summon:
I learned a lot in the Feymarch!
My summoning powers are stronger than ever!
strings.evolution: Human or Eidolon, it's what's inside you that counts... Right, Cecil?
strings.affinity:
Even if we come from different worlds,
we can still learn to understand one
another. Just like this!
strings.fusion:
I don't want to lose anyone again...
That's why I have to become strong!
Stronger and stronger!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rydia is a summoner, and a survivor of the village of Mist. While journeying with Cecil and his companions, she was swallowed by the great Leviathan, only to later return from the Feymarch as a grown woman. Even as a full-fledged adult, Rydia retained her innocence and strength of spirit; her pure heart enabling her to befriend many Eidolons. She continued using their incredible power to help Cecil and his comrades on their quest, till the very end.
strings.summon: It is a strange sensation, being summoned. I wonder if the Eidolons I summon feel the same?
strings.evolution:
Mother, please watch over me.
I will become strong enough to protect my friends!
strings.affinity:
Even if we come from different worlds,
we can still learn to understand one
another. Just like this!
strings.fusion: I can feel my connection to the Eidolons growing stronger than ever.

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Known as the Great Sage of Mysidia for his prodigious arcane knowledge, he tragically brought great destruction to his homeland when his pursuit of forbidden learning released magical energies that ran amok, causing terrible casualties among his fellow mages. To atone for his crimes, he exiled himself from Mysidia, taking up residence in the far-flung desert town of Kaipo.
strings.summon:
Once they called me the Great Sage of Mysidia.
I might be old, but I still
have a few tricks up my sleeve!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
Anna...
I pray you'll forgive this foolish
old man...

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Once revered as the Great Sage of Mysidia for his knowledge of ancient and forbidden magicks, in his advanced years his addled brain remembers few of the incantations that once made him a force to be reckoned with. Leaving behind his homeland of Mysidia after a tragedy, he lived a quiet life in the desert town of Kaipo. When his dear daughter Anna eloped with a wandering minstrel, the old man could take no more, and made for Damcyan to deliver a stern telling-off to the spoony bard who stole his daughter away.
strings.summon:
The forbidden magic, meteor.
Does it lie hidden in this world?
strings.evolution:
Could it be? How strange!
It's starting to come back to me...
strings.affinity:
Hah! There's nothing like the sight of brave
youngsters to breathe life back into an old man!
strings.fusion:
I will get revenge for my Anna,
even if it means my own demise!

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Searching for his daughter Anna, who had fled their town with the bard she loved, he met Cecil and his companions. He arrived in Damcyan only to witness his beloved daughter giving her life to protect her lover from an attack from Golbez's army. After unleashing his anger and sadness on the spoony bard whom he deemed responsible for his daughter's death, he then channeled that fury into a quest for revenge against the true villain, Golbez.
strings.summon:
Seems a tough road lies ahead.
But no matter!
My magic will show the way!
strings.evolution:
These powers...
It would seem this old man's
only begun to fight!
strings.affinity:
Hah! There's nothing like the sight of brave
youngsters to breathe life back into an old man!
strings.fusion:
What's this?
Is this the knowledge and strength
of my youth...or something greater?

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge was the prince of Eblan, a nation rich in the ancient tradition of ninja; an art that Edge himself used in battle. He was rude, hotheaded, and stubborn, and his subordinates often bore the brunt of his rashness. However, his straightforward personality and strong will were admired by many, who adoringly called him "Young Highness."
strings.summon:
I am Edge, prince of Eblan!
I will teach you the ways of the ninja!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion:
Well, this feels rather strange.
Did it make me stronger?
