strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge had mastered the ninja techniques inherited from his ancestors. His home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, and thus he sought vengeance by following him, alone, to the Tower of Babil. There he met Cecil, whom at first he refused to join, as he was still obsessed with revenge. However, the obstinacy he showed in the beginning began to wane as he traveled with Cecil, gradually giving way to a more mature and sensitive personality.
strings.summon:
My apologies for the wait!
I will punish all evildoers who cross our path!
strings.evolution: Father, Mother...please watch over me. I will become much stronger, you'll see!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion: Have I become even lighter on my feet? Very well, now leave the rest to me!

strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge's home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, which prompted him to infiltrate the enemy's stronghold, seeking revenge for the fate of his lost countrymen. Once inside the Tower of Babil, he underwent many terrible trials, including doing battle against his own grotesquely transformed parents. However, he successfully defeated Rubicante, and later continued helping Cecil and his other comrades in their quest to stop Golbez from realizing his ambitions.
strings.summon:
Excuse me, have you seen a beautiful green-haired girl around here?
Her name is Rydia.
Do you happen to know her?
strings.evolution:
I cannot lie to my own heart!
I will embrace my anger and hatred...and they'll rocket me to the top!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion: I will use this power to protect my country, my comrades, and her!

strings.description: King of the Dwarves in a faraway world where two moons rise in the sky. Ruler of the Underworld, his castle is home to a crystal, guarded by a mighty army. Particularly proud of his battalion of tanks, said to be a match for even the mighty airships of the Red Wings of Baron, he fights bravely with Cecil and his comrades to protect the crystal. After the passing of his wife, the Queen, he dotes on his daughter Luca with the love of two parents.
strings.summon:
I am Giott, king of the dwarves!
Let us fight for this land that gave us life!
strings.fusion:
Fear not!
Even if we no longer have tanks,
I still have my hammer!

strings.description: King of the Dwarves in a faraway world where two moons rise in the sky, he rules the Underworld with a steady hand and dotes endlessly on his daughter Luca. He leads his prized tank battalion in an endeavor to protect the Crystal from Golbez and the Red Wings, but the battle proves a trying one. United with Cecil and his friends by a common goal, he spares no effort in lending the heroes his aid.
strings.summon:
Leave the battle to me!
We dwarves have only begun to fight!
strings.evolution:
Our beloved homeland gives us strength.
Behold the power of the dwarves!
strings.affinity:
With dwarven technology and your power...
We'll be as strong as a hundred men!
strings.fusion:
Mark me!
While I yet stand,
those villains shall not do as they please!

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. He controls the armies of Baron from the shadows in order to seize the Crystals that lie in each land, and drives Baron to commit terrible atrocities. Beneath him serve the four Archfiends: Scarmiglione of earth, Cagnazzo of water, Barbariccia of wind, and Rubicante of fire. But his own power is also great, and he uses many cruel tactics in his various confrontations with Cecil, including controlling Cecil's best friend, Kain, with the darkness that lay hidden in the dragoon's heart.
strings.summon:
Just how much power do you possess?
I have no business with insects.
Show me your true strength!
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
This power is reminiscent of the crystals...
I can feel my strength growing.

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. This mysterious man, concealed in black armor, stands opposed to Cecil and his allies in their battle over the Crystals' fate. He commands the Archfiends, and uses underhanded methods to try to throw Cecil, and the world, into confusion, including controlling Kain and having him kidnap Cecil's beloved Rosa. In truth, he is a son of the Lunarian Kluya—as well as Cecil's elder brother. Twisted by the dark will of Zemus, who is behind all of the troubles befalling the Blue Planet, he does whatever he must to fulfill Zemus's cruel wishes.
strings.summon:
You think that you can control my power?
Well, I suppose we shall see...won't we?
strings.evolution:
I cannot...perish!
No matter what happens to me...I will see my ambition realized!
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
I will not allow you to look down on me.
Do not think me so weak.
I will show you my true strength yet.

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. He is in fact Cecil's elder brother, and was being controlled by an evil Lunarian named Zemus, who directed him to destroy the Crystals. After a long struggle, Golbez finally regained control of his mind and chose to join his brother in the fight against Zemus. With the aid of their uncle, Fusoya, he defeats their enemy—only to be faced with Zeromus, an even fouler monster birthed from Zemus's remains. Struck down by Zeromus's darkness, Golbez must entrust the final battle to his brother, Cecil.
strings.summon:
You seek my power?
So be it! Use it as you will!
strings.evolution:
What came over me?
Why was I filled with...so much hatred?
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
Moon above, grant me power.
The true strength I need to gain victory
over evil and hatred!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. His father's last wish was for Bartz to travel the world, and thus he roams, from one land to the next with his chocobo, Boko. In the course of this wandering, he sees a meteorite fall from the sky and strike Tycoon. Following its path, he meets the princess Lenna, and Galuf, an old man who has lost his memories. This is how his true adventure begins. Using the skills that his father, Dorgann, passed on to him, he defeats many strong foes...though he cannot defeat his childhood fear of heights so easily.
strings.summon:
The wind is calling me...
Let's go see this wide world together!
strings.fusion:
Thanks!
With this kind of power,
I'll be able to fight on.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. He is passionate, and a powerful ally who does not hesitate to help his comrades. He travels with his friends to protect the Crystals of wind, water, fire, and earth. Yet the Crystals are destroyed, one by one, by outside forces. Still, as each Crystal shatters, Bartz and his allies gain new skills to help them in their noble cause.
strings.summon:
I feel the power of the Crystals here, too.
Please, let me fight with you!
strings.evolution:
I can feel the strength...and the spirit of the Crystal...
Such incredible power!
strings.fusion:
The world is so vast...
I've got to be stronger if
I'm going to see it all.
Will you lend me your strength?

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. During his journeys to protect the Crystals, he learns of the existence of Exdeath, an ancient warlock seeking to lead the world to destruction. More astoundingly, he learns that his late father was one of the four Warriors of Dawn who had previously sealed away Exdeath and saved the world. Following in his father's footsteps, he sets out to unseal the Legendary Weapons and defeat Exdeath within the Interdimensional Rift.
strings.summon:
You're you, and that's all that matters to me!
I'll lend you my strength!
strings.evolution:
Now I know how Dad must have felt.
Dorgann the Dawn Warrior's legacy continues with me!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect our world, and our crystals!
strings.fusion:
I've got to become stronger!
I owe it to those I've lost!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. Following in the footsteps of his father Dorgann and Galuf, Bartz set off on a journey to rid the world of the ancient warlock Exdeath, who seeks to rule the world with the power of the Void. He had always been a positive influence in the party, always adamant in his quest to save the world. However, he lost all composure when his hometown of Lix was swallowed by the Void at the hands of Exdeath. His rage ended up destroying the airship he and his companions had boarded.
strings.summon:
Never lose your sense of adventure.
Look forward to workin' with ya!
strings.evolution:
Ah, the winds of change!
Check out what I can do now!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect your world, and your crystals!
strings.fusion:
I'll grow even stronger using the
techniques I learned from my father!

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The kind-hearted daughter of King Tycoon, she fears for her father's safety when he fails to return from a mission to investigate the Wind Crystal, and sets out for the Shrine of Wind alone. On her way, she loses consciousness after a meteor crash, and is nearly kidnapped by a band of goblins before being saved by a young adventurer named Bartz. Together with an old man, Galuf, who has lost his memories, the three companions head for the Wind Shrine.
strings.summon:
I'm Lenna, daughter of King Tycoon.
You fight to save the crystals?
Then I will go with you!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
It's so warm...
Like touching the heart of a crystal...

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The daughter of King Tycoon, she meets Bartz and Galuf on her way to the Wind Shrine in search of her father, and is later reunited with Faris, her sister from whom she was separated at birth. Together, the new companions set off on a journey to save the crystals. Kind of heart and fair to all living creatures, she holds a particular fondness for Hiryu, a wind drake who has lived with the Tycoon royal family since her childhood.
strings.summon:
This world is in danger, is it not?
Then bring me with you.
I'm sure I can help!
strings.evolution:
This strength...!
I will use it to save this world,
and those I love!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
Are there wind drakes in this
world as well? They are such
gentle and intelligent creatures...

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The daughter of King Tycoon, in her journey to protect the crystals, she comes to learn the truth of her shattered world and the threat of the warlock Exdeath, who seeks to destroy the world's crystals in his plot to attain the power of the Void. Overcoming the pain and sadness of being forced to part with her father, her wind drake Hiryu, and Galuf, she fights bravely to the end alongside her companions in their quest to save the world.
strings.summon:
Could this be the Interdimensional Rift?
No, I see...
This is your world.
strings.evolution:
My father entrusted this world to me.
I must press onward!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
Hope, courage, devotion, passion...
The four essences will bring light
to the crystals once more!

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He first met Bartz and his allies in the aftermath of a meteorite strike. At that time, he had no memory of his identity, save his own name and his duty to protect the Crystals. As he journeys with the others, though, he recalls more and more of his past life. He remembers that he comes from a different world than the one Bartz and the others live in. And there, he had been one of the four Warriors of Dawn, who sealed the warlock Exdeath in the past after a desperate struggle.
strings.summon:
I am not from this world!
...Wait, why do I feel like I've said this before?
strings.evolution:
I remember!
I was one of the Dawn Warriors!
I finally remember everything!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
What a warm feeling...
It reminds me of the crystals' power.

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He was the king of Bal in the Second World, and one of the Warriors of Dawn who formerly sealed away Exdeath. Unable to defeat Exdeath in a contest of strength, the Warriors had little choice but to seal him in the First World. Galuf has been haunted ever since by the fear that he left another world infected with the seeds of destruction. His love for peace and for his comrades is beyond compare, and inspires him to take on Exdeath in one-on-one combat, in order to save Bartz and the other Warriors of Light in the Great Forest of Moore.
strings.summon:
I am Galuf, King of Bal!
My hair may be gray, but I'm a Warrior of Dawn all the same!
strings.evolution:
I won't lose to you younglings yet!
I'll show you how real warriors were made in the old days!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
I've got to pick up the pace a bit or
Krile will scold me again!
I won't let you young'uns leave me behind!

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Galuf was one of the four original Warriors of Dawn who first sealed the warlock Exdeath. However, the seal eventually broke freeing Exdeath in the process, which lead Galuf to seek the help of Bartz and his friends in another world. Determined to protect his comrades and family, he lost his life facing Exdeath in battle. His will now lives on in his granddaughter Krile, whom he continues supporting in spirit.
strings.summon:
Above being the King of Bal,
I am your ally!
Feel free to call me Galuf.
strings.evolution:
The attitude of a ruler, I have not.
As a Warrior of Dawn,
I shall fight alongside you!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
All is fine.
I'll join ya!
These beasts are nothing to me.

strings.description: A pirate captain from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Although seemingly a rugged ruffian from the seas, Faris only began dressing as a man so that others would take her seriously. She sought to kidnap Lenna, the princess of Tycoon, for ransom when she came stumbling into her ship one day. However, she became curious about their possible connection after having noticed that they both wore the same pendant, and decides to help her and her party to reach the Wind Shrine.
strings.summon:
This might be a long journey.
I wonder how everyone's doing back at the Pirates' Hideout.
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion: I was abducted when I was small and raised by pirates. Don't you dare make fun of me for being a girl!

strings.description: A pirate captain from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Although Faris initially seeks to have Bartz and company ransomed, she helps them to reach the Wind Shrine and is eventually tasked with protecting the Crystals along with the others. She also discovers that Lenna, the princess of Tycoon who happens to wear the same pendant she does, is in fact her younger sister. Unfortunately, the reunion both sisters would share with their father, the king of Tycoon, after this discovery would be short-lived.
strings.summon:
Were you think of stealing my ship?
What a daring one, you are!
strings.evolution:
I, a pirate, am actually a princess...?
Enough with the jokes!
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion:
I can't afford to look like a slob
in front of my henchmen.

strings.description: A princess hailing from the kingdom of Tycoon in another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Faris was lost at sea when the ship she was boarding crashed, and was henceforth raised by pirates. She would then eventually join her estranged sister Lenna and Bartz's party to put a stop to the legendary warlock, Exdeath. In the perilous battles to come Syldra, the sea dragon Faris had befriended in her youth, allowed itself to be summoned in order to grant her the use of its powers.
strings.summon:
I don't want to see anyone die.
That is why I lend you my power.
strings.evolution: See? I'm nothing like a princess, after all!
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion:
Be a little more lady-like, you say?
Hmph! Keep out of my business!

strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World, she is the granddaughter of Galuf, who lovingly raised her after the disappearance of her parents. Fearing for her grandfather after he set off to protect the crystal, she rides a meteorite and travels to Bartz's world on her own, a brave act which awakens Galuf's long-lost memories.
strings.summon:
Hi! I'm Krile!
I want to fight with you, too!
strings.fusion:
If there are any creatures you want to
talk to, I'd be happy to interpret for you!

strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World and granddaughter to Galuf, she loses her last remaining blood relative when her grandfather falls in battle to Exdeath. Though grieving his loss, she seems to inherit his power and his purpose, joining Bartz and his friends on their quest. With her curious ability to converse with wind drakes, moogles and other creatures, she proves an invaluable ally to her companions.
strings.summon:
A voice called me here...at least I think it did.
Maybe I can help you?
strings.evolution:
Grandpa, give me strength...
I want to protect the Crystals, too!
strings.affinity:
You can count on me for anything!
I'll do my best to help out!
strings.fusion:
Hey, I'm grandpa's little girl!
I'm as good at fighting as anyone!

strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Krile is granddaughter to Galuf, one of the Warriors of Dawn, and princess of the kingdom of Bal. She joined Bartz and his companions after her grandfather fell in battle at the hands of Exdeath. Having the ability to understand animals and the sort, she is said to have helped facilitate communication between Bartz and his partner Boko, Lenna and her family's wind drakes, and Faris and her sea dragon Syldra.
strings.summon:
I'm not lonely or anything.
Isn't that right, grandfather?
strings.evolution:
I'll do my best!
If I don't, my grandfather would laugh at me.
strings.affinity:
You can count on me for anything!
I'll do my best to help out!
strings.fusion:
How warm...
I can remember my grandfather...

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light. It is said that he was born, some five centuries before the tale begins, when all the malevolent souls trapped within the Great Forest of Moore took root in a single tree. He was defeated once by the Warriors of Dawn, and sealed away in the world also occupied by Bartz and his allies. But he was able to destroy the Crystals, which were weakened from overuse, and return to his former strength. His ultimate goal is to return the two split worlds to one, and seize the power of the Void, which lies in the Interdimensional Rift.
strings.summon:
I have been reborn!
Mwahahaha!
And now I shall remake the world in my image!
strings.fusion:
Evil will take on a life of its own,
in whatever host it can find.
Yes, even in a solitary tree...

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light. It is said that he was born when countless malevolent souls gathered and took root in a single tree. He craves the power of the Void in the Interdimensional Rift. To obtain it, he will destroy the Crystals in every land and return the two worlds, divided a thousand years earlier, to one. After he achieves this sinister goal, towns and villages begin disappearing at a horrifying rate. But in the end, even Exdeath himself is consumed by the massive power of the Void.
strings.summon: All who oppose me will be consumed by my power! Take care not to get in the way...
strings.evolution:
Power wells within me...!
I cannot be defeated by anger or hatred!
strings.fusion:
Mwahahaha!
What invigorating power!
With this, I have no need of the Void!

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light and who claimed for himself the power of the Void. He is a creature born from countless malevolent souls, which gathered and took root in a single tree. By bringing together two previously-separated worlds, he seized the power of the Void. With it, he began wiping towns and villages from the map. But in the end, even Exdeath himself is consumed by the Void's massive power, losing himself and becoming Neo Exdeath. As Neo Exdeath, he desires the utter destruction of everything: all memory, all life, all worlds, and even himself. He is struck down by Bartz and his allies.
strings.summon:
I seek the power of the Void.
I will obliterate any who stand in my way!
strings.evolution:
Mwahahaha!
With this new strength of mine, perhaps I could even defeat...you!
strings.affinity:
The world shall inevitably be mine.
Until that day, I do not mind taking part in this...diversion.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure it is wise to grant me so much power?
I might turn it against you someday...

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light and who claimed for himself the power of the Void. He is a creature born from countless malevolent souls that gathered and took root in a single tree in the Great Forest of Moore, who came to desire ruling the world through the power of the Void. However, the Void would eventually prove too powerful for him to control, and he was consumed by it--just like the warlock-king Enuo before him.
strings.summon:
The power to devour all...
Soon, it will be mine.
strings.evolution:
Ha ha ha ha!
I have been waiting for this.
The power of the Void is mine!
strings.affinity:
The world shall inevitably be mine.
Until that day, I do not mind taking part in this...diversion.
strings.fusion:
Ha ha ha ha!
All shall kneel to my power!

strings.description: Exdeath's bodyguard in another world where tales of the Crystals are told. Although Gilgamesh has enough power to eliminate the entire army of the Bal Kingdom, there is still something off about him. Having been tasked by Exdeath to keep a close watch on the prisoner Bartz and his companions, he eventually found himself cornered by Galuf who was attempting to rescue them. Gilgamesh then fled, but battled the party again once they reached the Big Bridge.
strings.summon:
Mwa ha ha ha ha!
I was just wondering what I would do, hadn't I been called.
strings.affinity: I'd like to go one-on-one with you sometime!
strings.fusion:
Oh no!
I just realized I have something important to do... Ha ha, just kidding!

strings.description: Exdeath's most powerful henchman in another world where tales of the Crystals are told. Gilgamesh challenged Bartz and his party to countless fights only to flee from each one of them. Eventually, he even attacked them with a poor replica of the Excalibur, which lead Exdeath to banish him to the Void as a punishment for his incompetence. Although he was tasked with the protection of the legendary Genji equipment, rumor has it that Bartz and his party made off with it in one of their battles against him.
strings.summon:
The blue sky, the wide ocean...
I am full of good vibes.
Hey...who dares stand in my way?!
strings.evolution:
Alright, it's time to fight
with all I've got!
strings.affinity: I'd like to go one-on-one with you sometime!
strings.fusion: There is none who can stand again my new power, and the strongest blade in the land!

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic, a thing thought to be impossible in her world. The Gestahlian Empire seized control of her mind and made her a Magitek soldier, forcing her to assist them in their goal of world domination. When she is sent to Narshe to seize the frozen esper Valigarmanda, the esper resonates with her and the effect is so profound that it knocks her unconscious. She is freed from the empire's control when she wakes, but loses all memory of who she is.
strings.summon:
Who...what am I?
Whatever should I do?
I know nothing...
strings.fusion:
People only seem to want power, don't they?
Do they really want to be like me?

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic and used by the Gestahlian Empire as a tool for murder. In Narshe, she meets a young man named Locke who invites her to join the Returners and rebel against Gestahl. But even as she joins in their fight, she cannot silence the questions in her heart. Who is she? Why is she alone able to use magic? And is there something wrong with her if she cannot understand human emotion?
strings.summon:
I know not what I can do.
But I would use my power to protect someone...
strings.evolution: I wonder...will I be able to love people someday?
strings.fusion:
A new power?
It feels so warm...
Like hugging a moogle.

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic; the child of a union between an esper and a human woman. After being controlled by the Gestahlian Empire for most of her life, she finds herself nearly robbed of emotion. She tries to serve as a bridge between espers and humans, but cannot quell the anxiety she feels at being unable to understand the "love" that other people experience. Only after the world is destroyed and it falls to her to care for the orphans left behind in the destruction does she begin to understand what love is.
strings.summon:
My power is the power of humans and espers both.
Perhaps it might be of use to you?
strings.evolution:
The feeling that's been growing inside me...
I must fight to protect it!
strings.affinity:
Was I really any help?
I hope that I was able to protect someone by fighting like this...
strings.fusion:
The power of magic...
Before, I used it only to hurt others.
Now, I will use it to protect them!

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. Terra's ability to use magic stems from her origins, having been born to an esper father and a human mother. During her journey, she eventually lost her will to fight after taking responsibility for the orphaned children in the village of Mobliz following Kefka's destruction of the world. There, the children taught Terra how to love, a feeling she had not been able to grasp before. This motivated her to join the fight once again in order to secure their future.
strings.summon:
I will lead you all with my power!
I will end the battle before us!
strings.evolution:
I can fight.
I can fight for everyone's future!
Also, for all the future children!
strings.affinity:
Was I really any help?
I hope that I was able to protect someone by fighting like this...
strings.fusion:
Thank you.
I'm starting to understand now
thanks to all your help...

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. Though magic was thought to have been lost from her world, she was born able to use it, and that rare ability made her a target of the Gestahlian Empire as a child. Emperor Gestahl stole her away from her parents and turned her into a tool to be used for his dreams of world domination. Under the empire's control, she was ordered to pilot a set of Magitek armor to invade the mining town of Narshe and seize the esper that had been found encased in ice within the mine there.
strings.summon:
...?
Where...am I?
strings.fusion:
...
Is this...power?

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic and used as a tool of destruction by the Gestahlian Empire, which sought to conquer the entire world. The empire stole from her both her freedom and her emotions. She is powerful enough to destroy fifty of the empire's Magitek soldiers in mere minutes. But her future is forever altered when she meets an esper enclosed in ice in a small mining town...
strings.summon:
Who...are you?
I...I cannot remember.
strings.evolution: This is...my new power?
strings.affinity:
...I will go with you.
I have...decided.
strings.fusion:
...
Why...are you being kind to me?

strings.description:
A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. Able to wield magical powers believed lost to the world,
Terra was used as a weapon by the Gestahl Empire bent on world domination. However, she was eventually saved by the treasure hunter Locke and joined him in the fight against the empire by becoming a member of the Returners. Dedicating herself to their cause, she travels with the group to see the esper Valigarmanda, where a strange power resonates with her. In moments, Terra transforms into an esper and flees to an unknown location.
strings.summon:
What form is this...?
Wh-who am I...?
strings.affinity:
Thank you.
I can fight, if only for
the sake of everyone's futures.
strings.fusion:
This warm power...
Is that you, father?

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. Terra's interaction with the esper Valigarmanda triggered the incredible powers dormant within her, causing her to lose control. However, when her friends present her with the magicite shard of her father, the esper Maduin, she regains the memories surrounding her dual human and esper parentage. After learning the truth behind her origins, she is resolved to reconcile both of her families by wielding her great powers to save the world.
strings.summon:
I was raised in the land of espers...
I finally remembered.
strings.evolution:
Humans and espers...
If they weren't compatible,
I never would've been born...
strings.affinity:
Thank you.
I can fight, if only for
the sake of everyone's futures.
strings.fusion: I was born between the worlds of humans and espers... With this power...I know what I must do...

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. A treasure hunter in search of ancient riches, he hates being called a thief. He is also a member of the Returners, a resistance group fighting against the empire. In the mining town Narshe, he meets Terra, a young woman able to use magic but possessing no memory of who she is, and he resolves to protect the vulnerable girl. He leads her to Figaro, where King Edgar is looking for ways to strike back against the Gestahlian Empire.
strings.summon: A "thief"!? That's "treasure hunter" to you!
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
Hey! I think I got a bit stronger!
I think we can do this!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He is both a treasure hunter, in search of ancient riches, and a member of the Returners, a resistance group fighting against the empire. Once he is allied with Terra, Edgar, and Sabin, Locke works to do real damage to the empire. He travels to South Figaro for this purpose, and there meets Celes, an imperial general being persecuted as a traitor. He sees in her a shadow of his long lost love, motivating him to help her escape the town.
strings.summon:
Hm? Just where are we, anyway?
Does anyone have a map?
strings.evolution:
This glow...
It's like the power I felt from the magicite.
I feel like I can become even stronger!
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
I never should have left her side...
Oh. Nothing. I was just talking to myself.

strings.description: A treasure-hunting young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He fought the Gestahlian Empire as a member of the resistance group known as the Returners. Unable to escape the guilt of failing to save his lover in the past, he searched for the legendary esper Phoenix, said to be able to revive the dead. This deep remorse is the real reason he cannot leave the side of any woman he meets who is in trouble. But meeting Celes begins to inspire a change in Locke's broken heart.
strings.summon:
Enter the realm's foremost treasure hunter!
Lockpicking? Infiltration? Leave it to me!
strings.evolution:
If I want to protect the ones I love...
Then I must be strong.
I don't ever want to feel that regret again.
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
As long as there are people who need
to be protected, I'll keep on fighting!

strings.description: A young man whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, from a distant world. King of the technologically advanced nation of Figaro and a brilliant engineer in his own right, he wields numerous unusual weapons of his own design. He is greatly beloved by his people, whose best interests he always keeps closest to his heart. He is also notorious as a ladies' man, quick to make advances on women of all ages and walks of life.
strings.summon: I'm Edgar of Figaro. We'll be meeting some lovely ladies on this journey, I take it?
strings.fusion:
I must get stronger yet.
If something were to happen to me,
all the world's ladies would grieve!

strings.description: A young man whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, from a distant world. King of the desert nation of Figaro, he is famed throughout the realm as a brilliant engineer and an equally shameless flirt. While maintaining a surface alliance with the Gestahlian Empire to protect his people, he secretly works with the Returners, awaiting the perfect moment to strike back at the evil regime. Upon encountering the young Terra and her prodigious magical powers, his battle with the Empire begins in earnest.
strings.summon: Allow me to show you the inventions that Figaro is famous for. Try not to faint with amazement, okay?
strings.evolution:
I will become a king that my father, my brother, and my people can be proud of...
The path may not be easy, but I will not give up!
strings.affinity:
I've got an idea for a new machine.
When I finish my prototype, I'll be sure to show it to you.
strings.fusion:
I have to keep myself in top condition.
You never know when you might
meet the lady of your dreams.

strings.description: A youth whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Twin brother to Edgar, prince of Figaro, his distaste for the struggle of succession led him to leave his homeland at the age of seventeen. Strict training under the martial artist Duncan transformed a boy into a man strong of body and passionate of mind, and after reuniting with his brother at Mt. Kolts, he swears to join the fight against their common foe, the Empire.
strings.summon: I'm Sabin of Figaro! Now, who's ready to crush some skulls?
strings.fusion:
Dinner time!
I'm gonna eat till I burst!

strings.description: A youth whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Twin brother to Edgar, prince of Figaro, he left his homeland behind amidst the struggle for succession after the death of their father the king. Grateful to his brother for allowing him his freedom, he devoted himself to training in the martial arts, hoping to gain the strength needed to protect Edgar from further harm. Possessing a strong sense of justice that does not waver even after the world falls into ruin, he reunites with his lost teacher Duncan and masters his ultimate technique: the Phantom Rush.
strings.summon: Why don't we go together? I'm not big on philosophy or politics, but I can more than hold my own in a fight!
strings.evolution: The earth tried to swallow me up once or twice, but I just pried its jaws open and climbed back out!
strings.affinity:
Gahaha!
What do you say? Want to go train in the mountains with me?
strings.fusion:
I don't care who my enemy is!
I'm gonna smash 'em with a blitz!

strings.description: A lethal assassin from a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world—his face and true identity cloaked in darkness. So cold that it is said he would kill even his best friend for a price, he counts his loyal canine partner Interceptor as his only true friend. He joins Locke and his companions for a time, only to disappear as soon as his debt is paid. Showing little attachment to the world of the living, he seems somehow to be always searching for a place to die.
strings.summon:
The reaper is always one step behind me.
I may bring misfortune to you...
strings.fusion:
I may leave you at any time.
But until then, you'll get your money's worth.

strings.description: A lethal assassin from a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Once a famed train robber, he lost the will to live after leaving his wounded friend and cohort Baram to die after their greatest heist. Wandering the realm in search of a place to die, his repeated meetings and partings with Locke and his friends rekindle in the depths of his heart the faintest feelings of friendship. In truth, he is father to Relm of Thamasa Village, a secret he takes to his grave.
strings.summon:
All that is left for me is blood and the battlefield...
Yet for some reason, I press on.
strings.evolution:
Hmm...
Let us see where this path of trials takes me.
strings.affinity:
To keep me at your side.
I don't know what you're thinking, but...you clearly have unusual tastes.
strings.fusion:
I suppose I can stay a bit longer.
I'm not leaving this world behind until
I've been paid my due.

strings.description: A great warrior spoken of in another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. A samurai, he loyally serves the king of Doma in the East, just as he served the king's father before him. His courtly manners and love of old customs are yoked to a certain discomfort when it comes to modern machines and the fairer sex. Through the cruel machinations of Kefka, the Gestahlian Empire's court mage, he suffers the loss of his liege, and his beloved wife and son. Alone, he storms his enemies in a fury—and so it is that he encounters Sabin and comes to lend his strength to the Returners.
strings.summon:
I am Cyan, a knight of Doma.
From this day hence, my blade is thine!
strings.fusion:
The power courses through me...!
Mastery of the sword is within my reach!

strings.description: A great warrior spoken of in another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He is a samurai, living a life of honor and bowing only to the ancient traditions of his culture. Through the cruel machinations of Kefka, the Gestahlian Empire's court mage, he lost both family and kingdom, which led him to join the rebel forces of the Returners, though even this new alliance cannot ease the regret he bears for failing to protect his family and his king. This darkness in his heart allows him to be plagued by demons, but with the aid of real friends he finally comes to terms with the past, becoming a true warrior at last.
strings.summon:
I shall go with thee!
We must not abandon this world!
strings.evolution:
I can dwell on the past no longer.
I must follow the path in which I believe...
strings.affinity:
It is as though thy breath and mine were one in our chests!
We shall not falter in our diligence to this cause!
strings.fusion:
The past lies in darkness. The dawn brings light.
We must look to the future now.
For this, I raise my sword!

strings.description: A woman from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She served as a top general in the Gestahlian Empire, tasked with many important missions, including the invasion of Maranda. As a child, she was implanted with magic by Cid, and raised to be a peerless force in battle. She wields her unnatural magic with ease, and her sword even seals the magic of others, making her one of the empire's greatest weapons, whose record of success in battle speaks for itself.
strings.summon: I am a Magitek Knight, genetically enhanced to serve the Empire. Are you friend or foe? I can see it in your eyes...
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
My past is behind me...
I have nothing to do with the Empire now!

strings.description: A general from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She was implanted with artificial magic by the Gestahlian Empire. While peerless in battle, winning many commendations within the army, Celes carries silent doubts about the cruel tactics of her emperor. When she dares to voice these misgivings before him, however, she is branded a traitor and imprisoned. She is only saved from near-certain execution by a chance meeting with Locke.
strings.summon:
I can hold my own in battle.
I used to be a general of sorts, after all.
strings.evolution:
What is this power?
Is it magic? No... This is something different.
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
I may have served as a general to the Empire,
but I still know evil when I see it.
I will not lie to myself.

strings.description: A general from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She was implanted with artificial magic by the Gestahlian Empire, and raised to be an unstoppable weapon—her skill with a blade equal to her skill with magic. Unable to tolerate the cruel methods of her emperor, she rebels and begins instead to work alongside the Returners, a rebel group opposing the empire. Her hard military nature means she has difficulty letting others see her emotions, but her new allies gradually help her to accept and embrace her own feelings.
strings.summon: Let us go together, and realize our dream of reclaiming this world.
strings.evolution:
I once thought there was no hope left.
But now I know...as long as we do not abandon ourselves, there is always hope.
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
I have someone who can accept me for who I am.
That is all I need to be strong. To keep fighting.

strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. As owner of the airship known as the Blackjack, Setzer has spent most of his time gambling his life away, quite literally. He had planned to kidnap the famous opera star Maria to make her his bride, but his plans were foiled when she was replaced with Celes as part of her group's efforts against the empire. Although he sees through the farce, and the coin trick she performs for him, he still decides to keep his promise to help her.
strings.summon:
Betting my life on something...
It's been awhile since I felt this tingle.
strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.fusion:
Life is but a constant gamble against fate.
That's my take, at least.

strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. Setzer built a casino on his beloved ship, the Blackjack, as a symbol of his carefree lifestyle. After meeting Celes and being impressed by the way in which she tried to deceive him, he decided to help her and her friends in their efforts against the empire. His airship may have granted the group great mobility, but Kefka's eventual destruction of the world would also result in the unfortunate loss of the Blackjack.
strings.summon:
I will help you.
With my life as a chip,
I'll be on you all!
strings.evolution:
When I was younger, I had a dream
that I desperately tried to fulfill...
I wish to pursue it once more.
strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.fusion:
Everything's a gamble.
You either trick, or get tricked.
It's all just one big game.

strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. The destruction of the world also resulted in the destruction of Setzer's beloved airship, the Blackjack. Phased by these events, he turns to alcohol to avoid the harsh reality until he is reunited with Celes, who manages to convince him to rejoin their cause. Together they visit the tomb of Setzer's close friend Darill, where they dig out the remains of her old airship, the Falcon, in hopes of using it as transport. Soaring the skies with Celes and her friends once again, they travel around the world looking for the rest of their scattered comrades.
strings.summon:
We should do the opposite of what we're
thinking. Then again, that could
be a mistake, as well.
strings.evolution:
Without wings, one cannot expect to
become the fastest man in the world.
I shall once again pursue my dream.
strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.fusion:
Those who carry around something
that they truly cherish cannot
afford to gamble with it.

strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau was abandoned by his father as a babe, and consequently grew alongside the beasts of the region known as the Veldt. Although he is not adept with words, he tries to communicate his emotions through gestures and physical motions. Eventually he runs into Sabin and his friends, who are en route to Narshe, and demands food from them. After Sabin gives him dried meat to earn his trust, Gau joins the party to show his gratitude. In turn, this ultimately results in him permanently joining the Returners on their efforts against the empire.
strings.summon:
Gau!
Ooh, ooh, ooh... So hungry...
strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.fusion:
I am Gau,
I train in the Cave on the Veldt.

strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau joined Sabin and his comrades in their fight against the empire to repay them for the dried meat they had given him. Soon afterwards the party learns that Gau has the superhuman ability to learn attacks used by the monsters of the Veldt--a unique skill said to have been of great help when facing off against the empire.
strings.summon:
Gau, Gau!
More... More food!
strings.evolution:
Gau! Dried meats!
Give me dried meats!
strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.fusion:
I am Gau,
I do my best!

strings.description: A feral child from another world where magic and espers once lived. Gau joined Sabin and Cyan's journey to repay them for the dried meat he had received from them, and ultimately became a permanent member of their group. He decided to return to the Veldt after Kefka's destruction of the world in order to train for the day in which he would have to fight alongside his friends once again. Although Sabin manages to schedule a reunion between Gau and his estranged father later on, the man does not recognize the feral boy and his own child. Despite the results being far from ideal, Gau was content with the fact that his father was still alive nevertheless.
strings.summon:
Gau! Gau, Gau! I'm Gau!
You're my friend! Friend!
Let's journey together!
strings.evolution:
You are great!
But Gau is greater!
strings.affinity:
Gau's treasure is sparkly.
I give it to you!
Treasure! My treasure!
strings.fusion:
Gau, Gau!
Gau is in control!

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Together with his comrade Biggs, he is tasked with capturing a frozen esper discovered in the independent mining town of Narshe. They are opposed by the town guard but quickly dispatch all resistance with their powerful Magitek armor and the extraordinary abilities of their companion, a mysterious girl named Terra. Deep within the mine, they discover the mystical creature they seek.
strings.summon:
Wh-wh-whoa! Where am I!?
I was on a misson to find a frozen esper, and then...
strings.fusion:
Is this...
Is this MAGIC!?
No, really. Is it or not?

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Together with his comrade Biggs and the mysterious girl Terra, he is sent on a mission to retrieve a frozen esper from the remote mining town of Narshe. Wielding magic and Magitek, they make swift work of their opposition and arrive at the resting place of the esper Valigarmanda, only to be bathed in unholy light and whisked away, never to be seen again.
strings.summon:
Last thing I remember, I was looking for this esper, and...
Well, I guess I'm going with you now!
strings.evolution:
Heh heh...
I never thought I'd get to be this strong!
strings.affinity:
I really owe you!
I'll pay you back somehow, you'll see.
You can bank on it!
strings.fusion:
I hope you can give my Magitek Armor
the same kind of love and attention!

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Under orders from the Emperor, a despot bent on world domination, he ventures to the mining town of Narshe with his comrade Wedge to retrieve a frozen esper. Accompanying them is Terra, a young girl who, despite her prodigious magical powers, is enslaved to the Empire by the binding crown on her head. By her magicks and the formidable Magitek armor, they dispatch the defenses of Narshe and come face-to-face with the esper they seek.
strings.summon:
Wedge and I were looking for this esper, and then...
Wait, where am I? Who are you?
strings.fusion:
Hm...
Maybe being strong wouldn't be so bad!

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire whose story is told in a tale of espers and humans. Together with his comrade Wedge and a mysterious girl named Terra possessed of prodigious magical powers, he embarks on a mission to the mining town of Narshe in search of a frozen esper. The band withstands resistance from the Narshe town guard, and Ymir, a monster dwelling in the mines, to finally arrive at the resting place of the esper Valigarmanda. In an instant, however, they are bathed in unholy light and whisked away, never to be seen again.
strings.summon:
What is this place? And where did that esper go!?
I'll just have to follow you and find out!
strings.evolution:
Heh heh...
Maybe now I won't have to hide behind that girl anymore in battles!
strings.affinity:
I was a little afraid for a minute there.
Wasn't feeling too sure about my future.
But I'm glad you brought me here!
strings.fusion:
If I'm this strong, I might even be able
to stand up against a mage's power!

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. His mind was irreparably damaged by an infusion of artificial magic, but his emperor still places a great deal of trust in this madman. He is as fickle as a child, and just as quick to explode in anger, but these are tantrums with a death toll—he even kills women and children indiscriminately. Even his fellow soldiers in the Gestahlian Army hate and fear Kefka for his madness and cruelty.
strings.summon: Hee hee! Nothing beats the sweet music of hundreds of voices screaming in unison!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Oooh! It's warm to the touch!
What a lovely treasure!

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. A key player of the Gestahlian Empire, he stands in the way of the Returners time and again. His mind has been broken by the magic he was implanted with, leaving him emotionally stunted and devoid of morals. He murdered the entire population of Doma without hesitation, and shows no remorse for any of his heartless acts. He is obsessed with the espers and the great power that he could gain from them.
strings.summon: Son of a submariner! You want my powers? You must be as crazy as I am! Hehehehe!
strings.evolution:
Wh-what is this!? Such tremendous power!
Wave after wave of pure, magical energy...!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
What energy!
SOOO BEAUTIFUL!
I CAN'T EVEN.

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. He served the Gestahlian Empire, but his mind is twisted and warped. He hunts the espers to harvest magicite from them, and his lust for power explodes as it goes unchecked by those around him. He betrays his own emperor without a second thought, then lets the Warring Triad run wild. Amid the chaos, he is reborn as a god of destruction who wants nothing more than to see the world burn.
strings.summon: Looking to rain down devastation and destruction? Well, why didn't you say so sooner!
strings.evolution: Yes! Yes, this is the power I was looking for! Sorry for becoming too strong for you!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
Are you sure about this?
You never know what might happen
if you give me too much power!

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. Kefka lost his empathy for others, along with his sanity, during the experimental process that gave him his magical powers as the first Magitek Knight. He will use any means necessary to achieve his maniacal ambitions, including turning against imperial general Leo, and even against Emperor Gestahl himself. After acquiring the power of the Warring Triad in order to destroy the world, Kefka builds his own tower out of rubble and makes his ascension as a god. He then proceeds to drain the Warring Triad's power, smiting anyone who dares defy him with the Light of Judgment.
strings.summon:
Hee hee!
Destruction without death,
what a waste of effort!
strings.evolution:
I have received great power.
Anything else is scum!
The scum of scum!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
This new power is all mine!
It's not the time to be giving up...

strings.description: A man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. This loyal soldier of the Gestahlian Empire refused a Magitek infusion, having achieved the rank of general depending only on the strength of his arm, and the skill of his sword. He values fair play and honor in battle, with a special hatred for underhanded strategies. Respectful of all lives, even those of his enemies, his character earns him esteem from both his own troops and the people of hostile nations. He bears a deep hatred for Kefka, for a man of such integrity cannot forgive the mage's evil ways.
strings.summon:
I am General Leo of the Gestahlian Empire.
I shall lend you my blade.
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion: I will not rush into an unnecessary battle.I will not throw away a human life.

strings.description: A general in the Gestahlian Empire who appears in tales from another world. There he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. In an empire that depends on the power of magic to rule the world, he is a true warrior who relies only on his own strength and skill. When Leo is summoned back to Gestahl during the invasion of Doma Castle, and Kefka is given command, he warns the mage against using cruelty and foul play. But Kefka pays no heed to this advice, and poisons the inhabitants of Doma Castle as soon as Leo is gone.
strings.summon:
I am not familiar with this place.
Could it be...?
strings.evolution:
Magic is a powerful thing...
But it has destroyed many lives.
What is this power, really?
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion:
I knew that girl was suffering...
And still I did not put a stop to it
I am no better than Kefka...

strings.description: A general in the Gestahlian Empire who appears in tales from another world. There he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. His integrity and code of honor win him respect from enemies and allies alike. He travels to Thamasa with Terra, Locke, and the others, to try to establish a peace with the espers who have appeared from the esper world. Furious at the cruelty of Kefka, who strikes out at esper after esper to reap magicite from them, he challenges the mage to battle. But Kefka resorts to his usual dirty tricks, and the mighty general Leo falls for the last time.
strings.summon:
A world of espers...
I pray that one day, we can live together with them in harmony.
strings.evolution:
Such strength...
I will use this power as is only proper.
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion:
This power...
I swear that I will not use it for any
dishonorable purpose.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He is a lone orphan, adopted as a small child by the troupe of theatrical thieves known as Tantalus, and their leader, Baku. He was raised by Tantalus and considers the group his family, but even having such a home cannot erase his longing to discover his true roots. He has a bright and cheery disposition, and a strong sense of justice for a thief, but his womanizing tendencies keep the shine off of this diamond in the rough. The moment he spots a cute girl, he will pull out every trick in his bag to try to pick her up.
strings.summon:
There's more to you than meets the eye, huh?
Okay, just leave it to me!
strings.fusion:
Oh, please!
You don't have to worry about a thing.
Leave it all in the hands of master thief Zidane!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He is a member of the Tantalus Theater Troupe, a band of traveling thieves who attempt to kidnap Princess Garnet of Alexandria. Finding himself captivated by Garnet, who is troubled by the changes in her beloved mother's behavior, he pledges himself to her cause. As they set out on a journey, together with the young black mage Vivi and an Alexandrian knight named Steiner, he comes closer to the truth about the two moons in Gaia's night sky, and the roots he has searched for all his life.
strings.summon:
Of course I'm coming too.
Why? Because I'm sticking with you!
strings.evolution:
Don't judge a guy by his looks!
All you need are dreams and the fire to go after them.
strings.fusion:
The strongest don't need to show off
their strength.
After all, the sly eagle
doesn't...uh...doesn't...
Wait, how did it go again?

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. On a quest to help Princess Garnet of Alexandria save her kingdom, he learns of the existence of Terra, a foreign planet trying to take over Gaia and replace its people. Confronted with the knowledge that he is not, in fact, human, but a tool created by the Terrans to take over Gaia, he is overwhelmed by a self-destructive despair. But the friends and allies who have traveled with him so long draw him from his shell and help him to accept himself as he is, lending him the courage he needs to fight his fate.
strings.summon:
Who says you need a reason to help people?
We're all in the same boat, right?
strings.evolution:
I'm fine. I know I'm not alone.
And now I have a place that I can call home.
strings.affinity:
I've made it this far because you were right here with me.
Let's see it through to the end, partner.
strings.fusion:
I've been searching all my life...
For a blue light I can only half-remember.
If I find it, will I know where I belong?

strings.description: A young black mage from the distant world of Gaia. While attending a play in the kingdom of Alexandria, he is swept up in Zidane's plot to kidnap Princess Garnet, and before long joins in on his new companions' quest. Raised with no knowledge of the world or his own origins, he is at first timid and dependent on others, but in the course of his journey gradually gains the courage to face the truth of the past.
strings.summon:
I... I have to find out what I am.
Am I even human?
strings.fusion:
My magic...
Was it made to hurt people?

strings.description: A young black mage from the distant world of Gaia. He lived each day with no knowledge of who he truly was, until, while journeying with Zidane and his friends, he came to learn that he was an artificial being designed by the kingdom of Alexandria as a weapon. Though his confidence falters after finding out that he is an instrument of destruction that will one day "stop," through his encounters with his companions and fellow black mages, he finds the courage to face the devastating truth about his identity.
strings.summon:
I'm scared, and confused...but I must press on.
Please, take me with you!
strings.evolution:
Zidane... Grandpa...
I think I'm beginning to understand what it means to live.
strings.affinity:
Journeying together is fun, isn't it?
I hope you'll let me come along with you.
strings.fusion:
My magic...
Does it help? I hope it does...

strings.description: A princess who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. The most beautiful princess in Alexandria's history, her name was known far and wide. She felt sympathy and concern for the people of the kingdom, and was greatly pained by her mother Queen Brahne's unbending resolve in invading other countries. On her sixteenth birthday, in an attempt to get advice about her mother from her uncle Cid, regent of Lindblum, she asked Zidane, a thief who had broken into the castle, to kidnap her.
strings.summon:
Enough of this princess business;
I want to find out who I really am.
However...
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion: It was not for my own sake that I asked Zidane to kidnap me. What can I do to protect my homeland?

strings.description: The princess of Alexandria who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Dismayed by her mother Queen Brahne's resolution to invade other countries, she asked Zidane to kidnap her so that she could make her way to Cid, regent of Lindblum. Though her concern for her mother and her country was genuine, having been raised in a castle she knew little of the world, leading her to come across as somewhat self-important during her first journey. However, after hiding away under the false name Dagger, she came to know more of the world, growing more mature in the process.
strings.summon:
Where are we?
I thought I heard a familiar song just a moment ago...
strings.evolution:
I-I'll do my best...
Is this enough?
I guess I'm still getting used to this.
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion: I will no longer blame my hardships on anyone or anything else. I'll face my problems and overcome them!

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Despite being a dragon knight, the pride of Burmecia, she was forbidden to reenter her own country once she had left. Yet her pride in being a dragon knight never wavered, and she remained eternally zealous. She had a cool demeanor, with an old-fashioned way of speaking, and though she was quick to rebuke her companions, she felt very deeply for them. She was also an old friend of Zidane.
strings.summon:
I am Freya of Burmecia.
Might you require my assistance?
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion:
To keep remembering is painful,
but how much more dreadful it is
to forget...

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. As a proud dragon knight, she left her home country and traveled the world in search of a certain someone. She was reunited with her old friend Zidane during the Festival of the Hunt, which took place in Lindblum. Afterward, having learned of the attack on her home country Burmecia, she decided to join Zidane and his allies. Her fighting style, which took advantage of powerful jump attacks, was both graceful and beautiful.
strings.summon:
There's a great disturbance in the air.
Could there be something about to happen?
strings.evolution: I shall unveil my powerful spear skills in the battle to come.
strings.affinity:
It was destiny that brought me to
someone as soft-hearted as yourself.
I look forward to our continuing friendship.
strings.fusion:
Hmph... What manner of power is this?
I feel as if I have become lighter.

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. She was a dragon knight who used her powerful jumping skills to unleash spear attacks. She left her home country to search the world for her lost lover, a quest that led her to spend some time working together with Zidane. Later, after the two friends met in Lindblum for the second time, they became caught up in events that would shake the world to its very core. Before long, Freya would also be reunited with her lover. However...
strings.summon:
Those who commit themselves to a path are destined to encounter others walking the same path.
...Surely.
strings.evolution:
Even if I am to be forgotten
and never thought of again...
I have decided... I will NOT look back!
strings.affinity:
It was destiny that brought me to
someone as soft-hearted as yourself.
I look forward to our continuing friendship.
strings.fusion: They say strong memories can grant one power. Who would have known so many memories existed in this world...

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He was known as the Flaming Amarant, thanks to his shock of bright red hair as much as his fearsome power. Having grown up alone, he made his way through the world with two fists in front of him. Because of this, he was unable to bring himself to trust others, and was rarely heard to speak. Still, somehow, he found himself chasing after the man with the tail.
strings.summon:
How about that?
I'll stick around and see what you are truly made of.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion:
The most important rule for survival:
If it hinders you, cast it aside.
I won't make any attachments.

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Having fought his way alone through the world, he was reluctant to put trust in others. When he was a guard in Treno he set a trap to capture the thief Zidane, but ended up being framed by him instead. This set him in pursuit of Zidane, though ultimately not for revenge, but out of suspicion for the actions of a man who, despite having the power to lay him low, chose not to.
strings.summon:
I am the Flaming Amarant.
At least, that is what I was once called...
strings.evolution:
Life for winners; death for losers.
I have lived by this ironclad rule.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion: I fail to understand why one with such power would choose friendship instead...

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Even as an assassin appointed by Brahne herself, he was unable to subdue Zidane, who once threw his own trap back in his face. Curious as to why Zidane didn't deal him the final blow, and interested to see exactly what kind of man he was, Amarant decided to join his former adversary. Once a man who believed the strong have no need of the weak, the longer he spent with his new comrades, the more he changed.
strings.summon:
What do I really want to do?
What am I truly capable of?
These are the questions I want answers to.
strings.evolution:
Friends, huh?
Pah; that guy's made me soft in the head.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion:
How meddlesome you are...
You remind me of that guy...

strings.description: A bounty hunter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Young and dark-skinned, this self-proclaimed "most beautiful bounty hunter in the world" was somewhat full of herself. Her dream was to live a life of luxury, and to that end there was no job she would not undertake. Teaming up with the fearsomely powerful Amarant, another of Queen Brahne of Alexandria's hired assassins, she confronted her target Zidane. Despite her slender stature, she could swing an axe the size of her own body.
strings.summon:
I am the beautiful bounty hunter, Lani!
You have quite the discerning eye,
to recognize my strength! Although...
I suppose the giant axe is a giveaway.
strings.affinity:
I guess it can't be helped.
Would you mind if I called
you my partner?
strings.fusion:
This brings me one step closer
to my luxurious dream life.
I'll live like a queen!

strings.description: A bounty hunter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. This self-proclaimed "most beautiful bounty hunter" was full of pride; a pride soon confounded by her inability to handle minor issues. As an assassin hired to find Garnet of Alexandria, she stood in Zidane's way, but since her partner Amarant regarded taking a hostage to achieve her goals a cowardly move, she found herself alone. It is also believed that she took part in Lindblum's Festival of the Hunt.
strings.summon:
The beautiful bounty hunter Lani
shall accompany you.
Is that a tear of joy I see?
strings.evolution:
Heh heh.
Would you like to try out my
ever-growing axe for yourself?
strings.affinity:
I guess it can't be helped.
Would you mind if I called
you my partner?
strings.fusion:
Oh my...
This is going to make me
even more beautiful!

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. Whispering in the ear of Alexandria's Queen Brahne, he convinces her of the advantages of using summons and artificial black mages, created from the Mist, to achieve her goals. In doing so, he achieves his own goal: a war that spreads across every corner of the continent. Kuja possesses an androgynous beauty, an unforgiving pride and a sadistic disdain for others. His flair for dramatic speeches reveals his narcissistic tendencies as well. He looks down on all other creatures, including Queen Brahne and the black mages he creates, as no more than pawns in his game.
strings.summon:
All the world's a stage.
Mind if I join you in watching the show?
strings.fusion:
Beautiful!
This cascade of power gives blessing to our victory!

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. In truth he is a Genome, an artificial lifeform created to host the souls of the people of Terra, another world that seeks to merge with Gaia. He receives his orders from Garland, a being whose aim is to safeguard Terra's future. To throw Gaia into confusion and aid the Terrans' takeover, Kuja uses Queen Brahne of Alexandria and others as tools in his dark schemes. He is an older sibling of sorts to Zidane, but when he saw the potential within his "little brother" and the hopes pinned upon him, he abandoned the child Zidane on Gaia.
strings.summon: Never would I have imagined running into you in a place like this. It must be fate.
strings.evolution:
Oh, how I've longed for this day!
The day I might cast away this mask and reveal my true self.
strings.fusion:
The weak lose their freedom to the strong.
Such is the way of the world.

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. He is a Genome, an artificial life that should not have independent will—and yet he does. Despite this "flaw," he is ordered by Garland to throw Gaia into chaos and help their home world absorb it. He plots to betray Garland, who sees him as no more than a tool to be used. But he falls into a spiral of despair when he learns that his lifespan is nearly spent and becomes self-destructive, intending to take the entire world down with him.
strings.summon:
This is not mere chance.
No, this is the power of fate.
strings.evolution:
It is the providence of nature that only the strong survive.
That is why I needed strength.
strings.affinity:
It appears you're not as feeble-minded as I thought, if you can understand my purposes.
Why don't you smile?
This is quite some praise.
strings.fusion: Yes! This is the power I've longed for!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Tidus is a talented player of blitzball, a beloved aquatic sport played in the sleepless city of Zanarkand. During a tournament match, a calamitous being known as Sin attacked the city, sending him to the unfamiliar world of Spira in the process. Puzzled and worried about the circumstances he will surely have to face, he washes ashore at Besaid Island. There he meets a man named Wakka, and takes up his proposition of going on a pilgrimage with the summoner Yuna in order to find his way back home.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
My head is spinning...
strings.affinity:
Let us continue
this story of ours!
strings.fusion:
I'm all powered up!
I'll clean these guys up in a flash!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. After being swept away from his home of Zanarkand and subsequently landing in the world of Spira, Tidus washes ashore at Besaid Island, where he meets a young woman named Yuna. There he learns that she is to set off on a pilgrimage to save the world, despite just having become a summoner. Tidus decides to accompany her, and during their time together Yuna discloses that his long lost father, Jecht, had previously visited Spira. This strengthens his resolve to help the summoner defeat Sin, as his father once had hoped to do as well.
strings.summon:
Support is here!
Don't know what's goin' on,
but I'm here to help!
strings.evolution:
As long as you have energy, use it!
That being said, let's do this!
strings.affinity:
Let us continue
this story of ours!
strings.fusion: I refuse to be called a greenhorn any longer!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Wakka is an avid blitzball player, and the optimistic captain and coach of the ill-fated Besaid Aurochs. He has known Lulu since childhood, and considers Yuna to be a part of his own family. When Tidus suddenly washes ashore the island of Besaid, Wakka can't help but see his deceased brother Chappu in the young man, and takes him under his wing. Not only that, but he also gifts Tidus with the sword that was once his younger brother's.
strings.summon:
I'm Wakka.
Coach and star of the
Besaid Aurochs.
strings.affinity:
I feel like as long as I'm
with you, I can't lose.
Let's keep working together!
strings.fusion:
It's hard getting my mind off blitz,
but now I know I need to focus on
the next battle.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Although Wakka was a passionate blitzball player, he decided to retire from the sport after his last tournament in Luca to join the summoner Yuna on her pilgrimage to defeat Sin. A positive and cheerful individual by nature, he may also intentionally avoid things that trouble him from time to time. This includes his strong dislike for the Al Bhed, who use machina as part of their lifestyle.
strings.summon:
Introducing Wakka to the field!
Let's get this done.
strings.evolution:
Leave the next shot to me.
I'll show you the fruits of my training!
strings.affinity:
I feel like as long as I'm
with you, I can't lose.
Let's keep working together!
strings.fusion:
I'm all warmed up!
I'll boot away any who dare cross us!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Wakka is a former blitzball player who now uses the techniques he learned for the sport against his enemies by throwing his ball at them. A devoted follower of the teachings of Yevon, he strongly objects to those who use machina, particularly the Al Bhed. However, he gradually learns that Yevon itself does not follow the teachings it preaches, leading the Al Bhed to protect summoners from the very Yevon he reveres. This eye-opening experience results in change of heart for Wakka.
strings.summon:
Well then, guess it's time.
Let's give it all we've got.
strings.evolution:
I'll never lose a battle!
