I'll defeat every monster I see!
It's so easy!
strings.affinity:
I feel like as long as I'm
with you, I can't lose.
Let's keep working together!
strings.fusion:
This is what I'm really made of.
Here it is, my super fast ball!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Rikku is the daughter of the leader of the Al Bhed faction, a group of people who devote themselves to restoring ancient machina, and has quite a talent for technology herself. After rescuing Tidus following his sudden arrival to Spira, she offers him a job digging for her in return for food and boarding. However, a powerful beast known as Sin attacks the ship they are boarding, and the two become separated from each other. Eventually, they reunite near the river Moonflow.
strings.summon:
I'm in charge of
keeping everyone pumped!
Lookin' forward to workin' with ya!
strings.affinity:
So you've recognized me as one
of your friends, as well?
I'm happy to hear it!
strings.fusion: Leave my mechanical little friend to me!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Rikku believes the current method for summoners to bring peace to their world is unfair. Hoping to spare Yuna from her eventual death as part of her duties as a summoner, she attempts to kidnap her on the Moonflow, and fails. Regardless, she becomes Yuna's final guardian, and accompanies her on her pilgrimage henceforth. However, she still clings to the hope of discovering a way to save her cousin's life.
strings.summon:
All right!
Leave it to me!
strings.evolution:
My memories are quite sweet,
so you'd best be nice to me!
strings.affinity:
So you've recognized me as one
of your friends, as well?
I'm happy to hear it!
strings.fusion:
I'm really scary when I get mad, you know!
I literally just blow up!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of another world where its people are trapped in a spiral of death. Rikku suffered a traumatizing accident during her childhood that left her with a phobia of thunder. Although she may seem overly emotional and childish, she has a good head on her shoulder for someone so young. She was resolved to find a way to save Yuna's life with Tidus until they realized that the Final Summoning was but a false rite. Now they must find a way to defeat Sin without the Final Summoning, and Rikku is racking her brain trying to accomplish the feat.
strings.summon:
No worries!
I'm right beside you!
strings.evolution:
Another five to six years and
I'll be an adult, too.
strings.affinity:
So you've recognized me as one
of your friends, as well?
I'm happy to hear it!
strings.fusion:
If someone wants to start a fet,
you can bet I'm going to end it!
But then again, if it's lightning they're packing...

strings.description: A Tarutaru sorceress from the distant world of Vana'diel. Possessed of formidable magical powers, she serves as minister of the Orastery, Windurst's Department of Magic. Her petite and charming exterior belies a proud, fiery, vainglorious personality that can prove hazardous to friends and enemies alike. Few things are more dire than being caught in a blaze of Shantotto's fire.
strings.summon:
Stand back and leave the fights to me.
I can show you a thing or three!
strings.fusion:
Ohohohohoho!
My powers of destruction
require no introduction!

strings.description: A formidable black mage from the distant world of Vana'diel. One of the most brilliant minds in Windurst, she serves as a professor of magical arts in and heads the Orastery, the republic's Department of Magic. Known for being "as high-and-mighty as Yutungah's fiery mountain, and as rough-cut as the rocky Gustaberg Ranges-wanges," she is a veritable force of nature who wreaks havoc on both friends and foes without discrimination. It is rumored that her one regret is never marrying, but don't bring this up in her presence without proper havoc-resistant armor.
strings.summon:
Are you, perchance, my newest pupil?
Watch out! Lessons may be brutal.
Ohohohoho!
strings.evolution:
I wonder, is it even right?
For one sweet mage to wield such might!
strings.affinity:
You're utterly fantastic!
And I'm not being sarcastic.
Don't just stand and dumbly drool─I'm praising you, you stupid fool!
strings.fusion:
Ohohoho!
My blood is on fire!
I'll make you perspire!

strings.description: The eldest living Galkan from the distant world of Vana'diel. Once a famed swordsman who had carved out a name for himself, he also taught his ways to Pagdako, whom the humes referred to as the "Iron Eater." After losing their previous leader in "the Storyteller" Raogrimm, it is said that Werei served as the spiritual pillar for his people for the next 30 years.
strings.summon:
You must cut your own path forward.
Only you can decide for yourself.
I can, however, lend you my power.
strings.affinity:
I must thank you all for giving this body,
which was only waiting to be reincarnated
once more, something to do.
strings.fusion:
Training is not to be avoided.
In swordsmanship, there is nothing
more important than it.

strings.description: The eldest living Galkan from the distant world of Vana'diel. Once a famed swordsman who had carved out a name for himself, after losing the Raogrimm, "the Storyteller," he did what he could to support the leader-less Galkan people. However, having perceived his own death, in order to be "reincarnated," Werei disappeared from his people. News of him having left on a journey sent shockwaves through the Galkan community, and it is said that all Galkans yearned for him.
strings.summon:
For the short time left until
I am reincarnated once again,
I will lend you my power.
strings.evolution:
This must mean
my blade still has a purpose.
strings.affinity:
I must thank you all for giving this body,
which was only waiting to be reincarnated
once more, something to do.
strings.fusion:
There are times when people
must face their own destiny,
no matter how difficult it may be.

strings.description: The eldest living Galkan from the distant world of Vana'diel. Easily over 200 years old, he fulfilled his purpose of holding together the leader-less Galkan people. The Galkans, made up only of males, are a race that begin life anew via a method known as "reincarnation." Once one perceives their own death, they quietly depart on a solo journey to be reincarnated. Werei, too, departed from his long-time friends, and departed on his journey to be reincarnated.
strings.summon:
Accomplish what needs to be accomplished.
I wish for you to take the path you believe in.
strings.evolution:
The river may have many branches,
but all lead to the same sea.
I want to view the world with an open mind.
strings.affinity:
I must thank you all for giving this body,
which was only waiting to be reincarnated
once more, something to do.
strings.fusion:
I have not yet matured.
I have yet much room for practice.

strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. An excellent white mage working as a secretary in Windurst's Heavens Tower, she has a very peculiar way of speaking. As sweet as her way of speaking and doing things may appear, what she says can be quite biting. However, she is very popular among adventurers, and it said that many visit the tower just to be able to see her.
strings.summon:
I am Kupipi,
I am a secretary at Heavens Tower
in the Federation of Windurst.
strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.fusion:
Since I am a white mage,
I can recite magical incantations
as fast as I can without messing up-pup!

strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. Her incredibly high ability is evident from her appointment as secretary in the Heavens Tower, the most important institution to Windurst and its government. She checks on people who visit the tower, serving as the point of contact for adventurers, but it's her way of acting and speaking that has made her beloved by many of the adventurers she meets.
strings.summon:
Alright!
Let's give this all we've got!
...Got me-wot me?
strings.evolution:
People who only see the
world through rose-colored glasses
are truly the worst-durst!
strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.fusion:
Just give me some organic rolanberries
and work-ork as hard as you like!

strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. Assigned to work as a secretary in Windurst's most important institution, Heavens Tower, she has impeccable paperwork handling abilities. Aside from her abilities, she has a very particular way of speaking, a cute way of acting along with a harsh tongue, and a particular fondness of rolanberries, all of which add to her extremely unique personality.
strings.summon:
I have the perfect job for you.
I'm just like that-hat!
strings.evolution:
I would not purposely mistake-ake my
incantations over the power of
trust, affection, or friendship!
strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.fusion:
Hurry and take me on an adventure!
I want everyone to know of the
wraith a secretary can bestow!

strings.description: A young Elvaan girl from the distant world of Vana'diel. Contrary to her cute looks, she has a hearty personality, and is a proficient martial artist. A free-spirited girl who once led the Tavnazian Safehold's patrol and would even enter into dungeons alone, for some reason she came to be known as an "abominable child," and was confined long ago to a cathedral.
strings.summon:
I am an abominable child,
so listening to me would incur
the wrath of the goddess, you know?
strings.affinity:
It's never boring with you, is it!
I look forward to having more fun with you!
strings.fusion:
Oh! Have I become stronger?
Hey, let's try this power out somewhere!

strings.description: A young Elvaan girl from the distant world of Vana'diel. Strong-willed and heroic, she excelled at martial arts and white magic, and served as leader of the Tavnazian Patrol. Despite her flawless beauty, due to a certain event she came to be feared by the people of Tavnazia as an "abominable child." Upon meeting an adventurer, she became wrapped up in a fight with "the one who comes at the end of the world."
strings.summon:
Prishe has arrived!
Hehe, nice to meet you all!
strings.evolution:
I won't give up, no matter what!
As injured as I may get,
nothing can damage my spirit!
strings.affinity:
It's never boring with you, is it!
I look forward to having more fun with you!
strings.fusion:
Let me show you a bit of what I can do!
I'll show you what I'm really made of!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. He lost his elder brother in the war with the Archadian Empire and was left alone in the world. He lives in the slums of the Royal City of Rabanastre, the capital of Dalmasca, and makes ends meet by doing odd jobs for a shopkeeper named Migelo—and by stealing from the Archadians who occupy the city. Though he hates the empire, which took both his brother and his homeland from him, it is not enough to inspire him to any greater action. He drifts through his days with only vague dreams of becoming a sky pirate to keep him moving.
strings.summon:
If something's stolen from me, I'll steal it back!
Simple enough, don't you think?
strings.fusion:
It's not like I want to live this way...
I want to do something more than this.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. He lost his elder brother, his only family left in the world, during the war with the Archadian Empire. The desire for vengeance within him remains nebulous, channeled into nothing more than petty thieving. He decides to sneak into the Archadian-occupied palace to "take back" some of the Dalmascan wealth that the Archadian forces have seized. This is how he meets Ashe, the crown princess of his fallen country, and the sky pirate Balthier. This is how his journey with them begins.
strings.summon:
I'm Captain Basch fon Rosenburg of Dalmasca!
...Pretty convincing, don't you think?
strings.evolution:
One step closer to being a real sky pirate!
All I need now is my own airship...
strings.fusion:
I'll steal some treasure and treat everyone
to a real meal for once!
No sweat!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. After meeting the princess of his fallen homeland, he began a journey to rid Dalmasca of its occupiers. It took a long time for him to accept the death of his brother, who was painted as a traitor after dying in service to their homeland. But by coming to know Basch, a knight also entangled in the plots surrounding his brother, and making a connection with Ashe, who has similarly lost so many she loved, he finally learns to move onward to the future.
strings.summon: I'm coming with you. I'm betting a great adventure awaits us!
strings.evolution:
I was always running away...
But not anymore. Now, I'm looking toward the future!
strings.affinity:
I'll fight with you until the end.
We came this far together.
We'll finish this together, too!
strings.fusion:
Someday I'll be the fastest pirate in the skies.
We'll see who's the leading man then!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Vaan lost his brother to the war against the Archadian Empire, and came to resent both Dalmasca and Captain Basch as a result. Consumed by his emotions, his loathing for them grew day by day until his travels with Princess Ashe and the sky pirate Balthier helped him grow as a person. Now he is finally able to see past his brother's untimely death, and has learned to take his future more seriously.
strings.summon:
I'm going.
I'm sure I'll find it if I go with you,
what it is I should do from now on.
strings.evolution:
I will no longer run away from
the death of my brother.
I need to find a goal for myself.
strings.affinity:
I'll fight with you until the end.
We came this far together.
We'll finish this together, too!
strings.fusion:
I couldn't have imagined that
I would come this far.
I feel I have changed.

strings.description: A young woman who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Ashe is the princess of Dalmasca, a nation that met its ruin at the hands of the Archadian Empire. Although she was officially proclaimed dead amidst all the confusion, she is alive and well. In fact, she has formed the Resistance in secrecy to fight against the empire. Absolutely resolved to avenge her ravaged nation, her father's murder, and the death of her young husband, she fights on claiming that her actions are for the liberation of her people.
strings.summon:
It can't be helped.
I will travel along with you
until I'm able to find my friends.
strings.affinity:
I hope I can stay this strong.
But don't think I'm so strong I can
do everything everything myself.
strings.fusion:
I have to do it.
Even for those it is too late to save!

strings.description: The princess of Dalmasca who appears in tales of Ivalice, and a descendant of the Dynast King who onced unified her world. She was proclaimed dead after the Archadian Empire attacked her nation, but she actually survived the attack and went on to lead the Resistance in secrecy. Although originally bent on obtaining power to carry out her vengeance upon the empire, she eventually has a change of heart during her travels with Vaan and Balthier.
strings.summon:
It does not matter who you are.
Please, steal me! Take me away from here!
strings.evolution:
Power can come in handy.
If you don't have power,
you can't protect anyone.
strings.affinity:
I hope I can stay this strong.
But don't think I'm so strong I can
do everything everything myself.
strings.fusion:
I am hungry for power.
Don't I look that way to you?

strings.description: The princess of Dalmasca who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. After losing everything to the militant Archadian Empire, Ashe forms the Resistance and retreated underground in hopes of eventually reclaiming Dalmasca's independence. She then sets off on a journey to find nethicite, a stone of great power that can aid her plans for vengeance against the empire. However, she ultimately decides to save Dalmasca without the power of the stone thanks to the support of her friends Vaan and Balthier.
strings.summon:
I am me. I am not an avenger,
nor am I my nation's savior.
I just want to be free.
strings.evolution:
I am fully prepared.
I can withstand any sort of hardship.
strings.affinity:
I hope I can stay this strong.
But don't think I'm so strong I can
do everything everything myself.
strings.fusion:
Even if you gain power,
it doesn't change the past.
That's why, I...

strings.description: A young lady from the world of Ivalice, beyond the Farplane. After losing her family to the war, she was fostered together with her childhood friend Vaan. Earning her keep at a sundry shop in Rabanastre, she is a leader-like figure among her fellow orphans, who respect her for her wisdom and gentle disposition. She worries for the impulsive Vaan, who seethes with hatred for the Empire after the death of his brother.
strings.summon:
I can come along, right?
Come on, I won't get in the way.
strings.fusion:
Look, just don't do anything crazy, okay?
I'm here, too. We can do this together.

strings.description: A young lady sung of in tales of the far-off world of Ivalice. Orphaned after the war, she was taken in and raised with her childhood friend Vaan, the two remaining inseparable until Vaan is caught consorting with pirates in the palace and led away in chains. Penelo is subsequently kidnapped by the ruthless bounty hunter Ba'Gamnan, but the friends are eventually reunited, once again becoming close companions on their quest. Penelo warmly watches over her friend as he grows from his experiences.
strings.summon:
I'm tired of being alone.
So I'm coming with you! No worries, right?
strings.evolution:
Maybe it's time I become a sky pirate, too!
...Just kidding!
strings.affinity:
I wish I could show you Ivalice, even just once.
It's an amazing place, you know?
strings.fusion:
Just tell me if you feel sad.
I bet that one of my dances would
put a smile on your face!
Though...I've still got a lot to learn.

strings.description: A young lady sung of in tales of the far-off world of Ivalice. Penelo is a skilled dancer from the Royal City of Rabanastre who lost her parents to the horrors of war. Having been raised with Vaan under the same adoptive household, she refuses to leave his side and joins him on his quest to aid Princess Ashe in her efforts to regain Dalmasca's independence. Although their journey proves to be an arduous one, Penelo and Vaan help keep spirits high among their comrades with their lively and carefree attitude.
strings.summon:
Do you know Vaan?
I hope he's not just wasting
his time somewhere.
strings.evolution:
I have lost many things.
I hope to be able to throw away
the past and look to the future.
strings.affinity:
I wish I could show you Ivalice, even just once.
It's an amazing place, you know?
strings.fusion:
Those who have passed can no
longer do what they want to.
What is it that we should do?

strings.description: A sky pirate who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Balthier is a man who prizes his freedom above all else, endlessly globetrotting Ivalice on his airship, the Strahl, with his partner Fran. A man of many virtues, he nobly claims to steal only from the wicked, although his pompousness and philandering are unbecoming. Little did he know, however, that his plans to steal the treasures hidden within the Royal Palace of Rabanastre's treasury would change his life forever.
strings.summon:
Who am I, you ask?
Isn't it obvious?
I'm the star of this show.
strings.affinity:
Do exactly as I taught you!
You can fly!
strings.fusion:
Enough with the sluggish piloting.
It is unbecoming of a hero.

strings.description: A sky pirate who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Balthier made quite a name for himself soaring the skies and stealing from the wicked with his partner Fran, a viera warrior. However, fate lead him to join Princess Ashe's efforts in restoring her country of Dalmasca after its destruction at the hands of the Archadian Empire. This journey helped him to reconnect with his past and ultimately face off against his own father.
strings.summon:
You want me to come with you?
Okay, as long as I get some
treasure out of it.
strings.evolution:
I am used to having my work questioned,
but I promise I will not betray you.
Shall I swear with my sword?
strings.affinity:
Do exactly as I taught you!
You can fly!
strings.fusion:
I, myself, am a runaway.
I believe I ran away so that I could be free.

strings.description: A warrior of the viera, a rabbit-eared race, whose tale is told in the distant world of Ivalice. Atypical of her reclusive people, she left her homeland to venture into hume society, where she fights as the trusted comrade of the sky pirate Balthier. She is a formidable figure, possessed of great knowledge, experience, and the heightened sensitivity to Mist unique to her kind, and provides cool, confident advice to her companions while keeping a professional distance.
strings.summon:
I am a viera who has discarded Wood and village.
I know not if I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
This power...it is different from the Mist.
But it is not a bad power.

strings.description: A storied warrior of the viera, a rabbit-eared race hailing from the distant world of Ivalice. She is the fast friend and loyal comrade of Balthier, the cocky and cunning sky pirate who claims to pilot the fastest vessel in the world. Possessed of deep knowledge of history and tradition, the heightened sensitivity to Mist unique to her kind, and expert skill with airship technology, she proves an impressive ally to Ashe and her companions.
strings.summon:
Show me your decision.
Will you hold your own, or run away?
strings.evolution:
The power of the world of humes that I found after leaving the woods behind.
I suppose...it suits me after all.
strings.affinity:
If I had not left the Wood and lived with the humes, there is much I would never have known.
You are one of those things I would have missed.
strings.fusion:
This burning from within...!
But do not worry...
I will remain calm.

strings.description: A holy man from the distant world of Ivalice, where he serves as Gran Kiltias of the Kiltia sect. Known as a Dreamsage, he possesses nigh limitless knowledge due to his ability to enter the dreams of others. A stern, austere figure, his influence extends across the realm. When the princess Ashe arrives seeking his blessing to rebuild the Kingdom of Dalmasca, he foresees the danger that awaits her and warns her against folly.
strings.summon: I dream. For reality and illusion are a duality, two parts of a whole.
strings.fusion:
Great power tests a person.
It is a difficult thing to hold on to,
while also holding onto yourself.

strings.description: A holy man from the distant world of Ivalice. When visited by Ashe, a princess of Dalmasca, a land since ruthlessly conquered by the Archadian Empire, who now seeks the power to rebuild her former kingdom, he perceives the desire for revenge in her heart and issues a stern warning. It is said that it is he who once imprisoned the great wyrm Fafnir.
strings.summon:
Forbear mere speech, for your dreams are known to me.
I shall offer what strength I can.
strings.evolution:
This power...
It harks back to the day I sealed away that great wyrm...
strings.affinity:
Your dreams intrigue me...
Yes, I think I should enjoy seeing where your path leads.
strings.fusion:
May Faram the Father lead you in his
light, to wherever your path may end.

strings.description: The prince of Nabradia who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. The kingdom of Nabradia boasts of exuberant nature and bountiful resources, but it is still subject to the pressure and threats of larger sovereign states. Despite this, Rasler marries Ashe, the princess of Dalmasca, in a grand and elaborate ceremony that engulfs their nations in joyous celebration. Unfortunately, the festivities are cut short when the Archadian Empire attacks Nabudis, the capital of Nabradia.
strings.summon:
Wh-where in...
What happened to Nabudis?
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come
this far was all thanks to you.
Thank you.
strings.fusion:
With power like this,
I wonder if I could've protected
Nabradia back then?

strings.description: The prince of Nabradia who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. Rasler marries Ashe to reinforce the alliance between his Kingdom of Nabradia and her Kingdom of Dalmasca, but his home suffers a devastating attack by the powerful Archadian Empire that seeks to take control over Ivalice. Following the destruction of the capital, Rasler heads to the battlefield to avenge the death of his father, the king of Nabradia.
strings.summon:
I was summoned here?
I wonder if I'm still capable
of anything in this form?
strings.evolution:
Just because I'm of the royal family,
doesn't mean I'm just looking
to be protected.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come
this far was all thanks to you.
Thank you.
strings.fusion:
I know it's the duty of the royal family,
but it still doesn't make this any less tiring.

strings.description: The prince of Nabradia who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. After marrying Princess Ashe to strengthen the alliance between Nabradia and Dalmasca, Rasler's home suffers a devastating attack by the Archadian Empire. This leads him to make his way towards Nalbina Fortress with Basch, captain of the Dalmascan forces, to defend Dalmasca against any upcoming attacks. Sadly, although he fought bravely against the empire, an enemy arrow would ultimately take his life at the tender age of eighteen.
strings.summon:
A fight for country, and the world, eh?
I will go with you, then!
strings.evolution:
Not yet!
I'm not giving up just yet!
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come
this far was all thanks to you.
Thank you.
strings.fusion:
I wonder how she's doing?
As long as she's not pushing
herself too hard...

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Lightning is a soldier from the floating continent of Cocoon, ruled by servants of the gods known as the fal'Cie. Her unsociable and serious demeanor often makes her seem indifferent to those around her, when in reality she hides a gentle soul that drives her to face peril boldly to protect those she loves. Lightning gave up her post as a soldier to save her sister Serah, who had become a prisoner of the fal'Cie, and boarded a train full of unjustly exiled citizens to defy the fate the gods had chosen for her.
strings.summon:
Keep your eyes in front.
I'll watch the rear.
strings.affinity: When it looks like there's no hope left, we look harder until we find some. Always have, always will.
strings.fusion:
I don't take orders from fal'Cie.
How I live is up to me.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Lightning chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save her sister Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in Lightning herself being cursed as a "l'Cie." The l'Cie were believed to be the enemies of peace; thus Lightning and her fellow l'Cie came to be persecuted by various enemies. Although not always in agreement, the l'Cie formed strong bonds with one another, seeking to fulfill their Focus in defiance of the gods.
strings.summon: Fighting without hope is no way to live. It's just a way to die. Now, show me the hope you've found.
strings.evolution:
Destroying the world isn't salvation.
I'll keep fighting until the end.
This power will give me the strength.
strings.affinity: When it looks like there's no hope left, we look harder until we find some. Always have, always will.
strings.fusion:
It's not a question of can or can't.
There are some things in life you just do.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow was the leader of NORA, a group that refused to rely on the fal'Cie that ruled the floating continent of Cocoon. He was a fiery young man, often diving headfirst into danger, whose irrepressible spirit always had him in the front lines fighting to protect his comrades. When Snow learned that his lover Serah has been taken captive by the fal'Cie, he headed toward the mysterious "Vestige" to save her.
strings.summon:
The hero has arrived!
Time to get this party started!
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
I'm pumped!
Now let's take these new powers for a test ride.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save his lover Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in him being cursed as a "l'Cie." However, even as a victim of relentless persecution, Snow never wavered in his determination to save Serah. Though his naive optimism was the cause of many disagreements with his comrades, his tireless fighting spirit ultimately sustained the hope of his fellow l'Cie.
strings.summon: I'm just a big dummy, so let me draw all the enemy fire, all right?
strings.evolution: I won't sit here waiting. I'm going to build the future with my own two hands.
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
I'll never give up.
I'll protect my friends and save the world. I promise.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save his lover Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in him being cursed as a "l'Cie." As he and his friends struggled to understand the Focus they had been given, Snow's unflagging desire to save Serah inspired his comrades, pushing them forward. His faith in Serah's plea to save Cocoon would ultimately lead him to rebel against the fate the gods had determined for him.
strings.summon:
Saving the world...
I may not be the best man for the job, but running away wouldn't be very heroic, now would it?
strings.evolution: We have a Focus to fulfill, but even that is something that we choose for ourselves.
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
Forget the l'Cie.
If we have hope, we'll make it somehow. I'll never give up; you can count on that!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Vanille was an innocent girl who knew no fear, yet at times she might suddenly succumb to the grief hidden deep inside. Though she understood little of day-to-day life in the fal'Cie-ruled society of Cocoon, she was very knowledgeable about "Pulse," the world below, and the cursed beings known as the "l'Cie." The source of her knowledge, however, remained a mystery.
strings.summon:
Did a miracle bring me to this world?
Or was it the work of a blasted Focus?
strings.affinity:
Wishes can come true.
But not if you just wait around for a miracle. That's why I promise to protect you.
strings.fusion: If it's too much to cope with, face it later. That's what you told me, right?

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Vanille was an innocent girl with little knowledge of everyday things, yet prodigious knowledge of the legendary "l'Cie" and the world of "Pulse" that lay below. She eventually boarded a train full of unjustly exiled Cocoon citizens, and in the midst of the commotion that arose between the military and the people, ran into a young boy named Hope. Together they then headed toward the mysterious "Vestige," though to what end, no one knew.
strings.summon: The truth is...I've always run from my fate as a l'Cie. But I won't run anymore.
strings.evolution: Let's keep the flame of hope burning in our hearts and achieve the impossible!
strings.affinity:
Wishes can come true.
But not if you just wait around for a miracle. That's why I promise to protect you.
strings.fusion: I won't run anymore; I promised I wouldn't. This time I'm going to fight back!

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Sazh worked as a pilot of passenger ships in Cocoon, the floating continent ruled by servants of the gods known as the fal'Cie. However, mysterious circumstances led him to board the same train, full of unjustly exiled civilians, as did Lightning, and he came to join her despite his lack of battle experience. Sazh's cheery, joking manner could cause others to misapprehend him as unserious, but in fact he had a mature outlook on life and could be counted on as a provider of wisdom. His constant companion was a chocobo chick.
strings.summon:
I'll go with you.
If you don't mind hanging out with a rookie.
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion: Looks like Daddy won't be fighting alone anymore.

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Sazh worked as a pilot of passenger ships in the floating continent of Cocoon, until his normal life was snatched away when the fal'Cie branded his son, Dajh, a l'Cie. Determined to fight for the sake of his son, he boarded a train bound for the world below, where he met Lightning. The two renegades then headed to the mysterious "Vestige" together, where they were eventually cursed as l'Cie themselves.
strings.summon: Daddy's gonna tear this place up! Well, not literally tear it...unless this place is made of paper and aluminum foil.
strings.evolution: I'm gonna be serious for a minute. If you're scared of dying and want to run away, run without looking back and you'll be OK.
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion: I'll find a way to repay you for everything you've done for this old man.

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Bent on saving his son Dajh from his fate as a l'Cie, Sazh threw himself into the heat of battle, only to be, ironically, branded as a l'Cie himself. Worse yet, the fal'Cie that had chosen him as their servant were working in opposition to the fal'Cie directing his son. Now an enemy of Cocoon, Sazh was persecuted to the point of contemplating death as an escape. However, the hope of one day seeing his son smile again freed him from despair.
strings.summon: Even when you're in trouble, you just have to laugh it off. Moping around won't help any.
strings.evolution: Some people say you have to hit rock bottom before finding hope. Look out, rock bottom: here comes a cannonball!
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion:
Daddy's all fired up!
Or it could just be heartburn, but that's good enough for now.

strings.description: A boy who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Hope lived an ordinary life with his loving parents in Cocoon, the floating continent ruled by servants of the gods; beings known as the fal'Cie. Apart from the rebellious attitude toward his father expected of a sensitive adolescent, his life was free of trouble. However, all that changed when he and his mother went on a trip to the seaside town of Bodhum and encountered the turmoil caused by the appearance of a creature from "Pulse." From that moment on, Hope's life would never return to normalcy.
strings.summon: I'll do better, and try harder, so that I won't be in your way. Please, take me with you...
strings.affinity:
We will not run away.
We will keep going and do what we have to do.
strings.fusion: The guy who destroyed my dreams will pay for it. I'm not ready yet, but I will be. Soon.

strings.description: A boy who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. While Hope was on a trip with his mother in the seaside town of Bodhum, the military found the mysterious "Vestige," prompting the immediate banishment of everyone in the area. Hope then witnessed his mother's death amidst the turmoil, and blamed the young leader of the civilian forces, Snow, for its occurrence. Swearing revenge upon Snow, Hope headed toward the Vestige, where he was eventually cursed as a "l'Cie."
strings.summon: The world is full of lies. There's no way of knowing what's right. All we can do is believe in ourselves.
strings.evolution:
If we have the power to destroy...
Then we have the power to save others. And I... I will!
strings.affinity:
We will not run away.
We will keep going and do what we have to do.
strings.fusion:
"It's not a question of can or can't. There are some things in life you just do."
Lightning taught me that. I'll fight too, just like her.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Although Fang was one of the dreaded l'Cie so feared by the people of Cocoon, she was somehow cooperating with their military forces. It was heard that she approached them in hopes of finding her missing childhood friend. Fang was a candid and sisterly warrior, who also enjoyed challenging formidable opponents to the death. However, she also had a tender heart; most tender of all if ever she witnessed her friends falling prey to their own fears.
strings.summon: I don't want to owe you anything. So if you're going to fight, don't do it unwillingly.
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.
strings.fusion: Huh, interesting technique you've got there. Is that what you call a miracle in this world?

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Fang was born and raised in Gran Pulse, a cursed place despised by the people of Cocoon. Nevertheless, she decided to work with a section of Cocoon's military forces in hopes of finding her missing childhood friend, Vanille. Her candor and amiability allowed her to befriend the l'Cie of Cocoon, though nothing could surpass the sisterly bond she shared with Vanille. It also seemed, unfortunately, that Fang was missing some of her memories.
strings.summon:
I'm looking for someone.
Her name is Vanille.
Ring any bells?
strings.evolution: Hmph. I don't plan to lose, so I feel bad for the poor souls that try to cross us.
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.
strings.fusion: At this rate, I just hope I can recover my memories.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Fang was a fearless, even audacious lance wielder—some might say a daredevil. Her tale tells that she became a l'Cie to protect her home world of Gran Pulse from an attack by the floating continent of Cocoon; however, her recollection of the incident remained sketchy. What could never be in doubt, however, was her enduring affection for her friend Vanille; a love unequaled, having spent half a lifetime with her.
strings.summon:
I'm a broken l'Cie.
If you're fine with that, then I'll follow you wherever you like.
strings.evolution: Let me show you how we take care of business in Gran Pulse!
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.
strings.fusion:
With this power, I can protect them...
Vanille, and everyone else too.

strings.description: A Miqo'te hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Y'shtola is one of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, and heads an investigation being conducted in the marine city of Limsa Lominsa. As a native of the scholarly nation of Sharlayan, she is capable of advanced magic and is well versed in ancient languages. Although her unwavering calm and collected attitude makes her seem cold, a more vulnerable aspect of her personality shows when she meets monsters such as the land-dwelling jellyfish aurelia, or when someone grabs tightly onto her tail.
strings.summon:
I am Y'shtola.
I'm a research historian.
I look forward to working with you.
strings.affinity:
You just need to keep moving forward
and worry about yourself.
I've got your back.
strings.fusion:
We all hope to avoid ruin.
It is based on our belief in this
that we act the way we do.

strings.description: A Miqo'te hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Y'shtola is one of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, and is in the midst of gathering information regarding primals and the Ascians, disciples of darkness. She is always composed yet merciless in battle, and does not mince her words neither on nor off the field. Finding her friend Yda, another member of the Scions, much too carefree for her own good, she constantly scolds her whenever she does anything reckless.
strings.summon:
Sorry for the wait.
Here we go! Stay focused!
strings.evolution:
Hehe, best not make fun of
my beloved Miqo'te family.
strings.affinity:
You just need to keep moving forward
and worry about yourself.
I've got your back.
strings.fusion:
We just have to knock out our
enemies before they even have
a chance to speak.

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Although he claims to be a wandering bard, Thancred is actually one of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, and heads an investigation being conducted in the desert city of Ul'dah. While a smooth-talker with a fondness for women off the field, the way he effectively overwhelms his opponents in battle shows no signs of delicacy. In the past, he lived as a thief on the streets of Limsa Liminsa until he met a sage by the name of Louisoix who persuaded him to turn his life around.
strings.summon:
Is this a date request?
If it's with a beautiful lady,
I'll gladly accept.
strings.affinity:
What a greedy one, hanging on to me.
No worries, allow me then
to be your escort moving forth!
strings.fusion:
Leave it to me!
I can't go without showing off what
I've got from time to time!

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Thancred and the leader of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, Minfilia, have been friends since she was a child, and he served as the connection between her and the sage Louisoix. When Thancred became much too involved in his investigation of the disciples of darkness known as the Ascians and the dark crystals connected to them, he became possessed by the Ascian known as Lahabrea. This unfortunately forced him to lead the rest of his comrades to great peril.
strings.summon:
To meet you in a place like this...
Was it by chance... Or is it fate?
strings.evolution:
You know, we can't just sit around
showing off all day.
I must protect the Dawn Warriors.
strings.affinity:
What a greedy one, hanging on to me.
No worries, allow me then
to be your escort moving forth!
strings.fusion:
Phew, so busy...
I guess that's what comes
with being so popular, eh?

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Thancred is a man who enjoys chatting up the ladies, but has no qualms about raising his blade against the enemy to put the fighting skills he learned as part of the underground world of Limsa Liminsa to good use. He is well-known in Ul'dah, where he worked gathering rare materials required for the creation of magical instruments. Incidentally, his run ins with various women have lead to some heated arguments.
strings.summon:
The words of love vary wherever you go.
I wonder what kind of poems
the women of this world prefer...?
strings.evolution:
Sorry for the wait!
Now the real fight begins!
strings.affinity:
What a greedy one, hanging on to me.
No worries, allow me then
to be your escort moving forth!
strings.fusion:
I need to get more powerful
so that I can protect everyone!

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Minfilia is the leader of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, an organization that has become involved in the multinational issues concerning the primals. Resolved to save Eorzea at all costs, she set up camp in Vesper Bay, west of Western Thanalan. Believing that those touched by the power of the Echo will act as the trump card to solve the dilemma concerning the primals, she is in search of those who can wield it, as well as any other adventurers willing to help her group's cause.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
Could this be another method
of gaining superior power?
strings.affinity:
You are my hope.
As long as you are around,
the Dawn Warriors can shine bright!
strings.fusion:
That password is "wild rose."
Be sure not to forget it.

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Minfilia became the leader of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn in accordance to sage Louisoix's dying wish by merging her organization of the Path of the Twelve with his of the Circle of Knowing. Following the culmination of the first stage of the war against the Garlean Empire, the Scions relocated their headquarters to the Rising Stones in Revenant's Toll. Their advancements in development have made them as productive as the three great city-states.
strings.summon:
I'm not against being called upon
from time to time!
strings.evolution:
Walls are not made to be taken away!
It is up to everyone to work together
to climb over them!
strings.affinity:
You are my hope.
As long as you are around,
the Dawn Warriors can shine bright!
strings.fusion:
All right! It's time for action!
Let's see this through to the end!

strings.description: A Hyur hailing from Eorzea who appears in the tales of the world of Hydaelyn. Minfilia is the leader of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn who fight the primals, and a wielder of the Echo bent on defeating the disciples of darkness known as the Ascians. The unwavering resolve she maintains to save Eorzea keeps her moving forth, regardless of the multitude of comrades she has lost along the way. Her intervention in the conflict between the people of Ishgard and their neighboring dragon kin was also for the sake of Eorzea's future.
strings.summon:
Can you hear it?
I am Minfilia.
Pleasure to meet you.
strings.evolution:
Our only hope to save this planet,
this lone seed of light,
we mustn't allow it to expire.
strings.affinity:
You are my hope.
As long as you are around,
the Dawn Warriors can shine bright!
strings.fusion:
Louisoix...
Please, protect the Seventh Dawn...

strings.description: A Hyur girl appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. A member of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, she is in charge of surveying the forest capital Gridania. She is an accomplished martial artist, and the power of her punches is much higher than one might think from looking at her petite build. She has a mysterious air about her given the fact her eyes are covered by the visor she wears, however in reality she is very cheerful and sociable.
strings.summon: I wonder what sort of enemy we'll face. I look forward to pummeling them!
strings.affinity:
I wanna fight with you someday!
I guarantee I won't lose!
strings.fusion:
Alright! Let's get to it!
The more the merrier!

strings.description: A Hyur girl appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. As a member of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, she is charged with investigating various problems, starting with the trouble with the primals. She is bright and positive, and though she is often being watched out for by her colleagues Y'shtola and Papalymo, her personality is often a source of inspiration, with her often setting the tone for most situations.
strings.summon:
Sorry for the wait!
Leave the rest to me!
strings.evolution: Looks like a new adventure's about to start! I can't help but be excited!
strings.affinity:
I wanna fight with you someday!
I guarantee I won't lose!
strings.fusion:
There we are!
Time to really let one loose!

strings.description: A Hyur girl appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. As a member of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, she is mainly focused on solving Gridania's primal problem. As full of vigor as she may be, she is not good at difficult conversation, and instead of using her head, she prefers moving her body. Good friends with Moenbryda, an authority on aetheryte techniques, she was happy to be reunited with her when she visited the Rising Stones headquarters.
strings.summon:
Your support is here!
Nothing to worry about, I can handle this!
strings.evolution:
We all have the same dream!
I must keep it alive!
strings.affinity:
I wanna fight with you someday!
I guarantee I won't lose!
strings.fusion: I-I'm not sleeping! I was just engrossed in thought, th-that's all!

strings.description: A Lalafell man appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. As one of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, he is in charge of surveying the forest capital Gridania with his colleague Yda. Hailing from Sharlayan, a city of scholars, he is highly intelligent, particularly so in aetherial studies. More sharp-tongued and critical than he would appear, he often speaks harshly to his partner Yda.
strings.summon:
You require my power, I see.
...I suppose I shall just have to join you.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to my willful partner,
I've grown used to being dragged around.
I'm with you to the end.
strings.fusion: If you are to hold the fort, you must be no less than fully prepared. Every spare moment must be dedicated to training.

strings.description: A Lalafell man appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. As a Scion of the Seventh Dawn, other than managing the primal situation, he also has to deal with problems caused by the Moogles and Sylphs in the forests nearby Gridania. Besides that, as an analyst, he also collects data necessary for the Scions of the Seventh Dawn to take action, but as it seems his partner Yda is quick to take action anyway, he is very harsh toward her.
strings.summon:
The things that can manifest
should one believe and hope enough...
It's almost as if...
strings.evolution: As is oft said, trouble arrives when you least expect it. It is precisely when things appear to be proceeding according to plan that we must needs steel ourselves for impending danger.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to my willful partner,
I've grown used to being dragged around.
I'm with you to the end.
strings.fusion:
I have a way of breaking us
out of this situation.
It is called a joint effort.

strings.description: A Lalafell man appearing in tales from Eorzea, a region in the faraway world of Hydaelyn. As a member of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, he is engaged in dealing with the primal situation in Gridania and beyond. Though he frequently scolds his partner Yda for her care-free behavior, it appears that deep down he really does trust her. Though this cute Lalafell may not look it, he is in his 40's, and has a tendency to be overprotective of young children.
strings.summon:
I'm glad to have more friends.
It's just that the noisier things get,
the harder it becomes to settle down...
strings.evolution:
It's easy to get carried away fighting.
For you and me, both.
We both have people waiting for us, after all.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to my willful partner,
I've grown used to being dragged around.
I'm with you to the end.
strings.fusion:
This disturbance in the aether...
I see. Now I understand why we were called here.

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Prince and rightful heir to the throne in the Kingdom of Lucis which possesses the world's only crystal. He is powerful despite being of royal blood, and like his forefathers is able to unleash the "Power of Kings," in which he can summon weapons to attack. Set to marry Lady Lunafreya of the imperial province of Tenebrae in accordance to the cease-fire with the Niflheim Empire, he sets off from the capital city Insomnia with his best friends, where his journey begins.
strings.summon: Step back, I've got this!
strings.affinity:
I couldn't have done it by myself.
For sticking with me this whole time... Here, take this.
strings.fusion: That's good, yeah.

strings.description: The prince of the Kingdom of Lucis, spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. He set out from the capital with his three friends looking forward to his wedding which would guarantee peace with the Niflheim Empire. Though he often acts brash in order to hide his shy and soft-spoken nature, he inherited his father's compassion for others and is a truly kind person. He is particularly accepting of his friends, treating them as if they were part of his own family.
strings.summon:
Sorry for the wait.
Alright, let's go.
strings.evolution: Alright, let's go all out.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't have done it by myself.
For sticking with me this whole time... Here, take this.
strings.fusion:
...Thanks.
But leave the rest to me.

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Nyx is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. Although the Kingsglaive is composed of the most elite and talented warriors, among them Nyx displays a special affinity to the magical power they borrow from the king to fight. Although he is originally from a remote region far away from the reach of the royal family, he was saved by King Regis as a child, and for this he strongly believes he owes a debt of gratitude to his liege.
strings.summon:
It's an agreement.
Let us go and protect our future.
strings.affinity: I look forward to working with you more, hero.
strings.fusion:
Boredom isn't all bad.
That's what happens with peace, right?
That is what I will give my all to fight for.

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Nyx is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. On the day that a peace treaty was to be signed between the Kingdom of Lucis and the Empire of Niflheim, which boasts of great technological advancements thanks to its knowledge of Magitek, things go awry. Niflheim had betrayed Lucis, stealing its Crystal and leaving the Crown City without its magical barrier, the Wall, in the process. Despite the odds being against him, Nyx chooses to fight to protect the future of the kingdom.
strings.summon: I will proudly defend our future.
strings.evolution:
We were guardians of the future.
There's no reason too keep your
eyes fixated on the past.
strings.affinity: I look forward to working with you more, hero.
strings.fusion:
I don't care what happens to me.
However, I wish to show the future to those who want it. That is all.

strings.description: The general of the Niflheim military forces spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. The Empire of Niflheim has made extraordinary advancements in technology that allowed it to create Magitek-based military forces to take over other territories. Glauca is the general of said military forces, a position no doubt earned through his abilities. He wears a suit of armor made of liquid metal that covers his entire body, including his face. Rumor has it that no one knows just who is hiding within the armor.
strings.summon: I hope you can be of use to me.
strings.affinity: If you've also something you can't let go of, show it to me.
strings.fusion:
Throw away your prayers.
It's not like any god is listening.

strings.description: The general of the Niflheim military forces spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Glauca once lead the Imperial Army in an attack against Tenebrae as an attempt to kill King Regis of Lucis, and his infant son Noctis, who was sick at the time. Consequently, he is solely responsible for the Empire's eventual acquisition of the Tenebrae province. Now his plan is to take control of the crown city of Insomnia from within while the military forces of the Empire of Niflheim strike the Kingdom of Lucis with all their might.
strings.summon:
I only fight for one reason.
What is it that you fight for?
strings.evolution: I will break apart this false peace with my blade.
strings.affinity: If you've also something you can't let go of, show it to me.
strings.fusion:
What is it you want to protect?
Let me hear your answer.

strings.description: The general of the Niflheim military forces spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. It is common knowledge that the armor covering Glauca's entire body is made from liquid metal, but the identity of the man behind the suit remains a myriad of mysteries. During the signing of the peace treaty between the Kingdom of Lucis and the Empire of Niflheim in the royal palace, Glauca moves behind the scenes to strike down King Regis and his followers. After being tasked with the siege of the crown city of Insomnia, he crosses blades with Nyx, a member of the Kingsglaive.
strings.summon:
It seems you're carrying some sort of
remnant inside of you, am I wrong?
strings.evolution:
I studied once that we are all
products of the paths we have walked.
strings.affinity: If you've also something you can't let go of, show it to me.
strings.fusion:
You can't win a fight just on feelings.
You would do good to remember that.

strings.description: A young woman spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Crowe is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. Although the Kingsglaive members borrow their magical power from the king himself, Crowe is especially adept in magic, allowing her to use powerful spells that make her an invaluable asset to the team. However, regardless of how great the power of the Kingsglaive may be, the Empire of Niflheim has the military prowess to match it.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
I was supposed to pick up
the princess, however...
strings.affinity:
It's nice gaining more friends.
I finally know where I stand in the world.
strings.fusion:
Sometimes you have to relax.
Let's enjoy our time off.

strings.description: A young woman spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Crowe is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. She grew up an orphan on the outskirts of Lucis, and thus fellow soldiers such as Nyx and Libertus are the only family she knows. Having devoted herself to protecting Lucis despite being an immigrant, she doesn't fully consent to the ceasefire that the Empire of Niflheim is currently proposing.
strings.summon:
You wish to borrow my strength?
Leave it to me.
strings.evolution:
I have friends on my side.
That is why I'm able to fight.
strings.affinity:
It's nice gaining more friends.
I finally know where I stand in the world.
strings.fusion:
I am of the Kingsglaive.
There are some who would turn away from the empire.

strings.description: A young woman spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Crowe is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. Although the power of the Kingsglaive is great indeed, the military forces of the Empire of Niflheim prove to be too much for it, forcing King Regis to agree with Niflheim's proposal of a ceasefire. It is during this time that Crowe is given a secret mission to escort Princess Lunafreya, fiancee to the Lucian Prince Noctis, out of her home of Tenebrae.
strings.summon:
Do you know Nyx and Libertus?
It's funny that they aren't here despite
always acting like they're in charge.
strings.evolution: For the pride of my homeland!
strings.affinity:
It's nice gaining more friends.
I finally know where I stand in the world.
strings.fusion:
To throw away one's own homeland...
To have fought so hard up until now,
what could have happened?

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. He is originally from the remote village of Galahd, and the roots to his home run deep. Nyx, a talented fighter and also member of the Kingsglaive, is a loyal friend whom he trusts completely. Crowe, on the other hand, is someone he treats more like a younger sibling. Sometimes he is so overprotective of her that she openly voices her frustrations with his attitude.
strings.summon:
Yo.
Might you be the hero of this world?
strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.fusion:
For the pride of my homeland!
I've still got a lot to give!

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. His best friend is Nyx, and they both happen to be from the village of Galahd. Once the Kingdom of Lucis agreed to the ceasefire treaty proposed by the Empire of Niflheim demanding that King Regis cede all his lands save for the crown city of Insomnia to the Empire, Libertus's love for his homeland would not permit him to remain idle.
strings.summon:
Freedom?
What are you talking about, "freedom"?
strings.evolution:
Peace attained through sacrificing
the weak is laughable.
strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.fusion:
I cannot just sit back and smile as
someone throws away their homeland.

strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. Although he is upbeat and outspoken by nature, he takes his responsibilities very seriously. Extremely attached to his remote home of Galahd, he begins doubting his place in the Kingsglaive after learning that his village will fall under the control of the Empire of Niflheim following the new conditions of the proposed ceasefire.
strings.summon:
I have something I wish to protect.
It's alright, I can still help you all.
strings.evolution:
I will bring back peace to my homeland.
That is what we have been fighting for.
strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.fusion: From now on, I'll fight how I wanna fight!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Ramza is a mysterious warrior who left many questions unanswered, after his untimely death, regarding his role in the War of Lions, and his actions as a heretic. Born the third and last son of the noble house of Beoulve, he strove to uphold his family name by becoming a knight alongside his childhood friend Delita, eventually joining the Gariland Royal Military Akademy with him. However, when compared to his two half brothers who were already knights, he never considered himself worthy of the house name.
strings.summon:
I may be inexperienced,
but I am a Beoulve,
and I fight for the honor of my name!
strings.affinity:
Just as you placed your trust in me,
I shall place mine in you.
I would be honored to continue fighting by your side!
strings.fusion: My father told me to follow the path I believe in. But where should I really place my faith?

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Ramza is the third and last son of the noble house of Beoulve, who always felt inferior to his two more successful half brothers. A virtuous young man with little knowledge of the intrigues that hatch like snakes in times of war, Ramza remained oblivious to the dark side of the world he inhabited. He held great promise as the son of a respected house, but his life was much altered by the events that would follow the great conflict known as the War of Lions.
strings.summon: I wonder, is this world, too, blighted by strife? And could I be of any service?
strings.evolution:
This strange power...
I wonder if it will make me stronger.
strings.affinity:
Just as you placed your trust in me,
I shall place mine in you.
I would be honored to continue fighting by your side!
strings.fusion:
I will not be made a puppet!
I...I wish to follow the path I believe in.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. The youngest son of the prestigious House Beoulve, Ramza left his family and their military ties behind upon learning of the nobility's unfair treatment of the common people. After relinquishing the Beoulve name, he adopts his mother's maiden name and joins a group of mercenaries led by the Fell Knight Gaffgarion. However, this only results in another clash between him and House Beoulve following Gaffgarion's attempt to kidnap Princess Ovelia.
strings.summon:
I am no longer a knight.
I am now just an ordinary mercenary.
strings.affinity:
I have friends.
Friends with the same will as myself.
I believe you are one of those friends.
strings.fusion:
For many people to suffer and die
over the expectations of only a few...
This is just unforgivable.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Ramza joined Gaffgarion band of mercenaries and subsequently found himself involved in their plans to kidnap Princess Ovelia. In time he comes to learn that his brother Dycedarg has been using the war at hand as a means to gain more political influence, and decides to oppose him in the name of justice. Although Ramza is set on preventing the war from escalating even further, the appearance of the mystical auracite only serves to lead Ramza into the thick of the battle.
strings.summon:
I'll go, too.
I will not be a burden to you.
strings.evolution: I won't again allow the weak to be sacrificed!
strings.affinity:
I have friends.
Friends with the same will as myself.
I believe you are one of those friends.
strings.fusion:
I will happily swing my sword
as long as it's in someone's defense.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Delita served the widely respected House Beoulve, into which he and his sister Tietra had been adopted following the death of their severely ill parents. Once taken in, he became fast friends with Ramza, a son of the head of the house, Barbaneth Beoulve. It was Delita's adoptive father who would push both him and Ramza to join the exclusive Gariland Royal Military Akademy. The two friends gradually formed a bond which transcended the social gap that originally separated them.
strings.summon:
Are you knights as well?
So even another world has kings and knights, and I'm still a misfit.
strings.affinity: You wish me, a man of common birth and heir to no house, to aid you in your quest? Just like Ramza...
strings.fusion:
Have I become...a little stronger?
Yet I am barely along the path to becoming a great knight.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Delita and his sister Tietra were born mere commoners, but were adopted into the noble House Beoulve after losing their parents to the Black Death. He was raised alongside Ramza, whom he quickly befriended and eventually trained with at the Gariland Royal Military Akademy. However, after Tietra became a casualty of a bungled plot during the War of Lions, he came to a grim understanding of the ramifications of his social position.
strings.summon:
I am neither a knight,
nor a mere commoner.
I belong nowhere.
strings.evolution:
Now that I have this power,
what shall I do with it?
Ramza...please show me the way.
strings.affinity: You wish me, a man of common birth and heir to no house, to aid you in your quest? Just like Ramza...
strings.fusion:
I have always felt out of place.
But even so, I might once have hoped to make peace with my situation.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Although Delita has been friends with Ramza since childhood, he is of common birth. Once he finally began recognizing the gap between them due to their social standing, he lost his sister Tietra to the strife involving House Beoulve. This tragedy would lead him to part ways with Ramza, and send him down a path in which nobles would no longer be able to manipulate him. Determined to realize his new ambitions, he joins the Church of Glabados and poses as a knight of the Order of the Southern Sky to kidnap Princess Ovelia from Orbonne Monastery.
strings.summon:
I am only trying to go against this one great current.
That is all.
strings.affinity:
I will not betray you.
I will swear...
On my dearly departed sister...
strings.fusion:
The most ideal method will not necessarily
yield the most positive results.
You should remember this.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As a member of the Church of Glabados, Delita joins forces with Duke Goltanna in order to pave the way for the War of the Lions. After being recognized for his successful kidnapping of Princess Ovelia, he is named commander of the Blackram Knights and earns Goltanna's trust through his dealings with the cardinal. However, this would all ultimately lead to his assassination of both Orlandeau and Goltanna as per the wishes of the church.
strings.summon:
Is this too a rotten world in which I've but
to carry out the role I've been handed?
I am sorry but I cannot accept that.
strings.evolution:
I will not be controlled.
I am the one who will take control!
strings.affinity:
I will not betray you.
I will swear...
On my dearly departed sister...
strings.fusion:
One should be rewarded for their efforts?
That is a lie made up by society.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Agrias was a knight serving the Lionsguard, the personal bodyguards of the Atkascha royal family, and was entrusted with protecting Princess Ovelia. Her loyalty to the crown was unquestionable, yet she abhorred the corruption in the powers-that-be of Ivalice; those who would exploit Ovelia for their own schemes. Agrias sought to shelter the princess from the perils of the upcoming war by relocating her to Gallionne. There, they would meet the mercenary Ramza.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
Have you summoned me here?
strings.affinity: Regardless of any predicament, trust in your comrades. My comrades put their faith in me, so shall I do the same with you!
strings.fusion:
Our lives are as fleeting as dreams.
What a somber thought.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As a holy knight, each devastating swing of her sword was charged with a sense of justice and honor. Her position as a knight of the Lionsguard, which protected the royal family, led her to become Princess Ovelia's personal bodyguard. Sympathizing with the sequestered life the princess led, Agrias threw herself into the heat of battle to protect her from all harm. She would later find a kindred spirit in Ramza, with whom she braved death numerous times throughout her mission to guard the princess.
strings.summon:
Are you in need of aid?
I trust you will use this blade in the name of justice!
strings.evolution:
This new power...
Is it an awakening?
strings.affinity: Regardless of any predicament, trust in your comrades. My comrades put their faith in me, so shall I do the same with you!
strings.fusion: A knight cannot turn her back on duty and leave her work undone! Allow me to accompany you!

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. A loyal and dedicated warrior of the Lionsguard, Agrias uses her powerful skills as a holy knight to protect Princess Ovelia. In accordance to her duties, she joins forces with Ramza to move the princess to a safe location in the wake of war. Eventually she learns of the conspiracy enveloping Ivalice, and of the dark beings known as the Lucavi behind it all. Once the battle against the Lucavi begins, Agrias fights them alongside Ramza.
strings.summon:
I am Agrias Oaks,
a knight of the Lionsguard.
I have your back!
strings.evolution:
This power, you guided to me.
In thanks, I pledge myself to you.
strings.affinity: Regardless of any predicament, trust in your comrades. My comrades put their faith in me, so shall I do the same with you!
strings.fusion:
One should not spend their life
suffering with uncertainty.
I will show you your path with my blade!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma is the youngest of four siblings in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession. She attends the Eagrose Preparatory Akademy, and is a cheerful and bright girl who readily befriends people across class boundaries. Alma favored her full brother, Ramza, over their two elder half brothers, and spent most of her life in a monastery. There she met Princess Ovelia, to whom she became a close friend after realizing they shared similar circumstances.
strings.summon:
I am going with you!
I am convinced I shall prove useful somehow!
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.fusion: I shall teach you how to whistle on a blade of grass. There is a small secret to it, you know!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma is the youngest in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession, and is a cheerful and bright girl, adored by her closest brother, Ramza. After losing her childhood friend Tietra to the events that unfolded in the Battle of Ziekden Fortress, she began to question the motives of her two eldest brothers, and decided to join Ramza on his quest. It wasn't long before she too was caught up in the web of conspiracies crisscrossing Ivalice like tripwires.
strings.summon: I may not be as strong as my brother Ramza, but I can still aid you in battle!
strings.evolution:
This power is like a fever!
But I wonder if I haven't become
a little stronger...?
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.fusion: What can I do...so that no more people must suffer in the manner Tietra did?

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma was the youngest in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession, and Ramza's full sister. After coming to doubt the motives of her elder half brothers and the war they waged, she decided to join Ramza, who severed ties with House Beoulve by absconding. Originally intending only to help Ramza locate the auracite within the Orbonne Monastery, she was unfortunately caught in the conspiracy then transpiring in Ivalice, which greatly altered her fate.
strings.summon: To live in Ivalice is a wondrous blessing. You love your world as well, do you not? If so, then you must protect it!
strings.evolution:
Now I can fight as my brother does.
We shall protect those precious to us, and put an end to this war!
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.fusion: I feel a warm energy overcoming my body... It is unlike that of the sacred stones. Perhaps I may at last be of some use to my brother.

strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As tensions ran high due to the outbreak of war, Gaffgarion was hired by the Order of the Northern Sky to protect Princess Ovelia en route to Eagrose. He had in fact been division commander of the Order of the Eastern Sky during the Fifty Years' War, but was expelled for the barbarism he employed to ensure his final victory. Now he serves as a superior to his comrade Ramza, who has renounced the name of his noble house.
strings.summon:
You seek my services?
I do expect you have the means to pay my fee.
strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.fusion: Men do not act of their own accord without expecting recompense! You know this to be true.

strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Gaffgarion was a man who would use any means necessary to ensure victory, if money was at stake. Although he had been hired to protect Princess Ovelia, his true mission was revealed to be the elimination of the young girl. However, his plans to assassinate the princess failed thanks to Delita, and he was thus promptly forced to part from Ramza's company.
strings.summon: I shall accomplish any mission I undertake, regardless of what it entails. But of course...for the right price.
strings.evolution:
This is useful indeed!
Now earning my fee will be child's play!
strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.fusion: The most powerful force in this world is money. Justice and ideals are just pretty words in the wind!

strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Gaffgarion is a man who will use any means necessary to ensure victory whenever money is at stake. Originally hired by Dycedarg Beoulve to discard Princess Ovelia, he attempts to persuade Ramza into completing the task in the name of the Beoulve family regardless of Ramza's numerous objections. Whether Gaffgarion's words originated from a genuine concern for his country, or just to carry out his mission, remains unknown.
strings.summon:
You've got quite the eye to pick me, kid.
Sure, I'll do whatever you say.
As long as I'm getting paid for it!
strings.evolution:
It is wise to invest in me.
As long as the pay is good,
I will remain your loyal pet.
