strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.fusion:
Better not slack when it comes to being prepared.
You can't use enough discretion
if you want to survive on the battlefield.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. He was the son of Besrudio Bunansa, a brilliant machinist famed for the creation of mechanical weaponry. Mustadio had mastered use of the pistol, a device that could fire metal projectiles at high speed when packed with explosive powder. Mustadio and his father found the Taurus auracite while at an excavation site in the clockwork city of Goug. This led them to be persecuted by the infamous Baert Trading Company until Ramza came to their rescue.
strings.summon:
My name is Mustadio.
I am a machinist who toils to restore lost legacies!
strings.affinity:
I knew it!
I was confident you and I would become good friends!
strings.fusion:
Guns require no charge time.
Simply aim and fire!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Mustadio was a machinist who had mastered use of the pistol. He was rescued by Ramza from persecution by the Baert Trading Company in the clockwork city of Goug, in whose depths an ancient civilization was said to lay dormant. Mustadio became a target after discovering the Taurus auracite while working on an excavation site. Once rescued, he joined Ramza on his quest, in hopes of saving his father from the company's clutches.
strings.summon: Could my presence in this world be the work of the auracite as well...?
strings.evolution:
What could this be?
My aim has never felt so accurate!
strings.affinity:
I knew it!
I was confident you and I would become good friends!
strings.fusion: The pistols of this world are of fair quality as well. I look forward to fighting by your side!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Mustadio had mastered the pistol, the weapon of an ancient and lost civilization. He was caught up in a great commotion after his discovery of the Taurus auracite while on an excavation site in Goug. Although he initially joined Ramza and his companions in hopes of freeing his captive father from the clutches of the Baert Trading Company, he eventually found himself fighting for their cause. Mustadio's aim with the pistol was so infallible and deadly that in some situations, it was necessary for him to refrain from shooting altogether.
strings.summon: Do you require the assistance of my pistols? I shall make a target of whatever you like!
strings.evolution: Could this be what they refer to as an awakening? I feel like I could shoot a mosquito out of the sky at a hundred paces!
strings.affinity:
I knew it!
I was confident you and I would become good friends!
strings.fusion: You will not direct a machine to attack me, will you? I am putting my trust in you!

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Cidolfus Orlandeau is also known as "Thunder God Cid," and is a man feared by many due to his reputation as the undefeated general of the Order of the Southern Sky under the banner of the Black Lion. Once the War of the Lions had erupted amidst disputes of succession within the royal family, his resolve to protect and fight for the people never faltered.
strings.summon:
Do you require the power of the
so-called "Thunder God Cid"?
strings.affinity:
It's like I'm looking upon a childhood friend.
I am truly blessed with good companions.
strings.fusion:
The people make a nation,
as we are made from the people.

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Known by many as "Thunder God Cid," Orlandeau was the leader of Duke Goltanna's Order of the Southern Sky. The two were friends for more than twenty years until Duke Goltanna decided to wage war with little regard as to the fate of the people. Shortly after the War of the Lions commenced, the Church of Glabados fed false information to Duke Goltanna claiming that his old friend had become a traitor, which resulted in Orlandeau being imprisoned in Fort Besselat.
strings.summon:
You must walk that path that you,
and you alone, believe in.
strings.evolution:
I refuse to participate in a
fight which has no meaning.
I beg you please, do not forget this.
strings.affinity:
It's like I'm looking upon a childhood friend.
I am truly blessed with good companions.
strings.fusion: Keep your back to the wall and always attack from behind. These very words have saved me in the past.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Meliadoul is a Knight Templar in service of the Church of Glabados, and as thus was entrusted with the Sagittarius auracite. However, neither her nor her younger brother Isilud knew about the power hidden within the auracite, believing it to be a peculiar stone at best. Following the death of her brother in Riovanes Castle, she swears revenge upon Ramza, whom she believes to be his killer.
strings.summon:
My name is Meliadoul.
Please allow me to go with you.
strings.affinity:
To find something more important than oneself,
that must be what love is...
strings.fusion:
Change requires a degree of pain.
Without pain, true change cannot be achieved.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Meliadoul is a Knight Templar, like her deceased brother Isilud, who has dedicated herself to saving Ivalice from ruin by serving the Church of Glabados. Although Ramza attempts to explain to her that Isilud was killed by the legendary Lucavi demons, she refuses to accept this until she witnesses Marquis Elmdore turn into a Lucavi while in Limberry Castle. Having seen the truth with her very eyes, she joins Ramza in his fight against the demons of legend.
strings.summon:
The world cannot be changed by those unable
to handle even the tasks they've been dealt.
You had best prepare yourself.
strings.evolution:
Regardless the weapon,
with my special techniques
I can pierce through anything.
strings.affinity:
To find something more important than oneself,
that must be what love is...
strings.fusion:
I cannot allow myself to die in a place like this.
I must stay alive for Isilud...

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Meliadoul is the daughter of Folmarv, a member of the Knights Templar who have been manipulating the course of history from the shadows. However, she was ignorant to the fact that her father was playing host to a Lucavi demon, as well as to the mysterious power hidden within the auracite. Once she clears up her misunderstanding with Ramza in Limberry Castle, she begins to suspect her father's erratic behavior and joins Ramza on his battle against the Lucavi. Meliadoul eventually confronts her father only to find that her fears are well-founded, as he confirms that he is indeed possessed.
strings.summon:
I swear to the gods,
I devote my blade to serving you.
strings.evolution:
With my Unyielding Blade,
I'll crush the heads of even
the demons from hell!
strings.affinity:
To find something more important than oneself,
that must be what love is...
strings.fusion:
Shield not just your body, but your soul, as well!
Unpreparedness is your greatest enemy!
You should remember this.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Although Ovelia had been adopted by the king as his own daughter from an early age, she was forced to spend most of her life in a distant monastery away from her family. After the king's passing, Duke Larg and Duke Goltanna instigate a war for the rights of succession, and it is thus decided that Ovelia shall be taken to the latter's duchy of Gallionne for her safety. However, Goltanna's forces along with a supposed knight manage to kidnap her whilst attempting to flee Orbonne Monastery.
strings.summon:
Even us sinful children of Ivalice
can be saved by the gods.
strings.affinity:
I'm always being manipulated by others...
However, I want to trust you.
strings.fusion:
There are some who would die for me
just because I'm a princess.
That is very difficult to handle...

strings.description: A princess who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Ovelia is the target of an assassination attempt by Duke Larg, a supporter of Prince Orinus, but is saved during her escape of Orbonne Monastery thanks to Delita and his valuable intel of the enemy's plans. Delita then entrusts Ovelia to Ramza, who in turn entrusts her to Cardinal Delacroix. Unfortunately this would prove much too convenient for the church, which sought to use Ovelia as a tool to gain control over the kingdom after Duke Larg and Duke Goltanna saw to each other's destruction amidst the chaos of war.
strings.summon:
Who are you?
My friend? Or perhaps my enemy?
strings.evolution:
I am also of the Atkascha family.
I am the only one who can decide my path.
strings.affinity:
I'm always being manipulated by others...
However, I want to trust you.
strings.fusion:
A friend once taught me
how to play a reed flute,
but I'm still no good at it.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. The king adopted Ovelia as his daughter at the suggestion of the council, which sought to leave Queen Louveria with as little power as possible. Following the king's passing and the eruption of the War of the Lions, Duke Goltanna places Ovelia on the throne as the new ruler, but only in name. And thus begins her sorrowful life in Zeltennia Castle, where she attempts opening up to Delita. However, she can never shake off the feeling that he only means to use her just as everyone else before him.
strings.summon:
You intend to use me, as well?
Then I guess I've no choice but to follow you.
strings.evolution:
What do you intend to do with me?
What is it you want from me?
strings.affinity:
I'm always being manipulated by others...
However, I want to trust you.
strings.fusion:
I hope that all people
can have it just a little bit
easier someday soon...

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. An astrologer affiliated with the Knights of the Southern Sky, Orran excels at gathering information and analyzing it, as well as at devising highly efficient tactical plans. The adoptive son of Thunder God Orlandeau, he was ordered by his father to conduct an investigation of the Church's corruption. As he makes his way through the Mining Town of Gollund, he is saved by Ramza after being cornered by several thieves.
strings.summon:
My name is Orran Durai.
Where is it you are headed to?
strings.affinity:
You aren't alone!
You have many friends that would risk their lives for you, and I'm one of them!
strings.fusion:
As long as the enemy strikes at us,
the fight will continue.
That is how war goes.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Orran is investigating the power of the auracite, as well as the motives of the Knights Templar at his father's request. Although Orran serves the Knights of the Southern Sky, who are enemies of House Beoulve, Ramza confides in him and shares his knowledge of the cardinal's evil plot, creating a common cause between them. When Orlandeau is accused of treason and taken captive at Riovanes Castle, Orran enlists the help of Ramza to rescue his imprisoned father.
strings.summon:
You think there's value in using me?
Well then, let us see what you've got.
strings.evolution:
Entrust the fate of the heavens to me.
If I can become you, and you can become me...
strings.affinity:
You aren't alone!
You have many friends that would risk their lives for you, and I'm one of them!
strings.fusion:
For the sake of my foster father's honor,
I mustn't take part in clumsy fighting.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. After losing his real father to the Fifty Years' War, Orran was raised by Orlandeau, his father's brother in arms. Years later he is eventually labeled an accomplice to his adoptive father when news claim that Orlandeau has assassinated Duke Goltanna. This accusation destroys Orlandeau's name and reputation, but he is ultimately able to escape the sentence attached to the crime. Orran then decides to seek Princess Ovelia in order to appeal for his father's innocence.
strings.summon:
Do you have an interest in astrology?
It's just about looking up and interpreting
the movements of the stars in the sky.
strings.evolution:
What is it that humans look to for happiness?
For what reason are we all alive?
And what is it we should leave behind?
strings.affinity:
You aren't alone!
You have many friends that would risk their lives for you, and I'm one of them!
strings.fusion:
No one knows if or when the fighting will stop.
Still, this doesn't mean we can let those evil-doers continue with their plans...

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Ace was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. As an Agito Cadet he trains with Class Zero at the Akademeia, and wields a deck of magically infused cards as his weapon. Although he may appear cool and collected, he can be quite rash when overcome with emotion. Ace refers to Arecia, who heads Akademeia's Sorcery Division, as "Mother."
strings.summon:
Once the seal is broken,
our voice becomes as thunder.
...We have arrived.
strings.affinity:
Of course we've butted heads at times,
but we share the same destiny.
We're like...family.
strings.fusion:
Tears beget naught.
Putting the blame on someone else will not bring back the dead.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. As a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, he fought alongside Class Zero to deter the Militesi invasion during the liberation campaign and protect the Vermilion Bird. Unfortunately, however, Ace's request to have his closest friend Izana on the battlefield would result in the latter's untimely death. The loss of Izana caused tensions to run high within the group, as Izana's younger brother Machina had only recently joined Class Zero.
strings.summon: I'm here!
strings.evolution:
Give up the past, and move on.
That is why we forget them...
...The memories of the dead.
strings.affinity:
Of course we've butted heads at times,
but we share the same destiny.
We're like...family.
strings.fusion:
If you've time to be timid,
then you've time to do something.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Queen was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Her personality is as straightforward as the longsword she wields, which has earned her the nickname of "class leader." On the battlefield her great knowledge of magic can prove invaluable, except in times of great peril where she ends up losing her cool.
strings.summon:
Leave it to me.
I'm an Agito cadet, after all.
strings.affinity:
The path that brought us together
surely will keep us together.
strings.fusion:
Sometimes we lose ourselves
when the going gets rough.
Please, be my guide at that time.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Queen is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and as such undertakes perilous missions on her quest to become Agito, the savior or saviors. She can become quite demanding once her focus has turned to the mission at hand, unintentionally hampering the relationships she shares with the other cadets. When Machina blamed Class Zero for the death of his older brother, Queen simply dismissed his grief by calling him a "spoiled child."
strings.summon:
Surely this too will be
important to my training.
strings.evolution:
First off, we need to be calm
and assess the situation.
strings.affinity:
The path that brought us together
surely will keep us together.
strings.fusion: There is no time to be worrying about the past.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Nine is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. He is brash in nature, and is as skilled with the lance as he is hot-headed. When Kurasame became Class Zero's new commanding officer, Nine's response was telling him to "take a hike." However, he seems to completely trust Class Zero's adoptive mother, Arecia.
strings.summon:
What do you want?!
I don't listen to anyone but Mother, alright?!
strings.affinity:
I like it when I have to think.
That means the rest is up to you, got it!?
strings.fusion:
I don't think deeply enough, you say?
Ha, you couldn't be wronger!
I think with my body!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Nine was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Not a fan of studying, his short temper makes him the type to act first and ask questions later. This prompts other cadets to consider him an idiot, although they can never deny his amazing skill with the long spear, which he uses to mow down any enemies surrounding him in battle.
strings.summon:
All I have to do is defeat monsters, yeah?
That's easy for my class.
I'll blow them all away!
strings.evolution:
I'll be hearing none of your complaints!
All in, all ahead, let's go!
strings.affinity:
I like it when I have to think.
That means the rest is up to you, got it!?
strings.fusion:
I'm not trying to boast, but...
I know the names of all the nations in Orience, ha!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Nine is an Agito Cadet and member of Class Zero that often comes across as rude, and having very little patience. However, he never really acts out of malice and perhaps holds a surprisingly strong sense of comradery with those he trusts. He even came to express an appreciation for Kurasame, whom he had detested at first, moments before the commanding officer was to be sent to the front lines to perish.
strings.summon:
So I should take out their boss?
That's about as easy a mission as it gets.
strings.evolution:
Defending whilst attacking is not my style.
I prefer pushing forward as fast as I can!
strings.affinity:
I like it when I have to think.
That means the rest is up to you, got it!?
strings.fusion:
We're still cadets, yo!
Above all, we need to realize that we're only ever a step away from death.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Trey is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. His excellent marks make him one of the most intelligent cadets in the class, and as such he has a lot of wisdom to impart on others. However, his tendency to ramble on without end often causes his classmates' patience to run short. In battle, he can take enemies down from great distances with his bow.
strings.summon:
How about me?
First off, us Agito cadets are...
Please, stop making that face...
strings.affinity:
Thank you for listening so intently
to what I have to say.
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion:
If you've time to spit obscenities,
why not think of something more constructive?

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Trey is a member of Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. His calm and collected personality, along with his great knowledge, make him a reliable source of counsel for other more hot-headed members of the class. In battle, he supports his comrades with his bow and great skills in magic as he attacks from a distance. The only possible flaw he seems guilty off is his constant rambling.
strings.summon:
You need my power?
What could it be that you
want to know?
strings.evolution:
It's not just about getting stronger,
you must also have a keen eye when it comes to analyzing a battle.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for listening so intently
to what I have to say.
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion: First off, as cadets we must all do our best to cultivate our minds and bodies... H-hey, I wasn't done talking yet!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Trey was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Ever the logical and analytical mind, not even the Milites Empire's false accusations of an attempted assassination by Class Zero could serve to break his composure. Trey also boasts of excellent sniping skills that allow him to take down targets from incredible distances with his bow.
strings.summon:
It seems my knowledge is needed.
What is it you wish to know?
strings.evolution:
I'm glad I really studied the basics.
It wasn't until I entered battle myself that I understood the theory behind it all.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for listening so intently
to what I have to say.
I look forward to working with you.
strings.fusion: Some let fightning get in the way of their studies, but I would never allow that to happen to myself.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Cinque is a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, and a member of Akademeia's Class Zero. Although she appears to be the easy going type, she shows no mercy to her enemies in battle. In fact, among the various weapons used by the members of Class Zero, she chose the heavy and hardly maneuverable mace. However, her choice seems to have stemmed from the fact that a mace can inflict great damage with just one blow, ending battles more effortlessly.
strings.summon:
I-I'm late, I'm late!
I'm so sorry!
I'm the last here, aren't I?
strings.affinity: I'm just glad I'm not alone.
strings.fusion:
I'm not much for studies or training,
but becoming stronger is definitely a good thing!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Cinque is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. She walks to the beat of her own drum, and is not embarrassed to be so friendly as to give unsolicited nicknames to those she hardly knows, such as Class Zero's newest members Machina and Rem. However, it would seem that in reality she trusts no one but the other members of her class and their adoptive mother, Arecia.
strings.summon:
Wanna hang out?
Alright, let's be friends!
strings.evolution:
Ahem..!
I am quite capable, am I not?
You depend on me, yes?
strings.affinity: I'm just glad I'm not alone.
strings.fusion:
I seem to have become stronger!
Yeah, feel the pump!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Cinque was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. She has an offbeat personality that keeps others guessing what she is up to next. However, she will occasionally strike right at the heart of the matter, shocking those around her. Her weapon of choice is the mace, which although heavy and difficult to handle can cause great damage on the battlefield.
strings.summon:
Alright!
Whatever the enemy,
you can leave it to Cinque!
strings.evolution: How you are to die and how you intend on living to the end are one in the same, are they not?
strings.affinity: I'm just glad I'm not alone.
strings.fusion:
I always feel great!
Especially now, I feel lighter than ever!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Jack is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Jack is known as the class clown, as well as a positive person who never seems to stop smiling. These personality traits often lead others to underestimate him, but the stoicism he displays in battle leaves little doubt that his place as a member of Class Zero is well deserved. A single swing from his katana is enough to leave his enemies in pieces on the field.
strings.summon:
Huh? A new mission, already?
I just wanted to relax...
strings.affinity:
It's hard to relax, isn't it?
But still, in times of trouble,
it's best to laugh it off.
strings.fusion:
Praise doesn't help anything.
But still, I guess I could try a bit harder!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Jack was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Although he gives his all in battle through every single strike of his katana, he doesn't miss a chance to use his antics to lighten the mood regardless of the situation at hand. Jack has always spread his positivity and joy even in the most dire of situations Class Zero has found itself in.
strings.summon: I'll do my best to carry out this new mission! Uh oh, looks like I've got a hole in my sock.
strings.evolution:
Let's be more positive from now on.
It's positive thinking that builds a positive future.
strings.affinity:
It's hard to relax, isn't it?
But still, in times of trouble,
it's best to laugh it off.
strings.fusion: I feel like I could take on anyone right now!

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Jack is Class Zero's class clown, and is never afraid to delve on touchy subjects with a fairly laid back approach. He is actually very stoic in nature, but is often misunderstood due to his usual antics. Always giving his all whilst wielding his deadly katana, he is ranked amongst the most powerful members of Class Zero. However, he never mentions the fact that some of his strongest attacks require him to hurt himself.
strings.summon:
You're all so moody!
You all need to lighten up a bit.
strings.evolution:
If I've come this far,
I might as well give it my all!
strings.affinity:
It's hard to relax, isn't it?
But still, in times of trouble,
it's best to laugh it off.
strings.fusion:
When bad things happen,
it's best to laugh them off.
Laughing brings about good things, you know?

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Seven is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. As one of the oldest cadets, she always cares for and looks after her classmates, making her very popular among the younger girls in Akademeia. In battle she skillfully wields a special weapon known as the whipblade, allowing her to easily dispose of any enemies within her radius.
strings.summon: There are a lot of strong people in my class. I have to keep my cool, or else...
strings.affinity:
As long as I'm with my friends,
there's nothing we can't handle.
strings.fusion:
I feel I've got a bit stronger.
But battles aren't won with strength alone. Being smart is key.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Seven was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Always looking out for her classmates, she sought to train Machina and other new members of Class Zero in survival techniques to ensure their safety. On the other hand, following orders from Akademeia for so long has come to somewhat impair her judgment, often leaving her in confusion when asked to take the initiative.
strings.summon:
Is this Mother's doing?
I will fulfill my duty.
My power is yours.
strings.evolution: It will be me who has the last word.
strings.affinity:
As long as I'm with my friends,
there's nothing we can't handle.
strings.fusion: How might one go about getting their hands on the ace card?

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Seven is adored by many of her younger classmates in Akademeia who admire her strong and constant composure, along with her caring and considerate nature. However, these admirable qualities could eventually become her downfall, as she often finds herself unable to turn down any requests she receives. Yet, as kind as Seven is, her whipblade remains merciless in the heat of battle.
strings.summon:
Mother told us to choose.
But what choice is there for us to make?
strings.evolution:
Excuse me.
I must borrow just a little more power.
strings.affinity:
As long as I'm with my friends,
there's nothing we can't handle.
strings.fusion: Up until now I simply carried out orders as they were given to me, but I feel this battle has truly helped me grow.

strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Rem is a student of Akademeia and an expert in magic who was promoted directly from Class Seventh to Class Zero. Unfortunately, she contracted an incurable disease during her infancy that she currently represses with the aid of a particulary potent medicine. Its sideeffects, however, are the source behind her incessant coughing and the horrible pain she endures night after night. Regardless of the true state of her health, Rem always does her best to act normal around her classmates.
strings.summon:
My name is Rem Tokimiya.
I look forward to working with you.
strings.affinity:
From now on,
no matter what happens,
don't forget me...
strings.fusion:
Leave it to me!
I'll do my best not to let you down!

strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Rem and Machina were great childhood friends, and even when they eventually parted their own ways, fate brought them together once again at Akademeia. Knowing her life will be a short one due to her incurable illness, she chooses to use whatever little time she has left to defend her homeland from the front lines as a cadet. Although she tries her best not to worry those around her, lying is not her strong suit, and thus Machina and Seven ultimately discover the truth regarding her decaying state of health.
strings.summon:
If we put together a girl's party
surely everyone would come, yeah?
strings.evolution:
I won't let anyone die anymore.
That is how I feel.
strings.affinity:
From now on,
no matter what happens,
don't forget me...
strings.fusion:
*Cough* *cough*
I-I'm all right, really!
I'm sorry to have troubled you.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, as a member of Akademeia's Class Zero. Although short in stature, he uses his own fists as weapons in battle. He also boasts of a knack for sound judgment and keen perception of his surroundings. Such skills can prove very valuable in infiltrations whilst posing as a prisoner of war, leading the mission toward success.
strings.summon:
The crystals are dangerous?
We can't simply look past this.
I will help you as well.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.fusion:
Regardless the situation,
you must never neglect your training.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight is a cadet training with Class Zero to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, by undertaking missions given by the Akademeia. He chooses to fight with his own fists instead of weapons in order to remember the pain he inflicts on his enemies, as well as the pain he feels when striking them. Quick-witted and agile, he uses a combination of punches and kicks, as well as battle stances to face his enemies.
strings.summon:
We don't have so many options.
I will carry out the mission as planned.
strings.evolution:
This isn't the time for celebrating.
You must always remain on guard.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.fusion:
My fists are my weapons.
I never want to forget the agony of inflicting pain.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight is one of the members of Class Zero, who are all Agito Cadets. Calm and collected, he never allows his emotions to impair his sound judgment. At times his straightforwardness makes him appear like the oddball of Class Zero, but it is this particular quality that leaves him with the responsibility of calming other more hotheaded cadets. Eight displays his quick wit best on the battlefield when landing blow after blow to close in on his enemies, every one of his punches carrying his full might.
strings.summon:
One should always follow orders.
That way the result is always the same.
strings.evolution: We must try not to forget those who lost their lives while we still remain.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.fusion: My fists shall at least remember the pain that you feel...

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. King was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Silent and somewhat frightening, King unintentionally gives off an air of intimidation that masks his thoughtful and considerate nature. An outstanding cadet who is always levelheaded and determined, he wields the dual handguns on the battlefield without hesitation.
strings.summon:
My gun simply shoots bullets,
and erases obstructions.
It makes complete sense.
strings.affinity:
Please call on me
should you ever need my help.
strings.fusion:
Knowledge is nothing without power.
One must experience battle to truly know.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. King is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, where he supports his classmates as an elderly brother figure. He rejects chatter in favor of immediate action, something his blunt manner of speaking demonstrates well, though he is very kind at heart. As a rational and logical person, King chastises his hotheaded classmates for their thoughtless actions, knocking them down a few pegs before they do anything they will regret.
strings.summon:
What would you have me do?
Shall I dispatch of anyone who
discovers our secrets?
strings.evolution:
I remember someone saying that.
This is how one breaks beyond
their own limits.
strings.affinity:
Please call on me
should you ever need my help.
strings.fusion:
Surely, there is more that we can do.
That means we must remain focused until the very end.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. A lad of few words, his appearance reflects the level of maturity accompanying his composed demeanor. He often gives the impression of being cool and aloof, though this is not his intention. A bit lethargic at heart, King uses the handguns as his weapon of choice believing that the fastest way to take out enemies is by putting a bullet in them. Not only do his speed and accuracy give him an advantage on the field, but his inventive use of empty cartridges as bombs add some variation to his tactics as well.
strings.summon:
Sorry to make you wait.
Leave the rest to me.
Let's go, rock 'n' roll!
strings.evolution:
What's important to remember now
is not how we got here,
but what we should do now.
strings.affinity:
Please call on me
should you ever need my help.
strings.fusion:
I gladly accept your offer.
I will use this power!

strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Sice is a cadet belonging to the Vermilion Bird's Class Zero, and is currently training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. She is foul-mouthed and ferocious, but adheres to her own standards of enmity. Although she would never purposely push away her classmates, she is more of a lone wolf in nature. The great scythe she wields with such ease on the field makes for a fine display in battle.
strings.summon:
You want us all to get along?
Heh, sounds boring.
I'm perfectly fine on my own.
strings.affinity:
You fight recklessly for your friends.
I have to admit
I like that side of you.
strings.fusion:
It's not fun growing stronger
without even fighting enemies.

strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Sice is rude and quick to criticize others' shortcomings, and thus is thought by many to be a ruthless character. The harsh words she chooses to forcefully motivate others rather than showing more conventional forms of support do nothing to contradict this fact, making it even harder to prove she is not cruel at heart. Regardless of her sour attitude, she is a tenacious fighter who releases the malice within her scythe through battle.
strings.summon:
We have to be as careful as we can
not to be overwhelmed by the enemy.
strings.evolution:
If someone dares to try and fight me,
they will surely meet an uncomfortable end.
strings.affinity:
You fight recklessly for your friends.
I have to admit
I like that side of you.
strings.fusion:
The weak perish,
while the strong survive.
That's how it goes, right?

strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Sice is unusually confident in her skills, and holds a very strict set of moral values. Regardless of wether her superiors in Akademeia are the ones making the decisions that run the world, she will stand her ground when their actions disagree with her beliefs. She also delivers merciless judgment upon evildoers when tasked with covert missions by Akademeia's intelligence department.
strings.summon:
What? An order?
Don't think I'll follow any
old foolish idea of yours.
strings.evolution:
Best not run your mouth.
That is unless you want me to shut it up for you.
strings.affinity:
You fight recklessly for your friends.
I have to admit
I like that side of you.
strings.fusion:
I've no interest in money or status.
I just want to slaughter all
who dare stand in my way!

strings.description: A warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. The identity of this small creature, whose visible pom-pom suggests a possible relationship to the moogle race, is completely shrouded in mystery. Its weapon of choice seems to be knives, and beyond being merely light on its feet, it even moves around while balancing on a ball. Never seen without a smile on its face, those who study acrobatics have yet to reach a consensus on the meaning of its enigmatic grin.
strings.summon:
We apologize for the wait!
The show is about to begin, kupo!
strings.affinity:
We've worked so hard together!
We should continue bringing smiles to everyone, kupo!
strings.fusion: Even my knife throwing is improving, kupo!

strings.description: A mysterious warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. It is unknown how the Juggler—or is it Jugglers?—became two creatures following its awakening. However, its juggling skills atop a balancing ball, not to mention its hooping abilities, became markedly stronger. The two creatures are completely synchronized, allowing them to fight foes in perfect unison. Although its acrobatic feats and sweet smile make it seem adorable, there is something unsettling about the fact that it never displays any other emotions.
strings.summon:
You called, and so here we are!
We shall help you put on a great show, kupo!
strings.evolution:
This is no trick, and no illusion.
Now the fun and the smiles shall be double, kupo!
strings.affinity:
We've worked so hard together!
We should continue bringing smiles to everyone, kupo!
strings.fusion:
No matter what happens,
never forget to smile.
It's the secret to a happy life, kupo!

strings.description: A warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. Sensing a wicked presence nearby, the moogles called upon all their friends to ask for the protection of their precious crystals. The Thief, with his incredible agility in battle, and specializing in the collection of any gil scattered throughout the field, was one of them. The Thief is an indispensable ally when money is required to keep troops in top shape.
strings.summon:
Are you heading somewhere?
If so, you'd be wise to take me along.
strings.affinity:
You scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
That's the way I see it.
So...here's a back scratcher for you.
strings.fusion:
Heh heh.
Investing in me, are you?
Then you can count on me next time.

strings.description: A warrior known to have fought many beasts, who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. The Thief was finally able to awaken after facing countless battles that earned him experience, managing in the process to become a kind of wandering hero. He also became still lighter on his feet, now able to collect scattered gil on the field with greater ease than ever. Those who have seen the Thief in action are said to be impressed by his work.
strings.summon: A battle to protect the crystals, you say? That sounds strangely familiar.
strings.evolution:
What is this power!?
I feel as light-footed as a gazelle in ballet shoes!
strings.affinity:
You scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
That's the way I see it.
So...here's a back scratcher for you.
strings.fusion:
Hey, where will our next battle be?
I'll be back with all the treasure before you even know I've left!

strings.description: A warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. Sensing a wicked presence nearby, the moogles called upon all their friends to ask for the protection of their precious crystals. The Fencer, who specializes in close combat, was one of them. Her sharp blade slices without mercy through any opponent that crosses her, while the grace with which she dodges her foes' attacks is said to be quite beguiling.
strings.summon: Hmph, keep your distance. Come too close and you may get hurt.
strings.affinity: Allow this blade to continue fighting for you. Of course, only if it's not an inconvenience.
strings.fusion:
Should I use this power to defeat the opponents standing before me?
Understood.

strings.description: A warrior known to have fought many beasts, who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. A beautiful and slender viera with the trademark long ears of her kind, the Fencer specializes in close combat. Her svelte frame betrays no hint of her brutal talent with the rapier, fiercely cutting through opponents whenever the opportunity presents itself. The contrast between the Fencer's beauty and ferocity calls to mind the old saying, "Even the most beautiful roses have thorns."
strings.summon:
Leave it to me.
My purpose is to protect the crystals.
strings.evolution:
What a mysterious power.
It will be easier than ever to predict my opponents' movements.
strings.affinity: Allow this blade to continue fighting for you. Of course, only if it's not an inconvenience.
strings.fusion: You must keep your eyes on your opponent. If you do, dodging their attacks will be that much easier.

strings.description: <collaboration>
strings.summon: <collab>
strings.fusion: Yes, I feel stronger than before!

strings.description: <collaboration>
strings.summon: <collab>
strings.evolution: New strength... A new me... Whatever happens, I'll keep going forward.
strings.fusion:
Strength wells up from within me.
Like the warmth and affection of my dear family...

strings.description: A prominent goddess in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Tilith pledged her service to Lucius, the god of the Gate, and took a certain summoner from the fantastical world of Grand Gaia under her wing. She may seem like a normal girl at first glance, but her divinity is apparent through the multiple miracles she has performed to save her summoner in moments of crisis. Ever a cheerful soul, even those who might normally poke fun at an innocent nature like hers cannot help but smile in her presence.
strings.summon:
Are you a summoner too?
My summoner is really strong,
not to mention dreamy!
strings.affinity:
Thanks for relying on me!
I'm so happy, I'm gonna work even harder from now on!
strings.fusion:
Yeah, I feel good!
And as thanks for making me stronger,
I'll help you out!

strings.description: A prominent goddess in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Tilith pledged her service to Lucius, the god of the Gate, and fought many wicked and formidable gods alongside a certain summoner. She maintains an upbeat attitude, and places unshakeable faith in both her master Lucius and the one she calls "my Summoner." Although her innocence may make her seem childish, her divine powers are of the highest caliber. Tilith's selflessness and deep affection for her friends drive her to do whatever is necessary to rescue them from peril.
strings.summon:
Huh? What is this place?
Well, ummm... I'm Tilith, a goddess
as pretty as she is powerful.
And I'm INVINCIBLE!
strings.evolution:
I'll show you just what this
powerful and pretty goddess can do!
Watch and enjoy the show!
strings.affinity:
Thanks for relying on me!
I'm so happy, I'm gonna work even harder from now on!
strings.fusion:
I'm a goddess, you know.
So I'm actually pretty strong!
Let me show you what I can do!

strings.description: A prominent goddess in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Tilith pledged her service to Lucius, the god of the Gate, and places unshakeable trust in the one she calls "my Summoner." Always cheerful and kind, she uses her great divine powers to rescue her precious friends whenever they find themselves in a bind. It is said that she can even release her hidden potential at times of great peril, gently enveloping her companions in a miraculous aura. Although her fights with Seria never really ceased, they eventually grew to understand each other as friends.
strings.summon: The pretty and super strong goddess Tilith is here! You'll have my full support from now on!
strings.evolution: I'll be able to protect everyone with this power! So don't worry about a thing, and leave it all to me!
strings.affinity:
Thanks for relying on me!
I'm so happy, I'm gonna work even harder from now on!
strings.fusion: But I was so strong already! Are you sure it's okay for me to get even stronger?

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Karl is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and the commander of the 24th Demon Slayers Division. Not only is he known as the "Rebel Lance," he was also granted the prestigious title of "Nyonne." Karl's talent and skill were recognized when he defeated the demon Zagamlung, a feat that propelled him to the highest ranks of the Summoners' Hall. However, he is not the kind to boast; always treating those around him with kindness. The trust he places in his childhood friend, a summoner like himself, is unbreakable.
strings.summon:
I'm the summoner Karl,
from the Akras Summoners' Hall.
Are you a summoner too?
Nice to meet you!
strings.affinity: I think you trust me as much as my friend does. Guess that means I can't let you down now!
strings.fusion:
Is this the power of visions?
It's like summoning, except not.
I'll have to tell my bud about this!

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Karl was elevated to the most elite ranks of the Summoners' Hall upon defeating the demon Zagamlung, and is held in high regard by all his peers. The strongest bond he shares is with his loyal childhood friend, together with whom he has escaped death countless times. Karl's birth and origins are enveloped in mystery, though naturally many rumors have arisen over time. However, he has yet to disclose anything on the subject himself.
strings.summon:
Feels weird to be the one summoned!
All right, I'll go with you.
Let's help each other out!
strings.evolution:
I can feel power flowing
through every inch of my body!
But I have to get stronger.
I owe it to my best friend
for believing in me!
strings.affinity: I think you trust me as much as my friend does. Guess that means I can't let you down now!
strings.fusion:
Ah ha ha, this is great!
The more power I get,
the more I can help you out!

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Seria is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and commands her own Demon Slayers' squadron. Though some may regard her aggressive nature as unfeminine, her skills as a warrior have earned her the nickname "Goddess of the Arena," a womanly title that none would dare deny. The incredible power contained in her petite frame allows her to wield her sword with an incomparable fusion of ferocity and grace. In fact, Seria's only serious flaw may be her tendency to criticize others, harshly and at the drop of a tiara. Rumor has it that her use of the word "idiot" is legendary in her home world of Grand Gaia.
strings.summon:
Where the heck am I?
And what are you staring at?
Tell me what's going on, hurry!
strings.affinity:
If you're foolish enough to trust me, who else will you trust...?
There's nothing for it; I'll have to keep watching your back!
strings.fusion:
You're gonna make me more powerful?
You're pretty naive, you know that?
I know another idiot just like you.

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Seria is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and boasts powers far beyond those of the average summoner. Unfortunately, however, she tends to be rude to others and has trouble following orders. Indeed, it would be fair to say that she goes out of her way to distance herself from others as much as possible. This is most likely due to a certain incident in her past; an incident that may also have stunted her growth while she was still very young. Were she able to finally overcome this lingering trauma, her powers might grow to incredible new peaks.
strings.summon:
Have I been summoned to another world?
Well, that's a pain in the neck,
but I'll go with you.
You'd better be grateful!
strings.evolution:
I'll never forget my past.
I'll embrace the pain
and regret attached to it,
and keep moving forward.
strings.affinity:
If you're foolish enough to trust me, who else will you trust...?
There's nothing for it; I'll have to keep watching your back!
strings.fusion:
I don't like owing people things.
So I'll return the favor by giving my all on the battlefield!

strings.description: A legendary knight from another world where humans and gods share a history. Vargas is a swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire who later became one of the Six Heroes of lore. He trained in the long sword to surpass the accomplishments of his late father, also an exceptional knight of the empire. Dubbed a master swordsman, he was well-known for his defeat of countless warriors. However, still believing himself inexperienced, Vargas is said to have continued his search for stronger opponents in order to further his training.
strings.summon:
So there are some here as well
who would dare call on me.
All right, I'll follow you.
strings.affinity:
I will slice a path open for you!
Follow behind me, and try to keep up!
strings.fusion:
No matter how fierce the battle,
you can always find me cutting
through the vanguard!

strings.description: A legendary knight from another world where humans and gods share a history. Vargas is a swordsman from the ruined Agni Empire who later became one of the Six Heroes of lore. Following the culmination of his training, he joined the Order of Agni to become a knight like his late father. Shortly afterwards he suffered a humiliating defeat in combat at the hands of a swordswoman of the same order named Lava. Ashamed of his own weakness, he resumed his rigorous training in order to fight her on the same terms. However, he never returned to resume his position as a knight after obtaining the power he sought, and instead set off on a journey as a lone warrior.
strings.summon:
So...you want to borrow my power?
All right then, leave it to me.
Just don't make me do something boring!
strings.evolution:
I can still grow even stronger!
I'm still not satisfied!
strings.affinity:
I will slice a path open for you!
Follow behind me, and try to keep up!
strings.fusion:
This isn't all I've got!
I'll show you how strong I really am!

strings.description: One of the Fallen Gods from another world where humans and gods share a history. According to legend, the Fallen Gods were divine beings who terrorized the world of Grand Gaia with their incredible power. As a Fallen God, Maxwell sought to take over the whole of Grand Gaia from her palace in St. Lamia. Having been tasked with the burden of resurrection, her ultimate goal was to destroy her world in order to rebuild it anew as its creator and mistress.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
And what is this being standing before me?
strings.affinity:
Child who doesn't fear sin,
I shall guide you forth.
strings.fusion: Do humans defy the gods in this world as well, despite their own ignorance?

strings.description: One of the Fallen Gods from another world where humans and gods share a history. According to legend, the Fallen Gods were divine beings who terrorized the world of Grand Gaia with their incredible power. Tasked with the burden of resurrection, Maxwell ruled over St. Lamia in hopes of ultimately destroying the sealed land of Grand Gaia in order to rebuild it anew as its creator and mistress. As a Fallen God she had always been a high ranking goddess, but never as powerful as the Holy Emperor Karna Masta, leader of the gods. Once she came to embrace the wickedness in her heart, she rebelled against him and began acting upon her own volition.
strings.summon:
My name is Maxwell.
Bearer of the burden of resurrection.
strings.evolution: You mean to subdue a god? Foolish mortal, what could you ever do with such a soul in your possession?
strings.affinity:
Child who doesn't fear sin,
I shall guide you forth.
strings.fusion: You dare give more power to an already mighty god? Humans are insolent creatures indeed.

strings.description: A princess from another world where humans and gods share a history. Brilliant from a young age, she was expected to go far but was wrongly accused for a crime she did not commit when trying to protect her sister. She was then imprisoned for a long time and made to carry out secret missions. Released before the great war with the gods, Elza continued to watch over her sister from the shadows.
strings.summon:
I am back! But what about her...
When can I hold her in my arms?
strings.affinity:
We have come a long way, haven't we?
Take this...as a symbol of our friendship.
strings.fusion:
I need to become stronger...
That child needs my help.

strings.description: A princess from another world where humans and gods share a history. Regardless of her position as the princess of the Bariura Empire, Elza was imprisoned at a young age for a crime she did not commit. She loved her sister Alice greatly and protected her even though she was forbidden to reveal her existence to her. Unaware of her father's intentions to make use of both her and her sister as weapons of war against the gods, Elza looked forward to the day when she could reunite with her sister and see her smile.
strings.summon:
I long to see her smile...
Can you help me?
strings.evolution:
I must free her from her suffering.
I think I am ready now...
strings.affinity:
We have come a long way, haven't we?
Take this...as a symbol of our friendship.
strings.fusion:
My scythe resonates with power...
But this is not enough!

strings.description: A knight from the icy highlands, who was known for his generosity and nobility. His parents were residents of two neighbouring countries that shared a long history of war. From his father, Noel learnt how to pilot a robot whilst his mother trained him in the arts of magic. During a short period of time when the two countries were at peace, Noel was able to travel freely between them, helping the poor he met along the way by providing them with gifts.
strings.summon:
I am Noel, the White Knight.
Saving the world, you say?
Count me in.
strings.affinity:
Battling for a good cause
and helping the weak...
It's been an honor travelling with you!
strings.fusion:
True strength is shown not by flaunting it
but by using it to protect the defenseless
from evil.

strings.description: A knight known for his generosity and nobility. Always seen riding atop a gold and white robot, he is known by people as the "White Knight." When war broke out between two neighbouring countries, the homelands of his parents, Noel gave up his life to defend the powerless from the soldiers. Tales of his brave sacrifice quickly spread, eventually leading to the end of the war. After his death, residents of the two nations celebrate the Festival of the White Knight annually to remember him and to remind themselves of the importance of peace.
strings.summon:
An army standing up for the weak...
Great! Let me join your cause!
strings.evolution:
This is what it feels like to be awakened...
I will use my new found strength to aid you!
strings.affinity:
Battling for a good cause
and helping the weak...
It's been an honor travelling with you!
strings.fusion:
My powers have grown.
Now, I can better serve the needs
of those without the means.

strings.description: A white magic expert born into the community of researchers that would one day become Mysidia. Roselia immersed herself in magical research simply because she was good at it. However, when a plague struck and she was unable to cure her fellow researchers, she became profoundly aware of her limitations.
strings.summon:
Are you the one who summoned me?
You need my healing magic?
I shall do as you ask.
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm. My magic powers grow...
It seems that visions do not require training to gain strength...

strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. Due to her father's influence, she never developed a healer's compassion and was interested only in research for its own sake. Only as she succumbed to the plague ravaging her homeland did she begin to regret her unfeeling approach to white magic, so she carries that regret beyond death, as a vision.
strings.summon:
I was only a researcher of magic.
But now, I am your ally.
Show me your wounded, and I will heal them.
strings.evolution:
I am definitely different now.
Stronger down to the core.
This is incredible!
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.fusion: If I had been this powerful while I was alive, I could have saved so many...

strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. She returned as a vision, filled with piercing devotion after failing to heal herself and others with her white magic. Thrilled to be back again, she enjoys the cold snowy season clad in red, lifting spirits and bringing smiles to peoples faces with her gentle healing.
strings.summon:
It is my hope to keep
you and your allies healthy.
This cloth is a sign of that.
strings.evolution:
Healing powers and a compassionate heart...
I think I am a much better healer now!
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.fusion:
I am full of healing power!
I can protect you with this!

strings.description: A silent warrior atop a chocobo who donned a curious piece of armor. Yun lost his parents during infancy after monsters viciously attacked his village, leaving nothing but death in their wake save for a single chocobo. Yun befriended the feathery creature, and they eventually left together on a journey around the world. The experience he gained through their rigorous journey helped him to develop unique battle abilities which he vowed to use to destroy the monsters that took the lives of those dearest to him. He is said to have continued his crusade against monsters until an illness claimed his life.
strings.summon:
There are still so many monsters...
As long as you don't mind my friend joining,
my fists are yours to borrow.
strings.affinity:
We are both grateful to you.
You were the one that finally taught me
these fists are not for revenge.
strings.fusion:
To be honest, I'm surprised.
I didn't think such a way of growing stronger existed.

strings.description: A warrior who set off on a journey to vanquish monsters alongside his trusty chocobo. Yun swore to take revenge upon the monsters that killed his family when he was a child, and in the process saved many people who came to admire him deeply. Unfortunately, his long journey and continuous battles against monsters caused him to contract an illness that eventually took his life. His faithful chocobo is said to have stayed by his side until the very end.
strings.summon:
There are still so many monsters...
As long as you don't mind my friend joining,
my fists are yours to borrow.
strings.evolution:
My fists are hot...
I can take on even stronger monsters now.
strings.affinity:
We are both grateful to you.
You were the one that finally taught me
these fists are not for revenge.
strings.fusion:
Had I had such power when I was younger,
I could have protected those close to me...

strings.description: A graceful dancer with fascinating moves that is rumored to have put men, as well as beasts, under a trance. Ling's origins are completely shrouded in mystery, but some believe that her grief-stricken expression and ability to express genuine suffering through her performances may provide a clue about her true identity. While many speculate that she may have been the princess of a ruined country, others believe her to have been an assassin who traveled the world targeting royalty. Some even claim she was the incarnation of a white dragon that was chased away from its home.
strings.summon:
You need my dancing?
I see... Well then, I will go with you.
strings.affinity:
The feelings travelling with you have
afforded me have beautified my dancing.
I look forward to our future together.
strings.fusion:
I need to become stronger
if I'm to keep living life on my own...

strings.description: A wandering dancer who inspired both fascination and grief through her craft. Although the story behind Ling's origins differs from person to person, she was actually born in a village. Having lost her parents before she could even remember, she lived in solitude for many years until she met a wandering dancer. Taking the dancer as her master, she learned the skills and abilities required in order to become a dancer herself. Ling quickly rose in popularity following her training as she performed from bar to bar, but unfortunately tragedy would soon strike anew.
strings.summon:
You need my dancing?
I see... Well then, I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
I can feel the light piercing
right through me.
Is that what an awakening feels like?
strings.affinity:
The feelings travelling with you have
afforded me have beautified my dancing.
I look forward to our future together.
strings.fusion:
This power...
My dances are full of such feeling, now.

strings.description: A dancer who entranced humans and beasts alike. Tragedy struck for Ling when her master was killed before her eyes by a bandit as she toured the countryside for her performances. Luckily she managed to use her dancing skills to flee from any further danger, and met a monk on the road whom she hired as her bodyguard. Feeling safe in his care, she eventually developed feelings for the monk. However, he had his own goals and dreams to realize, and thus left her to accomplish them, never to return. Consumed by her own grief, she ultimately perished during her travels. Her heartbreaking story has survived to this day through the songs many have written about her.
strings.summon:
You need my dancing?
I see... Well then, I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
Yeah...
The fear within me is melting away...
I am ready to meet that person, again...
strings.affinity:
The feelings travelling with you have
afforded me have beautified my dancing.
I look forward to our future together.
strings.fusion:
I can see it now...
I now have the ability to move people's hearts with my dancing.

strings.description: A hunter who dedicated his life to the hunt. A cruel man who hunts not just beasts but even humans if asked, he was spotted wearing white garments as he hunted monsters. Since he would not speak himself of why he was doing so, the truth of the matter is still shrouded in mystery.
strings.summon:
If you're going to hunt monsters
then I would like to come along.
strings.affinity:
It is thanks to you that I have been
able to enjoy hunting monsters like this.
I look forward to more of it with you.
strings.fusion:
This feels right.
I'm in the mood to hunt.

strings.description: A remarkable hunter, referred to by some as a brutal assassin, there are few who know that he once wore white garments as he hunted down monsters. While there exists evidence that at this time his eyes were not full of their usual danger, but instead calm and clear, there is no one who can clearly explain what relation this may have have to his hunting monsters, though there are many who like to theorize.
strings.summon:
It's time for the hunt to begin!
Take me to where the monster hordes are.
strings.evolution:
Well then, like this I should be able
to take down even bigger monsters.
strings.affinity:
It is thanks to you that I have been
able to enjoy hunting monsters like this.
I look forward to more of it with you.
strings.fusion:
My arms can't stop shaking
when I think about using this
power to take down monsters.

strings.description: There once was a historian who claimed that the white robes he wore and his monster hunting activities resembled a certain region's seasonal ritual. However, no documentation on this ritual was found anywhere in the world, leaving people to lament solely over the many cruel things he did, as he and this theory were finally buried in darkness.
strings.summon:
No matter how strong the monster,
I will take it down.
That is why I have come back!
strings.evolution:
That's it...
I will hunt down every monster
in this world!
strings.affinity:
It is thanks to you that I have been
able to enjoy hunting monsters like this.
I look forward to more of it with you.
strings.fusion:
Do I want to hunt humans?
That's okay, I'm perfectly content
hunting large monsters for now!

strings.description: A young girl rumored by both humans and forest sprites to be beautiful and skillful with a bow. One day, she came across a traveler wandering through the woods, with whom she would then split her rations with. Upon doing so, the traveler took out some white garments, and began speaking. Though she was unable to understand what he was saying, she was taken by the beautiful clothes, so she accepted them and put them on.
strings.summon:
Is this...outside of the woods?
It's sad, being alone.
...Can I go with you?
strings.affinity:
Kind. Your heart.
You give me so much.
Here, I want to be. Always...
strings.fusion:
Power, I feel it, it is warm...
I feel it...inside.

strings.description: A young hunter who lived alone in a forest. Having been taken by the white garments she received from the traveler, she would often wear them and run around the forest. Doing so, she was often seen by villagers as she ventured closer to the edge of the forest which she was usually afraid of. However, as quick as she moved, she was often thought to be a ghost, leading them to avoid going near the forest for a while.
strings.summon:
The world?
Is it, big? How big?
I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
People's emotions...
I think I understand them a little now.
So I don't feel so scared now.
strings.affinity:
Kind. Your heart.
You give me so much.
Here, I want to be. Always...
strings.fusion:
Flowing, something is...
Deep inside me...

strings.description: A hunter so beautiful she could be compared to forest sprites. Over many years, she took great care of the white garments that she received from the traveler. Even after she passed, the garments she cared so much for were found in a dwelling in the forest by a villager who was passing through. It is said that one can feel the strong emotions that once existed between these two from them.
strings.summon:
I understand.
Kind... That is what you are.
That is why I am with you.
strings.evolution:
Strong, important...
Body, mind, both are equal.
strings.affinity:
Kind. Your heart.
You give me so much.
Here, I want to be. Always...
strings.fusion:
Mind... Body...
Strong, they will become.

strings.description: A young girl capable of freely wielding heavy weaponry. She was an ace among her fellow gunners in the squad she belonged to. At the same time, it is also said that she was relied on by her friends thanks to her being so resourceful. Contrary to her bold actions on the field, she is usually quite bashful and quiet, and it has been told she seems most happy when she's alone, working on her guns.
strings.summon:
This... This isn't a battlefield...
But if you want to save your friends,
then I will lend you my strength.
strings.affinity:
I wonder if I was able to protect everyone...
Yeah, I understand...
This isn't over just yet, is it?
strings.fusion:
I see... By doing this,
we can increase the power of my guns...
You know your weaponry.

strings.description: A young girl who fought as a gunner for the sake of her hometown. Long ago, her town was invaded by another country, which led to the loss of many of her friends and family. This spurred the quiet little girl on to join the military, and led to her lash out on the battlefield out of fear of her friends being hurt. It is said that as a result her life ended short, but her deeds were talked about long after she passed.
strings.summon:
I will protect my friends.
I definitely count you as one of them.
I swear on my guns.
strings.evolution:
Now I should be able to save
even more of my friends, right?
If so, then I'll see you at the front lines!
strings.affinity:
I wonder if I was able to protect everyone...
Yeah, I understand...
This isn't over just yet, is it?
strings.fusion:
So by increasing my own power,
my shots become stronger, as well?
Let's get pumped then!

strings.description: An elven warrioress who claims to be the daughter of a merchant from a distant land. Fryevia is on a journey to find equipment suitable for her abilities, as she is much more skilled with the sword than the average soldier. She usually disguises herself as a human and enjoys interacting with others. Always exuding an air of purity and elegance, it may be surprising to learn that she believes money to be no object in order to obtain what she desires.
strings.summon:
My blade seems to enjoy your company.
Please, allow us to follow you.
strings.affinity:
I can feel a strange and totally different
type of enhancement growing
deep in my heart.
strings.fusion:
I can feel my own power.
Might someone fancy a quick bout?

strings.description: An elven warrioress who claims to be the daughter of a merchant from a distant land. Although Fryevia is of elven descent, she disguises herself as a human in order to live peacefully among them. She was born into a wealthy family, and thus has never known financial problems. Following in the footsteps of her famous grandfather, she eagerly began taking lessons in sword fighting from a skilled instructor. After coming to know no greater joy than that of crossing blades with an opponent, she now hopes to challenge warriors all over the world with her beloved sword.
strings.summon:
Where might you all be headed to?
If it is a journey toward battle,
then I shall join.
strings.evolution:
What a strange sensation.
I wonder if this will grant me
some new power?
strings.affinity:
I can feel a strange and totally different
type of enhancement growing
deep in my heart.
strings.fusion:
I must continue trying hard
until the day I become a fine
swordsman like my grandfather.

strings.description: A thief who lives on the streets of a distant land. Xon has made a living by selling what he pilfers from others for quite some time, always exaggerating the actual value of things that were not worth much in the first place. Although he feels no guilt about stealing from those with lavish lifestyles, he always shares his earnings with those who live off the streets. He is rumored to hold a certain teddy bear dear to his heart.
strings.summon:
There's no need to fear.
Nothing can be stolen from
the man who has nothing to steal.
strings.affinity:
I'm not tricking you, really,
this is the real thing!
strings.fusion:
You allowed me some great experiences.
They're mine to keep though, you hear?

strings.description: A thief who lives on the streets of a distant land. Xon steals rare materials from monsters and then sells them at exorbitant prices to make a living. This allows him to take advantage of his customers, making enough money to share with all the poor people on the streets and creating a strong bond with them in the process. The teddy bear he treasures so much is rumored to be a memento from his master, who trained him strictly in the art of thievery.
strings.summon:
You look like you might be rich?
If so, then have I got the
rare beauty of an item for you!
strings.evolution:
I can see it, I can feel it...
It's like my senses have been sharpened.
I feel like I can steal anything!
strings.affinity:
I'm not tricking you, really,
this is the real thing!
strings.fusion:
My skills have improved once again.
What skills, you ask?
Best not ask such a question.

strings.description: A thief who lives on the streets of a distant land. Once Xon realized that the rare materials he had been stealing from monsters enhanced the owner's abilities, he decided to become a traveling merchant to promote his business. After making huge profits from his stock, he now lives comfortably with the rest of his comrades. Although his master no longer lives, the teddy bear he keeps as a memento of him always serves as a reminder that he must share whatever he gains through thievery with the less fortunate.
strings.summon:
If you've got money to spare then
you should buy something from me!
I might return the favor, you know?
strings.evolution:
This feeling is no longer scary to me.
I can steal any item,
and evade any assault...
strings.affinity:
I'm not tricking you, really,
this is the real thing!
strings.fusion:
That feels right.
One by one, I feel like there's more and more I can steal.

strings.description: An aspiring young cleric from a distant land. Aiden's menacing look stems from the fact that he once trained to be a warrior. It wasn't until a certain incident took place that he began learning restorative magic, eventually becoming as proficient in it as his other fellow clerics. Unfortunately, however, he is very quick to anger and will not hesitate to use his staff to hit his enemies in battle before ever using it to conjure magic.
strings.summon:
I am a mage with the power
to wield recovery magic,
just so you know.
strings.affinity:
This is proof that my prayers were answered.
I am proud to have been able to fight alongside you.
strings.fusion:
I feel like I now have access
to even more healing magic.

strings.description: An aspiring young cleric from a distant land. Aiden was once a warrior who placed complete faith in his own abilities. However, it wasn't long until he realized that he needed the ability to heal others in order to protect them, and thus he began his training to become a cleric. Although he is known for his short temper, he is quite diligent and hardworking, always focusing all his efforts on his goals. His abrasive attitude often causes others to confuse him for a warrior, but he is a skilled cleric in his own right.
strings.summon:
I will not do the work of a warrior.
I am a mage, after all.
Leave the healing to me.
strings.evolution:
It feels different holding a staff.
I feel like I can take out any foe.
All with this blessed staff...
strings.affinity:
This is proof that my prayers were answered.
I am proud to have been able to fight alongside you.
strings.fusion:
I've got so much power now I feel like
I wanna put down my staff and try
swinging a sword for a change!

strings.description: An aspiring young cleric from a distant land. Long ago, Aiden was much too confident in his abilities as a warrior, and challenged a great beast to battle. However, his skills were not enough to subdue the beast, and his sister lost her life trying to shield him from a fatal blow. Tormented by the overwhelming guilt, he decided to give up his sword and began his studies in the arts of the clerics.
