Believing that the healing magic he has learned will prevent anyone else from dying on his watch, he continues training fiercely to protect those he cares for the most.
strings.summon:
Call me if you need help recovering.
With this ever stronger body of mine,
I can follow you wherever you go.
strings.evolution:
Not once more will I allow someone
to die before my eyes!
strings.affinity:
This is proof that my prayers were answered.
I am proud to have been able to fight alongside you.
strings.fusion:
I will heal any and all wound
with this fighting spirit of mine!

strings.description: Colabo
strings.summon: Colabo
strings.fusion: Colabo

strings.description: Colabo
strings.summon: Colabo
strings.evolution: Colabo
strings.fusion: Colabo

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)

A young boy who fought with a legendary holy sword in a world protected by the great power of mana. Though he was brought to Potos Village when he was very young by his mother, he soon found himself completely alone and without any family, at which time the village head took him in. However, seen as an outsider, he was picked on by the local bullies, and unfortunately grew up to be a very timid and cowardly little boy. Then one day, having pulled out the legendary holy sword, Randi set off to save the world in which the balance of mana had begun to crumble.
strings.summon:
This is the sacred sword of legend....
What am I to do with it?
strings.affinity:
Quite a lot has happened,
but at least we were together.
That's how I made it this far.
strings.fusion:
Awesome!
I've powered up!
...right?

strings.description: A young boy who fought with a legendary holy sword in a world protected by the great power of mana. Having suddenly been ousted from his village after freeing the holy sword, Randi comes across a travelling swordsman named Jema and follows him on a journey to take back the power of his sword. He then ventures around the world with Primm, the daughter of the cabinet minister of the kingdom of Pandora, and Popoi, a sprite looking to find his way home. In doing so, Randi learns of his birth and ultimately of his purpose, awakening his true courage as he goes.
strings.summon:
I'm Randi!
I'm looking for the Tree of Mana...
strings.evolution:
I will grow stronger!
Along with this holy sword!
strings.affinity:
Quite a lot has happened,
but at least we were together.
That's how I made it this far.
strings.fusion:
The power of the holy sword is returning...
I need to power up, as well!

strings.description: A young girl who fought to save the man she loved in a world protected by the great power of mana. The daughter of the cabinet minister of the kingdom of Pandora, outside of losing her mother at a young age, she was able to live a fairly carefree life, making her self-empowered and selfish. Having heard the knight Dyluck whom she loved had gone to fight an evil witch, she headed after him and left the kingdom. On her journey she was to come across a young boy about to be eaten by a great monster, which was to greatly impact her destiny.
strings.summon:
I am Primm.
I look forward to working with you!
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come this far...
I'm so glad I was able to meet you!
strings.fusion:
That's great!
We'll certainly find what we're looking for at this rate!

strings.description: A young girl who fought to save the man she loved in a world protected by the great power of mana. On her journey to find her beloved Dyluck who left to fight a wicked witch, she ended up befriending and travelling the world with Randi, the boy in possession of the legendary holy sword, and Popoi, a sprite looking to find his way home. As they travelled around, Primm learned more and more magic from the sprites they came across at the various shrines they visited. It is said she used it to defeat her enemies, and sometimes even heal her allies.
strings.summon:
I can't do this alone.
Please, let me go with you!
strings.evolution:
Now that I'm strong enough,
I should be of better use to you, right?
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come this far...
I'm so glad I was able to meet you!
strings.fusion:
So, the dead lend us their power?
Surely that will come in handy!

strings.description: A young girl who fought to save the man she loved in a world protected by the great power of mana. On her journey to find her beloved Dyluck who left to fight a wicked witch, she travelled the world with Randi and the sprite Popoi, visiting shrine after shrine trying to take back the power of the legendary holy sword. Receiving the protection of the sprites in the form of various types of magic, it is said she continued fighting, seeking to save her beloved Dyluck who had gotten caught up in the Vandole Empire conspiracy.
strings.summon:
Having allies around makes you stronger.
That's why I'd like to help out, too!
strings.evolution: I will never forget the friends with which I've had such wonderful adventures.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come this far...
I'm so glad I was able to meet you!
strings.fusion:
I've decided to live to the utmost so
as not to disappoint those I cherish.

strings.description: A young sprite searching for his home in a world protected by the great power of mana.  Despite being a bit cheeky and calculating, he has a very positive personality. Swept away in the flood that hit the forest of sprites, he was taken in by the village head at Gaia's Navel, however due to the shock of the flood he couldn't remember his own name or where he came from. He began to trick and steal from travelers in order to raise funds for his journey home, however, that was until he came across Randi, the boy with the legendary holy sword.
strings.summon:
*Sob* *sob*
You're so sweet, mister.
Thank you for... H-hey, where are we?!
strings.affinity: Hehe, I'm so happy to have been blessed with such wonderful partners!
strings.fusion:
Hmm...
Just when I thought I'd remembered something, I've gone and forgot it, again!

strings.description: A young sprite searching for his home in a world protected by the great power of mana. Having lost his memory due to the shock of being carried away in a flood, along with Randi, the boy with the holy sword, and Primm, a girl in search of her beloved, Popoi searches for a home the location of which he can't recall. Though their travels are befallen by many hardships, Popoi uses his bright disposition, as well as the magic bestowed to him by the sprites to support his allies, to see them through many a struggle.
strings.summon: Don't you be getting in my way, mister!
strings.evolution:
There we go!
Just when you thought things were safe, BAMN!
strings.affinity: Hehe, I'm so happy to have been blessed with such wonderful partners!
strings.fusion:
That's it, my little partner!
You've got it!

strings.description: A young sprite searching for his home in a world protected by the great power of mana.  Though he lost memories when he was carried away by the flood, he was able to recover them while travelling around with Randi and Primm. However, having finally returned to the place from which he came, Popoi found that it had been ravaged by some wicked being. Now aware of the fact that someone was out to destroy the balance of mana, Popoi and the others set their sights on the Mana Tree.
strings.summon:
I will return to my home town.
I would appreciate it if you'd let me go along with you until then!
strings.evolution:
You know, once the mana disappears,
so do us fairies...
strings.affinity: Hehe, I'm so happy to have been blessed with such wonderful partners!
strings.fusion: I'm going to protect the Mana so that all the villagers can make it back safely!

strings.description: A young sprite searching for his home in a world protected by the great power of mana. Popoi decided to make a stand against the Vandole Empire when it attacked his village seeking to take over the world by resurrecting the Mana Fortress. Together with Randi, his friends, and the power of the Mana Sword, Popoi was finally able to thwart the Vandole Empire's ambitions. However, during their last decisive battle, he would have to make the hardest choice of his life.
strings.summon:
Let's travel together from now on.
With a skip, here we go,
yo ho ho!
strings.evolution:
Something that only I can do...
Don't go running off, now!
strings.affinity: Hehe, I'm so happy to have been blessed with such wonderful partners!
strings.fusion:
My name Popoi was given
to me by the hero of legend!
I'm his greatest follower!

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
strings.summon:
Fight with you, you say?
Why would you ask me such a thing?
strings.fusion:
Incredible!
I'm unlocking new skills like never before!

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
strings.evolution:
I have been asked to join the princess's guard.
That is how strong I am.
strings.fusion:
While you're at it, teach me how to fight!
I think I'm really good at remembering things.

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
NA (Romancing Saga)
strings.summon:
Ha ha ha ha!
Here, there, Robyn's everywhere!
I wonder if I can be of help to you guys?
strings.affinity:
There's no reason to look back.
As long as you are pleased by me fighting, that is all I could ask for.
strings.fusion:
To even the most evil, my blade
does no unnecessary harm!
I will not abuse my power!

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
strings.summon:
Ha ha ha ha!
As long as the wonderful Robyn is here,
evil cannot prosper in this world! Let's go!
strings.evolution:
Ha ha ha, farewell to my old self.
Hello new Robyn, extraordinary hero!
strings.affinity:
There's no reason to look back.
As long as you are pleased by me fighting, that is all I could ask for.
strings.fusion:
Steal the enemy's power to help your friends!
It is the power needed to maintain justice!

strings.description: NA (Romancing Saga)
strings.summon:
You're all very brave.
I'll be your partner anytime!
Robyn is here to keep the world safe!
strings.evolution:
Ha ha ha,
I have reached my final form!
Let this figure be burned into your memory!
strings.affinity:
There's no reason to look back.
As long as you are pleased by me fighting, that is all I could ask for.
strings.fusion:
Ha ha ha ha ha!
When it comes to nimbly wielding a blade, there is none who can stand beside me!

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. This all-purpose combat model is capable of short-range sword attacks, and is also equipped with a "pod" sub system which allows for long-ranged attacks. YoRHa soldiers do not have names, and are instead called by their code number. Though these androids are prohibited by rule to hold emotions, 2B is comparatively the most calm and collected. Her proper name is YoRHa No. 2 Type B.
strings.summon:
YoRHa unit 2B.
Proceeding with mission.
strings.affinity:
I will have many chances to act alongside you.
You've no reason to give me any undue respect.
strings.fusion: Glory to mankind.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. This all-purpose combat model is capable of short-range sword attacks, and is also equipped with a "pod" sub system which allows for long-ranged attacks. During her mission to take down the giant machine lifeform all others but 2B fell, she was able to carry it out thanks to assistance from 9S. Despite being comparatively calm and collected, she also has an emotional side to her.
strings.summon:
Machine lifeforms are the enemy of YoRHa.
Do not forget this.
strings.evolution:
Version up complete,
battle functionality upgraded.
Now ready for orders.
strings.affinity:
I will have many chances to act alongside you.
You've no reason to give me any undue respect.
strings.fusion: This is 2B. Nothing to report.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. Though capable at close-range combat, he was especially designed as a research unit, and is good at gaining information via hacking. He is comparatively more emotional and expressive than other YoRHa Soldiers, and is very kind. He is also very curious, and has a childlike way of talking. His proper name is YoRHa No. 9 Type S.
strings.summon:
Us scanner models are good at hacking.
I've always got your back.
strings.affinity:
Those who are close to me
often just call me "Nines."
What will you call me?
strings.fusion: Glory to mankind.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. Though capable at close-range combat, he was especially designed as a research unit, and is good at gaining information via hacking. Ordered to assist 2B in eliminating the giant machine lifeform, he helped her, the only survivor of all units sent down to the surface, to achieve victory. He thinks of 2B as a great friend, and often puts her before himself.
strings.summon:
Hello? Hmm, that's strange.
Excuse me, do you know of an android named 2B?
strings.evolution:
With this power, I can destroy
many machine lifeforms.
Thank you.
strings.affinity:
Those who are close to me
often just call me "Nines."
What will you call me?
strings.fusion: We were created to protect mankind.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. Though capable at close-range combat, he was especially designed as a research unit, and is good at gaining information via hacking. Following the battle with the giant machine lifeform, he performed maintenance on 2B and assisted her further with her duties. He was able to see out many victories with her. In doing this, the superior scanner model 9S was able to overcome many adversities and come closer to the truth of the world.
strings.summon:
I am a soldier.
I have pride in that.
strings.evolution:
You don't need to worry.
The 9S model is known for being superior.
...Though I shouldn't be saying so.
strings.affinity:
Those who are close to me
often just call me "Nines."
What will you call me?
strings.fusion:
Enhancement successful.
I will use this power to protect you humans.

strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was born from an amalgamation of machine lifeforms that were living in a desert area. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man. Though calm and intellectual, his purpose was of the utmost cruel and vindictive qualities. Little of him is known other than the fact that he travels around with his look-alike younger brother, Eve.
strings.summon:
Our creator?
An organism of exceedingly simple design, similar to a plant.
strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.fusion: Humans are fascinating... I'm unable to comprehend them.

strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man, and his origin shrouded in mystery. Not only is he incredibly powerful, his mastery over language compared to other less intelligent machine lifeforms allows him to communicate with ease. He is very interested in the "life" that human's have, and will do whatever it takes to understand it further.
strings.summon:
Androids are not living things.
They're just puppets that live
according to their own intentions...
strings.evolution:
Some people seek beauty,
while others seek peace.
For me, it is hatred...
strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.fusion:
Not bad.
This is just the the power I need to destroy those worthless beings.

strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man, and his origin shrouded in mystery. He is more intelligent and curious than any normal man could understand, holding an intense interest in humanity. The androids are his natural enemies, and he comes to fight 2B and 9S many times.
strings.summon:
You all have an interest in humanity.
I will travel with you until I have
a grasp on that mystery.
strings.evolution: Hatred is the true meaning for living...
strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.fusion:
The longer you hide
the denser the darkness grows...

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. A communications operator stationed in the bunker, she is in charge of relaying instructions to YoRHa soldiers on the ground and providing data analysis. Though individual personalities can vary, she is very calm and serious. She dislikes any conversation which does not pertain to missions. As 9S's operator, she provides him with mission support.
strings.summon: I am 21O, operator for 9S.
strings.affinity:
If you understand what family is,
would you mind telling me?
strings.fusion: Glory to mankind.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. A communications operator stationed in the bunker, she is in charge of relaying instructions to YoRHa soldiers on the ground and providing data analysis. She is very serious, often having to keep 9S from engaging in personal conversation. However, she does seem to sometimes enjoy acting like an older sister to the childish 9S.
strings.summon: Personal conversation is forbidden during missions. If you've something to talk about, leave it for later.
strings.evolution: Thank you for giving me power.
strings.affinity:
If you understand what family is,
would you mind telling me?
strings.fusion: 21O. Nothing to report.

strings.description: A unit of the YoRHa soldiers, a group from a faraway world made up of androids. A communications operator stationed in the bunker, she is in charge of relaying instructions to YoRHa soldiers on the ground and providing data analysis. She holds a great interest in data analysis, often requesting 9S to gather various human data. She is particularly interested in the human concept of "family."
strings.summon:
Have you seen 9S?
I'm a little worried that he might have done something to jeopardize mankind.
strings.evolution:
I did not think we could grow stronger
with methods we were unaware of.
You must also tell 9S of this.
strings.affinity:
If you understand what family is,
would you mind telling me?
strings.fusion:
Enhancement successful.
All for mankind.

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. Born as a talented young singer, she started performing from a young age. She became committed to her passion for music and eventually became a popular singer.
strings.summon: All I want is the love of my fans!
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Don't you worry about a thing, we're gonna be alright.

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. A natural born singer who started performing ever since she was a child. The combination of her incredible vocal range and her passion for music made her a force to be reckoned with!
strings.summon: Tell me what you came here for?
strings.evolution: Been waiting and waiting for you to make a move.
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Let's plant love and grow peace!

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. Raised with a flair for music, she started performing from a young age. Incited by her desire to create and share wonderful music with the world, she worked hard to become a successful singer.
strings.summon: Love is one of the most beautiful things in life.
strings.evolution: That's it! Put your heart into it!
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Focus! Then take me all the way...

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he and his friend Lasswell are considered two of the most formidable knights to grace the Royal Guard since Rain's father Sir Raegen. Though he harbors conflicted feelings toward his father for having abandoned him and his family, he keeps this to himself when in the presence of Lasswell, who still deeply respects the man.
strings.summon: The fire in me burns once again. I am ready to fight alongside you!
strings.affinity: The battles we have fought together… thanks for your trust in my powers. Take this as a token of my gratitude.
strings.fusion: Feels like I can take on more enemies!

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. Though usually preoccupied chasing girls, on his journey chasing after the Sworn Six of Paladia who attacked his homeland a gentler, more courageous side of him came through. At a young age he came in contact with the earth crystal, but little did he know that would become the catalyst that sealed his fate.
strings.summon: Alive and burning... it feels so good. When does the next battle start?
strings.evolution: I can feel raw power coursing through my veins!
strings.affinity: The battles we have fought together… thanks for your trust in my powers. Take this as a token of my gratitude.
strings.fusion: My strength grows…time to smash some foes!

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt whose talents earned him command of an airship alongside Rain. Lasswell is a tireless worker, entirely devoted to his duties and training. He holds the utmost respect for Rain's father, Sir Raegen, once a prominent knight of Grandshelt himself. Lasswell lends his strength to Rain as a way to honor the memory of his hero, while struggling with the fact that this prestigious lineage is not his own.
strings.summon: You who summoned me, can I trust you? I suppose I could…
strings.affinity: You have been a great mentor in our journeys together. Umm…thanks.
strings.fusion: Grace and agility…this costume of mine is awesome.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt who was raised alongside Rain by Rain's father, Sir Raegen, who also trained Lasswell in various skills. Out of respect for everything he had been given, he has a tendancy to worry about Rain and his wellbeing, though he seems to be hiding some dreams and hopes of his own. His beloved sword, purple lightning, is the last remaining connection he has to Sir Raegen.
strings.summon:
What is this new form I have taken?
You look like someone I can trust…
strings.evolution: My powers have reached a new level. This is interesting…
strings.affinity: You have been a great mentor in our journeys together. Umm…thanks.
strings.fusion:
My powers have grown vastly.
If only I could've attained this power earlier.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. Because she has amnesia, she relies on impulse to guide her actions, which can often cause trouble for her comrades. Having woken in a strange world without her memories, she struggles with confusion and anxiety, but displays great inner strength in joining Rain and Lasswell on their quest.
strings.summon: White Witch at your service… Uh, what was I saying?
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: I think I am stronger now...and can be of more help to you.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Her childlike behavior, in part the product of memory loss, may also stem from her original, lost personality.
strings.summon:
What's this new power?
Now I can continue to use my white magic to help others.
strings.evolution: It's like my latent powers have been unlocked… I feel stronger.
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: My control over spirits has grown…now I can better use it to aid you.

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Despite her childlike behavior, she has grown to become a powerful ally to her partners, Rain and Lasswell.
strings.summon:
To be able to walk with spirits again.
Thank you for calling on me.
strings.evolution: My mind is so clear and focused, it feels incredible to be awakened.
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: Really? To think that I am now capable of protecting everyone, it's like a dream come true.

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado, who grew from a kid toying with machines in her parents' workshop to the finest engineer in the Industrial City. Lid is determined to inherit the name Cid, an honor granted only to the greatest in her trade. Her only serious flaw seems to be her love of money.
strings.summon: Meow! How much gil do you have?
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: What's this? I feel like I'm getting stronger!

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado. Lid had an interest in machinery from childhood, but it wasn't until her older brother began showing her the ropes (and gears) that her aptitude blossomed into real talent. Her most treasured possession is her robot chocobo named Mechabo, which she and her brother built together. She became even more attached to Mechabo when her brother left home.
strings.summon: Trick-or-treat! Meow!
strings.evolution: I'm a cat, a magical cat! Meow!
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: There's so much more gil to make! Meow!

strings.description: An airship engineer who is paving the way to a new era. Unfortunately for Lid, her older brother was the one to inherit the Cid name she so coveted, after he left home. Regardless, she single-handedly renovated the desolate workshop her brother had abandoned, using the first Cid and his philosophy of freedom as her inspiration. Lid now seeks to become the embodiment of her hero as she travels with Rain.
strings.summon: M-me-meow! I'm ready for the party, are you?
strings.evolution: Hey, time to get more candies! Me-yow!
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: Yay! More candies! The fun has only just begun!

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado. Lid had an interest in machinery from childhood, but it wasn't until her older brother began showing her the ropes (and gears) that her aptitude blossomed into real talent. Her most treasured possession is her robot chocobo named Mechabo, which she and her brother built together. She became even more attached to Mechabo when her brother left home.
strings.summon:
Hmm... I guess I can become a vision,
even if we're together.
strings.affinity:
Thinking back of all the colorful adventures we have been through...
It has been fun! You deserve this.
strings.fusion:
When you're having a tough time,
do you look down at your feet,
or up to the skies?

strings.description: An airship engineer who is paving the way to a new era. Unfortunately for Lid, her older brother was the one to inherit the Cid name she so coveted, after he left home. Regardless, she single-handedly renovated the desolate workshop her brother had abandoned, using the first Cid and his philosophy of freedom as her inspiration. Lid now seeks to become the embodiment of her hero as she travels with Rain.
strings.summon:
Since I've been called and everything,
I guess I can't just not lend you
my power now, can I?
strings.evolution:
I'll be the one to
inherit the Cid name.
I feel like I've gotta
take care of it, now!
strings.affinity:
Thinking back of all the colorful adventures we have been through...
It has been fun! You deserve this.
strings.fusion: I'm gonna build an airship that everyone can ride, no matter who they are or where they come from! You got a problem with that?

strings.description: A judge master appearing in the faraway world of Ivalice. A silent man who selflessly serves that Archadian Empire, though capable of committing inhuman acts in the name of his country, he is actually a kind and compassionate person. Though expected to support those in line to become emperor such as Gramis, Vayne, and Larsa, he is dedicated to serving only the one true emperor.
strings.summon:
I would risk my life on any challenge
if it serves the empire.
strings.affinity:
It's easier to take risky actions when
you've someone you can put your trust in.
That person might be you, some day.
strings.fusion:
When danger presents itself,
great power is required.

strings.description: A judge master appearing in the faraway world of Ivalice. A calm and collected man, he serves whoever is emperor with all his might. Only speaking in total honesty, he rarely discloses anything about himself. Taking into account the oncoming attack from the Rozarrians, he decides to aid Vayne in his plan. However, being the upright person he is, he objected when Vayne sentenced his friend to death.
strings.summon:
Is our opponent this time the rebels,
or could it be...
strings.evolution:
Regardless of who is in power,
I am dedicated to serving the empire.
strings.affinity:
It's easier to take risky actions when
you've someone you can put your trust in.
That person might be you, some day.
strings.fusion:
I do not intend to waste my life,
but I will not keep me from putting it on the line.

strings.description: An android from a faraway world, her proper name is YoRHa Type A No. 2. An attacker model implementing a close-range attack style not currently used, she is a prototype of the current official YoRHa soldier models like 2B and 9S, and closely resembles 2B. Long ago, she was thrust into a large scale fight by the human military headquarters to be tested, but afterwards it is said she deserted and went completely AWOL.
strings.summon:
Machine lifeforms have no souls.
I will make them pay for all of my
friends they've killed.
strings.affinity:
I am still alive... I am sorry.
Once things are cleared up here,
I'll be on my way.
strings.fusion: Sorry I'm an old model.

strings.description: An android from a faraway world, she once belonged to the human's military, but ended up running away after a certain battle. Though completely AWOL, it is said she is still fighting to destroy the machine lifeforms. An attacker model developed to be good at close-range attacks, her ability to enable "B mode" which greatly increases her attack power for a short amount of time sets her apart from the all-purpose 2B model.
strings.evolution:
It is inexcusable not to be able to repay a debt.
I will help as much as I can.
strings.affinity:
I am still alive... I am sorry.
Once things are cleared up here,
I'll be on my way.
strings.fusion: Her memories...they live on in this blade.

strings.description: A machine lifeform shrouded in mystery from a faraway world. He appeared from the body of Adam who had been injured by the android units of YoRHa. Though he looks very similarly to Adam, despite this personality-wise he is very childlike and selfish. On the other hand, he is quick to give in to Adam, and even when it comes to taking part in meals and readings in which he has no interest, he obediently follows whatever his brother commands.
strings.summon:
Eve might be a girl's name...
But if that's what my brother wishes to call me, then that's what I'll go with.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't imagine my life without my brother.
No, I just can't... I wish we could just
go somewhere quiet and be together...
strings.fusion:
I understand...
I will do as my brother wishes.
You'll still play with me, right?

strings.description: A machine lifeform shrouded in mystery from a faraway world. Just like his brother Adam, unlike other machine lifeforms, he has the body and intelligence of a human. However despite this, he still acts fairly childish, often being rebuked by his brother Adam. Though he has absolutely no idea why his brother Adam is so interested in the relations of humans, he is ultimately loyal and follows every command his brother hands down.
strings.evolution:
You all feel the same, right?
This world... There's just no meaning to it.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't imagine my life without my brother.
No, I just can't... I wish we could just
go somewhere quiet and be together...
strings.fusion:
Let's play once I've finished reading.
It should be a lot of fun.

strings.description: A machine lifeform shrouded in mystery from a faraway world. He has no interests other than being loyal to his brother Adam, and unable to understand how obsessed he is with the human concept of "life." However, he does understand Adam's feelings toward the YoRHa androids, also choosing to fight against them. The power hidden within him reaches a whole new height when his feelings for his brother Adam and his hatred for the androids combine.
strings.evolution: Everything! I will destroy everything!
strings.affinity:
I couldn't imagine my life without my brother.
No, I just can't... I wish we could just
go somewhere quiet and be together...
strings.fusion:
To me, my brother...
Only he can...

strings.description: A female dragoon appearing on battlefields throughout the world. She has been incredibly successful over many a battle. Attacking from high above, riding atop her red dragon as she brings death to those below, she has come to be known among mercenaries as the "Crimson Death." On the other hand, she believes strongly in strengthening the bonds between dragons and humans, and though she loves them very much, she is not opposed to punishing those who step out of line. She has an incredibly strong bond with the dragon she travels along with.
strings.summon:
Pay your respects unto the dragon.
If you treat them as monsters,
then I shall end you.
strings.affinity: It seems we have developed quite the bond, you and I.
strings.fusion:
Attack the enemy!
Dance high, my dragon!

strings.description: A female dragoon appearing on battlefields throughout the world. She is called the "Crimson Death," as once she has her eyes on you, there is no escaping her. However, since having her on one's side is a guarantee for victory, there are many who attempt to hire her. The dragon she carries along with her is the second generation. Her former dragon partner was cruelly killed by a person who could wield a special type of magic. She hides within her heart a desire to end this person's life.
strings.summon:
If you recognize the power of both
dragons and humans,
then I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
I've unlocked more power...?
What is it you wish to do with the Crimson Death?
strings.affinity: It seems we have developed quite the bond, you and I.
strings.fusion:
Let us fly over there,
quick as a flash!

strings.description: A young, silent black mage from a place widely unknown. He always has his sights set on dragons, and is especially equipped for taking them on. He's cold-blooded when it comes to fighting dragons, not taking mercy on them even if they are wounded or even young. He hates being thought of by humans, and is constantly trying to avoid getting involved with others. He has a particularly bad relationship with a certain dragoon, and there are even rumors that this dragoon seeks to end his life.
strings.summon: Don't think you can just talk to me.
strings.affinity:
Has my blood arisen?
My techniques have given rise to a new power.
strings.fusion: Hmph, more power...

strings.description: A young, silent black mage from a place widely unknown. He is hated by dragoons as he constantly has his eye on taking down dragons. He owes his strength to his secret "blood technique," which uses his own blood to increase his magic power. He shows no emotions no matter how big the dragon which stands before him, and thanks to his special technique, it is said that if he were to get injured and lose blood, it would only excite him, making him unstoppable.
strings.summon: Think there are any dragons around here?
strings.evolution:
He he he, dragons...where are they!?
Don't be hiding now!
I'll just drag you out!
strings.affinity:
Has my blood arisen?
My techniques have given rise to a new power.
strings.fusion: Hmph, I'll take it.

strings.description: A young, silent black mage from a place widely unknown. Using the magic power he stole from the dragons he's slayed along with his blood technique, he is able to unleash powerful magical attacks. The blood technique is a technique that was once handed down through a certain colony. However, this colony was attacked and destroyed by dragons, which is said to have put an end to the technique. It is unknown whether or not this young man is from that colony, but what is known is that the look in his eye when he comes face to face with a dragon is full of nothing but hatred.
strings.summon:
Hey, tell me of any dragons you know about.
...I'll go and take care of 'em.
strings.evolution:
You detested dragons, you!
I will put an end to you all!
Come out now!
strings.affinity:
Has my blood arisen?
My techniques have given rise to a new power.
strings.fusion: Hey, get your hands off me...

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. Born as a talented young singer, she started performing from a young age. She became committed to her passion for music and eventually became a popular singer.
strings.summon: All I want is the love of my fans!
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Don't you worry about a thing, we're gonna be alright.

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. A natural born singer who started performing ever since she was a child. The combination of her incredible vocal range and her passion for music made her a force to be reckoned with!
strings.summon: Tell me what you came here for?
strings.evolution: Been waiting and waiting for you to make a move.
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Let's plant love and grow peace!

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. Raised with a flair for music, she started performing from a young age. Incited by her desire to create and share wonderful music with the world, she worked hard to become a successful singer.
strings.summon: Love is one of the most beautiful things in life.
strings.evolution: That's it! Put your heart into it!
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Focus! Then take me all the way...

strings.description: A monster inside a green pot. It takes great joy in training its body, and is always carrying around dumbbells. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Among these, it is said that tough pots have a particular fondness for HP, the knowledge relating to which, this pot stores in its pot.
strings.summon:
Must become...more...
powerful...

strings.description: A grown-up mini tough pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to HP within their pot. They also carry around dumbbells wherever they go, never missing a training session.  It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It is unknown whether this is true, but what is known is that they are able to bestow their knowledge to others.
strings.summon:
Have you all been training...?
Strong humans... I love them!

strings.description: A form of pot which all tough pots strive to become.  It carries around massive dumbbells, training harder than it ever has. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. What is known is that they are so rare one would have to be very lucky just to see one, and that they hold a massive amount of knowledge regarding HP in their large pots.
strings.summon:
Do you require my power?
Then allow me to see how full of vitality you all are.

strings.description: A monster inside a yellow pot. It's always carrying around a magic tome, constant thinking about everything concerning MP.  Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Magi pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to MP, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I sense MP...
I will stick with you!

strings.description: A grown-up mini magi pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to MP within their pot. It carries around a large magic tome so as not to miss out on its MP studies. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. They love watching humans use MP, often following around and befriending those who do so.
strings.summon:
If I were to become one with you,
I wonder if you could understand MP?

strings.description: A form of pot which all magi pots strive to become. It carries around a thick magic tome as it is constantly thinking about MP. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. They are incredibly curious about MP, and once they find a human using magic or other skills, they can't help but run towards them to get a closer look.
strings.summon: Show me more how you wield MP!

strings.description: A monster inside a red pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its attack power, and it always carries around a blade. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Power pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to ATK, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I can fight, too!
Slash! Chop! Hack!

strings.description: A grown-up mini power pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to ATK within their pot. They carry around a great sword, never missing a chance to train themselves. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It loves preparing for battle, and when it sees a potential powerful ally, it often follows them into battle.
strings.summon:
I won't lose again!
Ready your weapons,
it's time for battle!

strings.description: A form of pot which all power pots strive to become. It carries a great, splendid sword around, training with it night and day. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It loves a good fair fight, and greatly enjoys taking out its enemies with physical attacks. Even after becoming its ally, it still insists on challenging its partners to duels.
strings.summon:
Strength is everything.
You all think so too, correct?

strings.description: A monster inside a blue pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its defensive power, and it always carries around a shield. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Shield pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to DEF, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I will strengthen
your power to protect!

strings.description: A grown-up mini shield pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to DEF within their pot. It carries around a big shield which it wields flawlessly in defending itself. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It has a strange disposition, taking enjoyment out of using its shield to defend itself from violent attacks.
strings.summon:
Come on, attack me more...
You'll never break my guard!

strings.description: A form of pot which all shield pots strive to become. I carries around a large shield, which offers it an exceedingly firm line of defense. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It takes great enjoyment in defending itself from heavy attacks, and regardless how violent the battle, it never hides or flees. There are many who are attracted to this tenacious creature.
strings.summon:
Go ahead, come at me.
I can withstand any attack you unleash.

strings.description: A monster inside a purple pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its magic power, and it always carries around a magic cane. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Smart pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to MAG, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
You need my power?
You have quite the eye, don't you?

strings.description: A grown-up mini smart pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to MAG within their pot. It carries around a wonderful cane, and is obsessed with increasing its own MAG. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. Though incredibly wise, looking down on the ignorant, it is very timid, and will hide in its pot if scared.
strings.summon: There is none more intellegent than me. I feel sorry for my foolish enemies.

strings.description: A form of pot which all smart pots strive to become. It carries with it a splendid cane, and boasts some of the highest MAG around. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It likes talking more than any of the other kinds of pots, but can quickly become boring as it usually only talks about itself. However, it doesn't seem to care what is said in return as simply nodding and listening don't seem to bother it.
strings.summon:
You wish to hear what I have to say?
What admirable dedication.
First off, we must speak of magic...

strings.description: A monster inside a silver pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its spirit power, and is always meditating. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Soul pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to SPR, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
This world...
How did it come into existance...?

strings.description: A grown-up mini soul pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to SPR within their pot. It is in a constant state of peaceful meditation in order to properly preserve its spirit power. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. They often just sit around thinking, and are hardly ever heard speaking. Even when they are, it is usually to themselves.
strings.summon:
Visions...
...How curious.

strings.description: A form of pot which all soul pots strive to become. It is constantly sharpening its spirit energy, undisturbed by anything that happens around it. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It has no interest in others, and is unmoving regardless of what happens, thanks to its strong spiritual power. Even if it is suddenly introduced to a new environment, it is able to instantly adapt.
strings.summon:
The hearts of people...
...of monsters...
...of the world...

strings.description: A turtle of sparkling gold. It is known to provide good luck, and was even used as a form of currency for a time. Due to its beauty and rarity, it still fetches as fine a price at stores as any gem or ingot. In wealthy circles, it is not uncommon to hear tiresome vulgarians bragging about how many Mini Gil Snappers they keep, as a way of flaunting their affluence. Rumors even tell of a competition, held somewhere in the world, to find the most beautiful specimens.
strings.summon: I go with humans...humans feed me, yes?

strings.description: A turtle with a body of sparkling gold, which is valued as highly as any gemstone. It is a popular talisman for two distinct reasons. Firstly, because of the beauty of its golden body; and secondly, because of its great longevity. It is known that Gil Snappers live longer than men, and grow slowly but steadily over time. This is why many who hope to live long and grow ever more prosperous consider coming into possession of one an absolute boon.
strings.summon:
Gsssssshhh!
You just keep me around until I die?

strings.description: A turtle with a shell encrusted with beautiful, sparkling stones. Amongst Gil Snappers, which are known for their longevity, only those that live the longest ever achieve this magnificent form. The stones on its back can be sold to be used as gemstones, which have great popularity. Since the stones grow ever larger the longer a turtle lives, people work themselves into a frenzy searching for the largest King Gil Snapper they can find. The gemstones from their shells are commonly known as Gil Snapper Sapphires.
strings.summon:
Greedy humans!
You just want me for my shell, yes!?

strings.description: A type of turtle with a jewel encrusted shell that shines in splendor. Many speculate that the mini gil snapper with such elegant stones on its shell is riding atop its equally radiant mother. However, since little is known concerning the reproduction of gil snappers, this theory has yet to be proven. The mysteries surrounding the gil snapper family make it a highly coveted subject for research, and its value in gil far surpasses that of the king gil snapper as well.
strings.summon:
It is safe on my shell.
It is a very comfortable ride!

strings.description: A rare, sparkling silver miniature cactuar. Despite the mellow, unassuming expression it wears, its prickly body is a treasure trove of knowledge and experience. Aware of this, hunters are constantly in search of them. However, they rarely appear in front of humans and the location of their habitat is unknown.
strings.summon:
Human...
Human...
Scary...

strings.description: A very rare, sparkling silver miniature cactuar. Eager to harvest the abundance of knowledge and experience stored in metal cactuars, those who encounter them grow frantic with greed. However, like others of its kind, the metal cactuar almost never appears in front of humans.
strings.summon:
Human...
You...want...power?

strings.description: An extremely rare, shimmering silver cactuar with a handsome mustache. Metal cactuars absorb energy from their surroundings, growing larger the more energy they absorb. Jumbo ones hold a tremendous amount of experience, and are so big that it is a wonder they are almost never seen.
strings.summon:
Ho ho!
You...need...my...help?

strings.description: A group of metal minituars that shine elegantly in sparkling silver. Always traveling in groups of three, the amount of experience this cluster provides exceeds that of even the metal gigantuar. Although the amount of experience each species of cactuar holds was initially attributed to their size, the existence of the king metal minituar altered that perspective. Scholars are currently struggling with the invalidation of their original theory.
strings.summon:
Do you want our power?
Well? Weeeeell?

strings.description: A moogle holding a mysterious crystal. The crystal seems to hold within itself a mysterious power that connects the hearts of people. Since the crystal it holds is still small, it is thought that the trust moogle holding it is still weak, and still in training itself. However, it feels more strongly than anyone for those who search for the power of trust, and every day it earnestly does its best to carry out its job as well as it possibly can.
strings.summon:
Us moogles aren't very strong...
But I'm happy to help, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle holding a large crystal. The crystal is filled with a mysterious power that brings people together. It is said to appear to those who call out for the power of trust, however it rarely ever appears. Though there are some who say they're connected to the moogles that reside in the Farplane, since no one ever sees them they can't be researched any further.
strings.summon:
Kupo? Did someone call me, kupo?
I can help you, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle holding a shiny crystal. The crystal is filled with a mysterious power that brings people together. It is said to appear to those who call out for the power of trust, however it rarely ever appears. It seems that there's a pecking order even among Trust Moogles, with some saying, "The moogle with the best looking crystal is the smartest, kupo!" However, outsiders would be hard-pressed to tell the difference.
strings.summon:
Please use my power, kupo!
Something great will surely happen, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle that carries a dazzling crystal. The crystal itself is said to be composed of the mystical forces that connect the hearts of people. Trust Moogles are so rare that they may turn heads even within the moogle community itself, so to encounter one is considered quite auspicious. Trust Moogles do not search for these special crystals as a hobby, nor even as part of their training, but as the foremost task of their very purpose in life: to strengthen the bonds between people. Thus, should they encounter someone worthy of receiving a crystal, they will hand it over freely and without qualm.
strings.summon:
Sorry for the wait, kupo!
Let me help you out.
I can come in pretty handy, kupo!

strings.description: An odd wee beastie who lives in a pot. Mini Burst Pots are attracted to individuals seeking to overcome their own limits, and who possess immeasurable hidden potential. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Rumor tells that stored within their pots is the means of unlocking a warrior's dormant abilities.
strings.summon:
Just how strong...can you become?
I am...very curious.

strings.description: A grown-up mini burst pot. These enlarged pots are full of knowledge relating to a power said to "break limits." It is thought that pots original gathered up various powers from around the world to present to the gods. However, recently researchers believe that they may just be power transfer mechanisms, made to carry such power to be used by certain people.
strings.summon:
I want to see up close
what you are capable of.

strings.description: A form of pot which all burst pots strive to become. This massive pot is full of knowledge relating to a power said to "break limits." It is said that burst pots appear to those whom they deem worthy of their power. Neither age, gender, nor personality seem to play a part in whom they select, but it is said that those selected share a strong desire to break beyond their own limits.
strings.summon:
Let me see you surpass your limits
and expand your power.
